2345 (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_ACTIVE_THREAT) ||
2346 m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_NOT_A_PROC)))
2347 m_procEx |= PROC_EX_INTERNAL_CANT_PROC;
2348 else if (_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_DISALLOW_PROC_EVENTS)
2349 m_procEx |= PROC_EX_INTERNAL_TRIGGERED;
2350 }
2351 // Totem casts require spellfamilymask defined in spell_proc_event to proc
2352 if (m_originalCaster && m_caster != m_originalCaster && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->ToCreature()->IsTotem() && m_caster->IsControlledByPlayer())
2353 m_procEx |= PROC_EX_INTERNAL_REQ_FAMILY;
2354}
2355
2356void Spell::CleanupTargetList()
2357{
2358 m_UniqueTargetInfo.clear();
2359 m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.clear();
2360 m_UniqueItemInfo.clear();
2361 m_delayMoment = 0;
2362 m_delayTrajectory = 0;
2363}
2364
2365void Spell::AddUnitTarget(Unit* target, uint32 effectMask, bool checkIfValid /*= true*/, bool implicit /*= true*/)
2366{
2367 for (uint32 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2368 if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].IsEffect() || !CheckEffectTarget(target, effIndex))
2369 effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2370
2371 // no effects left
2372 if (!effectMask)
2373 return;
2374
2375 if (checkIfValid)
2376 {
2377 SpellCastResult res = m_spellInfo->CheckTarget(m_caster, target, implicit);
2378 if (res != SPELL_CAST_OK)
2379 return;
2380 }
2381
2382 // Check for effect immune skip if immuned
2383 for (uint32 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2384 if (target->IsImmunedToSpellEffect(m_spellInfo, effIndex))
2385 effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2386
2387 ObjectGuid targetGUID = target->GetGUID();
2388
2389 // Lookup target in already in list
2390 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
2391 {
2392 if (targetGUID == ihit->targetGUID) // Found in list
2393 {
2394 ihit->effectMask |= effectMask; // Immune effects removed from mask
2395 ihit->scaleAura = false;
2396 if (m_auraScaleMask && ihit->effectMask == m_auraScaleMask && m_caster != target)
2397 {
2398 SpellInfo const* auraSpell = m_spellInfo->GetFirstRankSpell();
2399 if (uint32(target->getLevel() + 10) >= auraSpell->SpellLevel)
2400 ihit->scaleAura = true;
2401 }
2402
2403 sScriptMgr->OnScaleAuraUnitAdd(this, target, effectMask, checkIfValid, implicit, m_auraScaleMask, *ihit);
2404 return;
2405 }
2406 }
2407
2408 // This is new target calculate data for him
2409
2410 // Get spell hit result on target
2411 TargetInfo targetInfo;
2412 targetInfo.targetGUID = targetGUID; // Store target GUID
2413 targetInfo.effectMask = effectMask; // Store all effects not immune
2414 targetInfo.processed = false; // Effects not apply on target
2415 targetInfo.alive = target->IsAlive();
2416 targetInfo.damage = 0;
2417 targetInfo.crit = false;
2418 targetInfo.scaleAura = false;
2419 if (m_auraScaleMask && targetInfo.effectMask == m_auraScaleMask && m_caster != target)
2420 {
2421 SpellInfo const* auraSpell = m_spellInfo->GetFirstRankSpell();
2422 if (uint32(target->getLevel() + 10) >= auraSpell->SpellLevel)
2423 targetInfo.scaleAura = true;
2424 }
2425
2426 sScriptMgr->OnScaleAuraUnitAdd(this, target, effectMask, checkIfValid, implicit, m_auraScaleMask, targetInfo);
2427
2428 // Calculate hit result
2429 if (m_originalCaster)
2430 {
2431 targetInfo.missCondition = m_originalCaster->SpellHitResult(target, this, m_canReflect);
2432 if (m_skipCheck && targetInfo.missCondition != SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE)
2433 {
2434 targetInfo.missCondition = SPELL_MISS_NONE;
2435 }
2436 }
2437 else
2438 targetInfo.missCondition = SPELL_MISS_EVADE; //SPELL_MISS_NONE;
2439
2440 // Spell have speed - need calculate incoming time
2441 // Incoming time is zero for self casts. At least I think so.
2442 if (m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f && m_caster != target)
2443 {
2444 // calculate spell incoming interval
2445 // TODO: this is a hack
2446 float dist = m_caster->GetDistance(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ());
2447
2448 if (dist < 5.0f)
2449 dist = 5.0f;
2450 targetInfo.timeDelay = (uint64) floor(dist / m_spellInfo->Speed * 1000.0f);
2451
2452 // Calculate minimum incoming time
2453 if (m_delayMoment == 0 || m_delayMoment > targetInfo.timeDelay)
2454 m_delayMoment = targetInfo.timeDelay;
2455 }
2456 else
2457 targetInfo.timeDelay = 0LL;
2458
2459 // If target reflect spell back to caster
2460 if (targetInfo.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
2461 {
2462 // Calculate reflected spell result on caster
2463 targetInfo.reflectResult = m_caster->SpellHitResult(m_caster, this, m_canReflect);
2464
2465 if (targetInfo.reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT) // Impossible reflect again, so simply deflect spell
2466 targetInfo.reflectResult = SPELL_MISS_PARRY;
2467
2468 // Increase time interval for reflected spells by 1.5
2469 m_caster->m_Events.AddEvent(new ReflectEvent(m_caster, targetInfo.targetGUID, m_spellInfo), m_caster->m_Events.CalculateTime(targetInfo.timeDelay));
2470 targetInfo.timeDelay += targetInfo.timeDelay >> 1;
2471
2472 m_spellFlags |= SPELL_FLAG_REFLECTED;
2473
2474 // HACK: workaround check for succubus seduction case
2475 // TODO: seduction should be casted only on humanoids (not demons)
2476 if (m_caster->IsPet())
2477 {
2478 CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(m_caster->GetEntry());
2479 switch (ci->family)
2480 {
2481 case CREATURE_FAMILY_SUCCUBUS:
2482 {
2483 if (m_spellInfo->SpellIconID != 694) // Soothing Kiss
2484 cancel();
2485 }
2486 break;
2487 return;
2488 }
2489 }
2490 }
2491 else
2492 targetInfo.reflectResult = SPELL_MISS_NONE;
2493
2494 // Add target to list
2495 m_UniqueTargetInfo.push_back(targetInfo);
2496}
2497
2498void Spell::AddGOTarget(GameObject* go, uint32 effectMask)
2499{
2500 for (uint32 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2501 {
2502 if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].IsEffect())
2503 effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2504 else
2505 {
2506 switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect)
2507 {
2508 case SPELL_EFFECT_GAMEOBJECT_DAMAGE:
2509 case SPELL_EFFECT_GAMEOBJECT_REPAIR:
2510 case SPELL_EFFECT_GAMEOBJECT_SET_DESTRUCTION_STATE:
2511 if (go->GetGoType() != GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DESTRUCTIBLE_BUILDING)
2512 effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2513 break;
2514 default:
2515 break;
2516 }
2517 }
2518 }
2519
2520 if (!effectMask)
2521 return;
2522
2523 ObjectGuid targetGUID = go->GetGUID();
2524
2525 // Lookup target in already in list
2526 for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
2527 {
2528 if (targetGUID == ihit->targetGUID) // Found in list
2529 {
2530 ihit->effectMask |= effectMask; // Add only effect mask
2531 return;
2532 }
2533 }
2534
2535 // This is new target calculate data for him
2536
2537 GOTargetInfo target;
2538 target.targetGUID = targetGUID;
2539 target.effectMask = effectMask;
2540 target.processed = false; // Effects not apply on target
2541
2542 // Spell have speed - need calculate incoming time
2543 if (m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f)
2544 {
2545 // calculate spell incoming interval
2546 float dist = m_caster->GetDistance(go->GetPositionX(), go->GetPositionY(), go->GetPositionZ());
2547 if (dist < 5.0f)
2548 dist = 5.0f;
2549 target.timeDelay = uint64(floor(dist / m_spellInfo->Speed * 1000.0f));
2550 if (m_delayMoment == 0 || m_delayMoment > target.timeDelay)
2551 m_delayMoment = target.timeDelay;
2552 }
2553 else
2554 target.timeDelay = 0LL;
2555
2556 // Add target to list
2557 m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.push_back(target);
2558}
2559
2560void Spell::AddItemTarget(Item* item, uint32 effectMask)
2561{
2562 for (uint32 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2563 if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].IsEffect())
2564 effectMask &= ~(1 << effIndex);
2565
2566 // no effects left
2567 if (!effectMask)
2568 return;
2569
2570 // Lookup target in already in list
2571 for (std::list<ItemTargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueItemInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueItemInfo.end(); ++ihit)
2572 {
2573 if (item == ihit->item) // Found in list
2574 {
2575 ihit->effectMask |= effectMask; // Add only effect mask
2576 return;
2577 }
2578 }
2579
2580 // This is new target add data
2581
2582 ItemTargetInfo target;
2583 target.item = item;
2584 target.effectMask = effectMask;
2585
2586 m_UniqueItemInfo.push_back(target);
2587}
2588
2589void Spell::AddDestTarget(SpellDestination const& dest, uint32 effIndex)
2590{
2591 m_destTargets[effIndex] = dest;
2592}
2593
2594void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(TargetInfo* target)
2595{
2596 if (!target || target->processed)
2597 return;
2598
2599 target->processed = true; // Target checked in apply effects procedure
2600
2601 // Get mask of effects for target
2602 uint8 mask = target->effectMask;
2603
2604 Unit* effectUnit = m_caster->GetGUID() == target->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, target->targetGUID);
2605 if (!effectUnit && !target->targetGUID.IsPlayer()) // only players may be targeted across maps
2606 return;
2607
2608 if (!effectUnit || m_spellInfo->Id == 45927)
2609 {
2610 uint8 farMask = 0;
2611 // create far target mask
2612 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2613 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsFarUnitTargetEffect())
2614 if ((1 << i) & mask)
2615 farMask |= (1 << i);
2616
2617 if (!farMask)
2618 return;
2619 // find unit in world
2620 // Xinef: FindUnit Access without Map check!!! Intended
2621 effectUnit = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(target->targetGUID);
2622 if (!effectUnit)
2623 return;
2624
2625 // do far effects on the unit
2626 // can't use default call because of threading, do stuff as fast as possible
2627 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2628 if (farMask & (1 << i))
2629 HandleEffects(effectUnit, nullptr, nullptr, i, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
2630 return;
2631 }
2632
2633 if (effectUnit->IsAlive() != target->alive)
2634 return;
2635
2636 // Xinef: absorb delayed projectiles for 500ms
2637 if (getState() == SPELL_STATE_DELAYED && !m_spellInfo->IsTargetingArea() && !m_spellInfo->IsPositive() &&
2638 (GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() - target->timeDelay) <= effectUnit->m_lastSanctuaryTime && GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() < (effectUnit->m_lastSanctuaryTime + 500) &&
2639 effectUnit->FindMap() && !effectUnit->FindMap()->IsDungeon()
2640 )
2641 return; // No missinfo in that case
2642
2643 // Get original caster (if exist) and calculate damage/healing from him data
2644 Unit* caster = m_originalCaster ? m_originalCaster : m_caster;
2645
2646 // Skip if m_originalCaster not avaiable
2647 if (!caster)
2648 return;
2649
2650 SpellMissInfo missInfo = target->missCondition;
2651
2652 // Need init unitTarget by default unit (can changed in code on reflect)
2653 // Or on missInfo != SPELL_MISS_NONE unitTarget undefined (but need in trigger subsystem)
2654 unitTarget = effectUnit;
2655
2656 // Reset damage/healing counter
2657 m_damage = target->damage;
2658 m_healing = -target->damage;
2659
2660 m_spellAura = nullptr; // Set aura to null for every target-make sure that pointer is not used for unit without aura applied
2661
2662 PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
2663 CallScriptBeforeHitHandlers(missInfo);
2664
2665 //Spells with this flag cannot trigger if effect is casted on self
2666 bool canEffectTrigger = !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_CASTER_PROCS) && unitTarget->CanProc() && (CanExecuteTriggersOnHit(mask) || missInfo == SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2);
2667 bool reflectedSpell = missInfo == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT;
2668 Unit* spellHitTarget = nullptr;
2669
2670 if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_NONE) // In case spell hit target, do all effect on that target
2671 spellHitTarget = unitTarget;
2672 else if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT) // In case spell reflect from target, do all effect on caster (if hit)
2673 {
2674 missInfo = target->reflectResult;
2675 if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_NONE) // If reflected spell hit caster -> do all effect on him
2676 {
2677 spellHitTarget = m_caster;
2678 unitTarget = m_caster;
2679 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2680 m_caster->ToCreature()->LowerPlayerDamageReq(target->damage);
2681 }
2682 }
2683
2684 if (spellHitTarget)
2685 {
2686 SpellMissInfo missInfo2 = DoSpellHitOnUnit(spellHitTarget, mask, target->scaleAura);
2687 if (missInfo2 != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
2688 {
2689 if (missInfo2 != SPELL_MISS_MISS)
2690 m_caster->SendSpellMiss(spellHitTarget, m_spellInfo->Id, missInfo2);
2691 m_damage = 0;
2692 spellHitTarget = nullptr;
2693
2694 // Xinef: if missInfo2 is MISS_EVADE, override base missinfo data
2695 if (missInfo2 == SPELL_MISS_EVADE)
2696 missInfo = SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
2697 }
2698 }
2699
2700 // Do not take combo points on dodge and miss
2701 if (missInfo != SPELL_MISS_NONE && m_needComboPoints && m_targets.GetUnitTargetGUID() == target->targetGUID)
2702 {
2703 m_needComboPoints = false;
2704 // Restore spell mods for a miss/dodge/parry Cold Blood
2705 // TODO: check how broad this rule should be
2706 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_MISS || missInfo == SPELL_MISS_DODGE || missInfo == SPELL_MISS_PARRY))
2707 m_caster->ToPlayer()->RestoreSpellMods(this, 14177);
2708 }
2709
2710 // Fill base trigger info
2711 uint32 procAttacker = m_procAttacker;
2712 uint32 procVictim = m_procVictim;
2713 uint32 procEx = m_procEx;
2714
2715 // Trigger info was not filled in spell::preparedatafortriggersystem - we do it now
2716 if (canEffectTrigger && !procAttacker && !procVictim)
2717 {
2718 bool positive = true;
2719 if (m_damage > 0)
2720 positive = false;
2721 else if (!m_healing)
2722 {
2723 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
2724 // If at least one effect negative spell is negative hit
2725 // Xinef: if missInfo is immune state check all effects to properly determine positiveness of spell
2726 if ((missInfo == SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2 || (mask & (1 << i))) && !m_spellInfo->IsPositiveEffect(i))
2727 {
2728 positive = false;
2729 break;
2730 }
2731 }
2732 switch (m_spellInfo->DmgClass)
2733 {
2734 case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC:
2735 if (positive)
2736 {
2737 procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_POS;
2738 procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_POS;
2739 }
2740 else
2741 {
2742 procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
2743 procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
2744 }
2745 break;
2746 case SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE:
2747 if (positive)
2748 {
2749 procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_POS;
2750 procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_POS;
2751 }
2752 else
2753 {
2754 procAttacker |= PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
2755 procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
2756 }
2757 break;
2758 }
2759 }
2760 CallScriptOnHitHandlers();
2761
2762 // All calculated do it!
2763 // Do healing and triggers
2764 if (m_healing > 0)
2765 {
2766 bool crit = target->crit;
2767 uint32 addhealth = m_healing;
2768
2769 if (crit)
2770 {
2771 procEx |= PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT;
2772 addhealth = Unit::SpellCriticalHealingBonus(caster, m_spellInfo, addhealth, nullptr);
2773 }
2774 else
2775 procEx |= PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
2776
2777 HealInfo healInfo(caster, unitTarget, addhealth, m_spellInfo, m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask());
2778
2779 // Xinef: override with forced crit, only visual result
2780 if (GetSpellValue()->ForcedCritResult)
2781 {
2782 crit = true;
2783 procEx |= PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT;
2784 }
2785
2786 int32 gain = caster->HealBySpell(healInfo, crit);
2787 unitTarget->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(caster, float(gain) * 0.5f, m_spellInfo);
2788 m_healing = gain;
2789
2790 // Xinef: if heal acutally healed something, add no overheal flag
2791 if (m_healing)
2792 procEx |= PROC_EX_NO_OVERHEAL;
2793
2794 // Do triggers for unit (reflect triggers passed on hit phase for correct drop charge)
2795 if (canEffectTrigger)
2796 Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(caster, unitTarget, procAttacker, procVictim, procEx, addhealth, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo,
2797 m_triggeredByAuraSpell.effectIndex, this, nullptr, &healInfo);
2798 }
2799 // Do damage and triggers
2800 else if (m_damage > 0)
2801 {
2802 caster->SetLastDamagedTargetGuid(unitTarget->GetGUID());
2803
2804 // Fill base damage struct (unitTarget - is real spell target)
2805 SpellNonMeleeDamage damageInfo(caster, unitTarget, m_spellInfo, m_spellSchoolMask);
2806
2807 // Add bonuses and fill damageInfo struct
2808 // Dancing Rune Weapon...
2809 if (m_caster->GetEntry() == 27893)
2810 {
2811 if (Unit* owner = m_caster->GetOwner())
2812 owner->CalculateSpellDamageTaken(&damageInfo, m_damage, m_spellInfo, m_attackType, target->crit);
2813 }
2814 else
2815 caster->CalculateSpellDamageTaken(&damageInfo, m_damage, m_spellInfo, m_attackType, target->crit);
2816
2817 // xinef: override miss info after absorb / block calculations
2818 if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_NONE && damageInfo.damage == 0)
2819 {
2820 //if (damageInfo.absorb > 0)
2821 // missInfo = SPELL_MISS_ABSORB;
2822 if (damageInfo.blocked)
2823 missInfo = SPELL_MISS_BLOCK;
2824 }
2825
2826 // Xinef: override with forced crit, only visual result
2827 if (GetSpellValue()->ForcedCritResult)
2828 {
2829 damageInfo.HitInfo |= SPELL_HIT_TYPE_CRIT;
2830 }
2831
2832 Unit::DealDamageMods(damageInfo.target, damageInfo.damage, &damageInfo.absorb);
2833
2834 // xinef: health leech handling
2835 if (m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_HEALTH_LEECH))
2836 {
2837 uint8 effIndex = EFFECT_0;
2838 for (; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
2839 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEALTH_LEECH)
2840 break;
2841
2842 float healMultiplier = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValueMultiplier(m_originalCaster, this);
2843
2844 // get max possible damage, don't count overkill for heal
2845 uint32 healthGain = uint32(-unitTarget->GetHealthGain(-int32(damageInfo.damage)) * healMultiplier);
2846
2847 if (m_caster->IsAlive())
2848 {
2849 healthGain = m_caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(m_caster, m_spellInfo, healthGain, HEAL, effIndex);
2850 healthGain = m_caster->SpellHealingBonusTaken(m_caster, m_spellInfo, healthGain, HEAL);
2851
2852 HealInfo healInfo(m_caster, m_caster, healthGain, m_spellInfo, m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask());
2853 m_caster->HealBySpell(healInfo);
2854 }
2855 }
2856
2857 // Send log damage message to client
2858 caster->SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(&damageInfo);
2859 // Xinef: send info to target about reflect
2860 if (reflectedSpell)
2861 effectUnit->SendSpellNonMeleeReflectLog(&damageInfo, effectUnit);
2862
2863 procEx |= createProcExtendMask(&damageInfo, missInfo);
2864 procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_DAMAGE;
2865
2866 caster->DealSpellDamage(&damageInfo, true, this);
2867
2868 // do procs after damage, eg healing effects
2869 // no need to check if target is alive, done in procdamageandspell
2870
2871 // Do triggers for unit (reflect triggers passed on hit phase for correct drop charge)
2872 if (canEffectTrigger)
2873 {
2874 DamageInfo dmgInfo(damageInfo, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
2875 Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(caster, unitTarget, procAttacker, procVictim, procEx, damageInfo.damage, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo,
2876 m_triggeredByAuraSpell.effectIndex, this, &dmgInfo);
2877
2878 if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CANCELS_AUTO_ATTACK_COMBAT) == 0 &&
2879 m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_SUPRESS_WEAPON_PROCS) == 0 && (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE || m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED))
2880 caster->ToPlayer()->CastItemCombatSpell(unitTarget, m_attackType, procVictim, procEx);
2881 }
2882
2883 m_damage = damageInfo.damage;
2884 }
2885 // Passive spell hits/misses or active spells only misses (only triggers)
2886 else
2887 {
2888 // Fill base damage struct (unitTarget - is real spell target)
2889 SpellNonMeleeDamage damageInfo(caster, unitTarget, m_spellInfo, m_spellSchoolMask);
2890 procEx |= createProcExtendMask(&damageInfo, missInfo);
2891 // Do triggers for unit (reflect triggers passed on hit phase for correct drop charge)
2892 if (canEffectTrigger)
2893 {
2894 DamageInfo dmgInfo(damageInfo, NODAMAGE);
2895 Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(caster, unitTarget, procAttacker, procVictim, procEx, 0, m_attackType, m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo,
2896 m_triggeredByAuraSpell.effectIndex, this, &dmgInfo);
2897
2898 // Xinef: eg. rogue poisons can proc off cheap shot, etc. so this block should be here also
2899 // Xinef: ofc count only spells that HIT the target, little hack used to fool the system
2900 if ((procEx & PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT || procEx & PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT) && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CANCELS_AUTO_ATTACK_COMBAT) == 0 &&
2901 m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_SUPRESS_WEAPON_PROCS) == 0 && (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE || m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED))
2902 caster->ToPlayer()->CastItemCombatSpell(unitTarget, m_attackType, procVictim | PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_DAMAGE, procEx);
2903 }
2904
2905 // Failed Pickpocket, reveal rogue
2906 if (missInfo == SPELL_MISS_RESIST && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_PICKPOCKET) && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster)
2907 {
2908 m_caster->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_TALK);
2909 if (unitTarget->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled)
2910 unitTarget->ToCreature()->AI()->AttackStart(m_caster);
2911 }
2912 }
2913
2914 if (m_caster)
2915 {
2916 if (missInfo != SPELL_MISS_EVADE && !m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(effectUnit) && (!m_spellInfo->IsPositive() || m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_DISPEL)))
2917 {
2918 m_caster->CombatStart(effectUnit, !(m_spellInfo->AttributesEx3 & SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS));
2919
2920 // Unsure if there are more spells that are not supposed to stop enemy from
2921 // regenerating HP from food, so for now it stays as an ID.
2922 const uint32 SPELL_PREMEDITATION = 14183;
2923 if (m_spellInfo->Id != SPELL_PREMEDITATION)
2924 {
2925 if (!effectUnit->IsStandState())
2926 {
2927 effectUnit->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
2928 }
2929 }
2930 }
2931 }
2932
2933 if (missInfo != SPELL_MISS_EVADE && effectUnit != m_caster && m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(effectUnit) && m_spellInfo->IsPositive() &&
2934 effectUnit->IsInCombat() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_NO_THREAT))
2935 {
2936 m_caster->SetInCombatWith(effectUnit);
2937 }
2938
2939 // Check for SPELL_ATTR7_CAN_CAUSE_INTERRUPT
2940 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_CAN_CAUSE_INTERRUPT) && effectUnit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2941 caster->CastSpell(effectUnit, SPELL_INTERRUPT_NONPLAYER, true);
2942
2943 if (spellHitTarget)
2944 {
2945 //AI functions
2946 if (spellHitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2947 {
2948 if (spellHitTarget->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled)
2949 spellHitTarget->ToCreature()->AI()->SpellHit(m_caster, m_spellInfo);
2950 }
2951
2952 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled)
2953 m_caster->ToCreature()->AI()->SpellHitTarget(spellHitTarget, m_spellInfo);
2954
2955 // Needs to be called after dealing damage/healing to not remove breaking on damage auras
2956 DoTriggersOnSpellHit(spellHitTarget, mask);
2957
2958 // if target is fallged for pvp also flag caster if a player
2959 // xinef: do not flag spells with aura bind sight (no special attribute)
2960 if (effectUnit->IsPvP() && effectUnit != m_caster && effectUnit->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID() &&
2961 m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NO_PVP_FLAG))
2962 {
2963 m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdatePvP(true);
2964 }
2965
2966 CallScriptAfterHitHandlers();
2967 }
2968}
2969
2970SpellMissInfo Spell::DoSpellHitOnUnit(Unit* unit, uint32 effectMask, bool scaleAura)
2971{
2972 if (!unit || !effectMask)
2973 return SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
2974
2975 // For delayed spells immunity may be applied between missile launch and hit - check immunity for that case
2976 if (m_spellInfo->Speed && ((m_damage > 0 && unit->IsImmunedToDamage(this)) || unit->IsImmunedToSchool(this) || unit->IsImmunedToSpell(m_spellInfo, this)))
2977 {
2978 return SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
2979 }
2980
2981 // disable effects to which unit is immune
2982 SpellMissInfo returnVal = SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
2983 for (uint32 effectNumber = 0; effectNumber < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effectNumber)
2984 {
2985 if (effectMask & (1 << effectNumber))
2986 {
2987 if (unit->IsImmunedToSpellEffect(m_spellInfo, effectNumber))
2988 effectMask &= ~(1 << effectNumber);
2989 // Xinef: Buggs out polymorph
2990 // Xinef: And this is checked in MagicSpellHitResult, why we check resistance twice?
2991 // Xinef: And why we check every spell effect basing on rand and generic dispel info? some effects will be appliend and some wont?
2992 /*else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effectNumber].IsAura() && !m_spellInfo->IsPositiveEffect(effectNumber))
2993 {
2994 int32 debuff_resist_chance = unit->GetMaxPositiveAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DEBUFF_RESISTANCE, int32(m_spellInfo->Dispel));
2995 debuff_resist_chance += unit->GetMaxNegativeAuraModifierByMiscValue(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DEBUFF_RESISTANCE, int32(m_spellInfo->Dispel));
2996
2997 if (debuff_resist_chance > 0)
2998 if (irand(0,10000) <= (debuff_resist_chance * 100))
2999 {
3000 effectMask &= ~(1 << effectNumber);
3001 returnVal = SPELL_MISS_RESIST;
3002 }
3003 }*/
3004 }
3005 }
3006 if (!effectMask)
3007 return returnVal;
3008
3009 if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3010 {
3011 unit->ToPlayer()->StartTimedAchievement(ACHIEVEMENT_TIMED_TYPE_SPELL_TARGET, m_spellInfo->Id);
3012 unit->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET, m_spellInfo->Id, 0, m_caster);
3013 unit->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_BE_SPELL_TARGET2, m_spellInfo->Id, 0, m_caster);
3014 }
3015
3016 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3017 {
3018 m_caster->ToPlayer()->StartTimedAchievement(ACHIEVEMENT_TIMED_TYPE_SPELL_CASTER, m_spellInfo->Id);
3019 m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL2, m_spellInfo->Id, 0, unit);
3020 }
3021
3022 if (m_caster != unit)
3023 {
3024 // Recheck UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE for delayed spells
3025 // Xinef: Also check evade state
3026 if (m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f)
3027 {
3028 if (unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && unit->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode())
3029 return SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
3030
3031 if (unit->HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE) && unit->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
3032 return SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
3033 }
3034
3035 if (m_caster->_IsValidAttackTarget(unit, m_spellInfo) && /*Intervene Trigger*/ m_spellInfo->Id != 59667)
3036 {
3037 unit->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_HITBYSPELL);
3038 }
3039 else if (m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(unit))
3040 {
3041 // for delayed spells ignore negative spells (after duel end) for friendly targets
3042 // TODO: this cause soul transfer bugged
3043 if(!IsTriggered() && m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f && unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_spellInfo->IsPositive())
3044 return SPELL_MISS_EVADE;
3045
3046 // assisting case, healing and resurrection
3047 if (unit->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ATTACK_PLAYER))
3048 {
3049 m_caster->SetContestedPvP();
3050 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NO_PVP_FLAG))
3051 m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdatePvP(true);
3052 }
3053
3054 // xinef: triggered spells should not prolong combat
3055 if (unit->IsInCombat() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS) && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
3056 {
3057 m_caster->SetInCombatState(unit->GetCombatTimer() > 0, unit);
3058 unit->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(m_caster, 0.0f);
3059 }
3060 }
3061 }
3062
3063 uint8 aura_effmask = 0;
3064 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3065 if (effectMask & (1 << i) && m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsUnitOwnedAuraEffect())
3066 aura_effmask |= 1 << i;
3067
3068 Unit* originalCaster = GetOriginalCaster();
3069 if (!originalCaster)
3070 originalCaster = m_caster;
3071
3072 // Get Data Needed for Diminishing Returns, some effects may have multiple auras, so this must be done on spell hit, not aura add
3073 // Xinef: Do not increase diminishing level for self cast
3074 m_diminishGroup = GetDiminishingReturnsGroupForSpell(m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo);
3075 // xinef: do not increase diminish level for bosses (eg. Void Reaver silence is never diminished)
3076 if (((m_spellFlags & SPELL_FLAG_REFLECTED) && !(unit->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_REFLECT_SPELLS))) || (aura_effmask && m_diminishGroup && unit != m_caster && (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || !m_caster->ToCreature()->isWorldBoss())))
3077 {
3078 m_diminishLevel = unit->GetDiminishing(m_diminishGroup);
3079 DiminishingReturnsType type = GetDiminishingReturnsGroupType(m_diminishGroup);
3080
3081 uint32 flagsExtra = unit->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT ? unit->ToCreature()->GetCreatureTemplate()->flags_extra : 0;
3082
3083 // Increase Diminishing on unit, current informations for actually casts will use values above
3084 if ((type == DRTYPE_PLAYER && (unit->IsCharmedOwnedByPlayerOrPlayer() || flagsExtra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_ALL_DIMINISH ||
3085 (m_diminishGroup == DIMINISHING_TAUNT && (flagsExtra & CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_OBEYS_TAUNT_DIMINISHING_RETURNS)))) || type == DRTYPE_ALL)
3086 {
3087 // Do not apply diminish return if caster is NPC
3088 if (m_caster->IsCharmedOwnedByPlayerOrPlayer())
3089 {
3090 unit->IncrDiminishing(m_diminishGroup);
3091 }
3092 }
3093 }
3094
3095 if (m_caster != unit && m_caster->IsHostileTo(unit) && !m_spellInfo->IsPositive() && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_DONT_BREAK_STEALTH))
3096 {
3097 unit->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH);
3098 }
3099
3100 if (aura_effmask)
3101 {
3102 // Select rank for aura with level requirements only in specific cases
3103 // Unit has to be target only of aura effect, both caster and target have to be players, target has to be other than unit target
3104 SpellInfo const* aurSpellInfo = m_spellInfo;
3105 int32 basePoints[3];
3106 if (scaleAura)
3107 {
3108 aurSpellInfo = m_spellInfo->GetAuraRankForLevel(unitTarget->getLevel());
3109 ASSERT(aurSpellInfo);
3110 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3111 {
3112 basePoints[i] = aurSpellInfo->Effects[i].BasePoints;
3113 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect != aurSpellInfo->Effects[i].Effect)
3114 {
3115 aurSpellInfo = m_spellInfo;
3116 break;
3117 }
3118 }
3119 }
3120
3121 if (m_originalCaster)
3122 {
3123 bool refresh = false;
3124 bool refreshPeriodic = m_spellInfo->StackAmount < 2 && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_NO_PERIODIC_RESET);
3125 m_spellAura = Aura::TryRefreshStackOrCreate(aurSpellInfo, effectMask, unit, m_originalCaster,
3126 (aurSpellInfo == m_spellInfo) ? &m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[0] : &basePoints[0], m_CastItem, ObjectGuid::Empty, &refresh, refreshPeriodic);
3127
3128 // xinef: if aura was not refreshed, add proc ex
3129 if (!refresh)
3130 m_procEx |= PROC_EX_NO_AURA_REFRESH;
3131
3132 if (m_spellAura)
3133 {
3134 // Set aura stack amount to desired value
3135 if (m_spellValue->AuraStackAmount > 1)
3136 {
3137 if (!refresh)
3138 m_spellAura->SetStackAmount(m_spellValue->AuraStackAmount);
3139 else
3140 m_spellAura->ModStackAmount(m_spellValue->AuraStackAmount);
3141 }
3142
3143 // Now Reduce spell duration using data received at spell hit
3144 int32 duration = m_spellAura->GetMaxDuration();
3145 int32 limitduration = GetDiminishingReturnsLimitDuration(m_diminishGroup, aurSpellInfo);
3146
3147 // Xinef: if unit == caster - test versus original unit if available
3148 float diminishMod = 1.0f;
3149 if (unit == m_caster && m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
3150 diminishMod = m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->ApplyDiminishingToDuration(m_diminishGroup, duration, m_originalCaster, m_diminishLevel, limitduration);
3151 else
3152 diminishMod = unit->ApplyDiminishingToDuration(m_diminishGroup, duration, m_originalCaster, m_diminishLevel, limitduration);
3153
3154 // unit is immune to aura if it was diminished to 0 duration
3155 if (diminishMod == 0.0f)
3156 {
3157 m_spellAura->Remove();
3158 bool found = false;
3159 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3160 if (effectMask & (1 << i) && m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect != SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA)
3161 found = true;
3162 if (!found)
3163 return SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE;
3164 }
3165 else
3166 {
3167 ((UnitAura*)m_spellAura)->SetDiminishGroup(m_diminishGroup);
3168
3169 bool positive = m_spellAura->GetSpellInfo()->IsPositive();
3170 if (AuraApplication* aurApp = m_spellAura->GetApplicationOfTarget(m_originalCaster->GetGUID()))
3171 positive = aurApp->IsPositive();
3172
3173 duration = m_originalCaster->ModSpellDuration(aurSpellInfo, unit, duration, positive, effectMask);
3174
3175 // xinef: haste affects duration of those spells twice
3176 if (m_originalCaster->HasAuraTypeWithAffectMask(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HASTE, aurSpellInfo) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_SPELL_HASTE_AFFECTS_PERIODIC))
3177 duration = int32(duration * m_originalCaster->GetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED));
3178
3179 if (m_spellValue->AuraDuration != 0)
3180 {
3181 if (m_spellAura->GetMaxDuration() != -1)
3182 {
3183 m_spellAura->SetMaxDuration(m_spellValue->AuraDuration);
3184 }
3185
3186 m_spellAura->SetDuration(m_spellValue->AuraDuration);
3187 }
3188 else if (duration != m_spellAura->GetMaxDuration())
3189 {
3190 m_spellAura->SetMaxDuration(duration);
3191 m_spellAura->SetDuration(duration);
3192 }
3193
3194 // xinef: apply relic cooldown, imo best place to add this
3195 if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->InventoryType == INVTYPE_RELIC && m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
3196 m_caster->AddSpellCooldown(SPELL_RELIC_COOLDOWN, m_CastItem->GetEntry(), duration);
3197
3198 m_spellAura->SetTriggeredByAuraSpellInfo(m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo);
3199 m_spellAura->_RegisterForTargets();
3200 }
3201 }
3202 }
3203 }
3204
3205 int8 sanct_effect = -1;
3206
3207 for (uint32 effectNumber = 0; effectNumber < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effectNumber)
3208 {
3209 // handle sanctuary effects after aura apply!
3210 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effectNumber].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_SANCTUARY)
3211 {
3212 sanct_effect = effectNumber;
3213 continue;
3214 }
3215
3216 if (effectMask & (1 << effectNumber))
3217 HandleEffects(unit, nullptr, nullptr, effectNumber, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
3218 }
3219
3220 if( sanct_effect >= 0 && (effectMask & (1 << sanct_effect)) )
3221 HandleEffects(unit, nullptr, nullptr, sanct_effect, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
3222
3223 return SPELL_MISS_NONE;
3224}
3225
3226void Spell::DoTriggersOnSpellHit(Unit* unit, uint8 effMask)
3227{
3228 // Apply additional spell effects to target
3229 // TODO: move this code to scripts
3230 if (m_preCastSpell)
3231 {
3232 // Paladin immunity shields
3233 if (m_preCastSpell == 61988)
3234 {
3235 // Cast Forbearance
3236 m_caster->CastSpell(unit, 25771, true);
3237 // Cast Avenging Wrath Marker
3238 unit->CastSpell(unit, 61987, true);
3239 }
3240
3241 // Avenging Wrath
3242 if (m_preCastSpell == 61987)
3243 // Cast the serverside immunity shield marker
3244 m_caster->CastSpell(unit, 61988, true);
3245
3246 // Fearie Fire (Feral) - damage
3247 if( m_preCastSpell == 60089 )
3248 m_caster->CastSpell(unit, m_preCastSpell, true);
3249 else if (sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_preCastSpell))
3250 // Blizz seems to just apply aura without bothering to cast
3251 m_caster->AddAura(m_preCastSpell, unit);
3252 }
3253
3254 // handle SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER auras
3255 // this is executed after spell proc spells on target hit
3256 // spells are triggered for each hit spell target
3257 // info confirmed with retail sniffs of permafrost and shadow weaving
3258 if (!m_hitTriggerSpells.empty())
3259 {
3260 int _duration = 0;
3261 for (HitTriggerSpellList::const_iterator i = m_hitTriggerSpells.begin(); i != m_hitTriggerSpells.end(); ++i)
3262 {
3263 if (CanExecuteTriggersOnHit(effMask, i->triggeredByAura) && roll_chance_i(i->chance))
3264 {
3265 m_caster->CastSpell(unit, i->triggeredSpell->Id, true);
3266 LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell {} triggered spell {} by SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER aura", m_spellInfo->Id, i->triggeredSpell->Id);
3267
3268 // SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER auras shouldn't trigger auras without duration
3269 // set duration of current aura to the triggered spell
3270 if (i->triggeredSpell->GetDuration() == -1)
3271 {
3272 if (Aura* triggeredAur = unit->GetAura(i->triggeredSpell->Id, m_caster->GetGUID()))
3273 {
3274 // get duration from aura-only once
3275 if (!_duration)
3276 {
3277 Aura* aur = unit->GetAura(m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetGUID());
3278 _duration = aur ? aur->GetDuration() : -1;
3279 }
3280 triggeredAur->SetDuration(_duration);
3281 }
3282 }
3283 }
3284 }
3285 }
3286
3287 // trigger linked auras remove/apply
3288 // TODO: remove/cleanup this, as this table is not documented and people are doing stupid things with it
3289 if (std::vector<int32> const* spellTriggered = sSpellMgr->GetSpellLinked(m_spellInfo->Id + SPELL_LINK_HIT))
3290 {
3291 for (std::vector<int32>::const_iterator i = spellTriggered->begin(); i != spellTriggered->end(); ++i)
3292 if (*i < 0)
3293 {
3294 unit->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(-(*i));
3295 }
3296 else
3297 {
3298 unit->CastSpell(unit, *i, true, 0, 0, m_caster->GetGUID());
3299 }
3300 }
3301}
3302
3303void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(GOTargetInfo* target)
3304{
3305 if (target->processed) // Check target
3306 return;
3307 target->processed = true; // Target checked in apply effects procedure
3308
3309 uint32 effectMask = target->effectMask;
3310 if (!effectMask)
3311 return;
3312
3313 GameObject* go = m_caster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(target->targetGUID);
3314 if (!go)
3315 return;
3316
3317 PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
3318 CallScriptBeforeHitHandlers(SPELL_MISS_NONE);
3319
3320 for (uint32 effectNumber = 0; effectNumber < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effectNumber)
3321 if (effectMask & (1 << effectNumber))
3322 HandleEffects(nullptr, nullptr, go, effectNumber, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
3323
3324 // xinef: inform ai about spellhit
3325 go->AI()->SpellHit(m_caster, m_spellInfo);
3326
3327 CallScriptOnHitHandlers();
3328
3329 CallScriptAfterHitHandlers();
3330}
3331
3332void Spell::DoAllEffectOnTarget(ItemTargetInfo* target)
3333{
3334 uint32 effectMask = target->effectMask;
3335 if (!target->item || !effectMask)
3336 return;
3337
3338 PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
3339 CallScriptBeforeHitHandlers(SPELL_MISS_NONE);
3340
3341 for (uint32 effectNumber = 0; effectNumber < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effectNumber)
3342 if (effectMask & (1 << effectNumber))
3343 HandleEffects(nullptr, target->item, nullptr, effectNumber, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET);
3344
3345 CallScriptOnHitHandlers();
3346
3347 CallScriptAfterHitHandlers();
3348}
3349
3350bool Spell::UpdateChanneledTargetList()
3351{
3352 // Not need check return true
3353 if (m_channelTargetEffectMask == 0)
3354 return true;
3355
3356 uint8 channelTargetEffectMask = m_channelTargetEffectMask;
3357 uint8 channelAuraMask = 0;
3358 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3359 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA)
3360 channelAuraMask |= 1 << i;
3361
3362 channelAuraMask &= channelTargetEffectMask;
3363
3364 float range = 0;
3365 if (channelAuraMask)
3366 {
3367 range = m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange(m_spellInfo->IsPositive());
3368 if (range == 0)
3369 for(int i = EFFECT_0; i <= EFFECT_2; ++i)
3370 if (channelAuraMask & (1 << i) && m_spellInfo->Effects[i].RadiusEntry)
3371 {
3372 range = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].CalcRadius(nullptr, nullptr);
3373 break;
3374 }
3375
3376 if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
3377 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_RANGE, range, this);
3378
3379 // xinef: add little tolerance level
3380 range += std::min(3.0f, range * 0.1f); // 10% but no more than 3yd
3381 }
3382
3383 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3384 {
3385 if (ihit->missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE && (channelTargetEffectMask & ihit->effectMask))
3386 {
3387 Unit* unit = m_caster->GetGUID() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID);
3388
3389 if (!unit)
3390 continue;
3391
3392 if (IsValidDeadOrAliveTarget(unit))
3393 {
3394 if (channelAuraMask & ihit->effectMask)
3395 {
3396 if (AuraApplication* aurApp = unit->GetAuraApplication(m_spellInfo->Id, m_originalCasterGUID))
3397 {
3398 if (m_caster != unit)
3399 {
3400 if (!m_caster->IsWithinDistInMap(unit, range))
3401 {
3402 ihit->effectMask &= ~aurApp->GetEffectMask();
3403 unit->RemoveAura(aurApp);
3404 continue;
3405 }
3406 // Xinef: Update Orientation server side (non players wont sent appropriate packets)
3407 else if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_TRACK_TARGET_IN_CHANNEL))
3408 m_caster->UpdateOrientation(m_caster->GetAngle(unit));
3409 }
3410 }
3411 else // aura is dispelled
3412 continue;
3413 }
3414
3415 channelTargetEffectMask &= ~ihit->effectMask; // remove from need alive mask effect that have alive target
3416 }
3417 }
3418 }
3419
3420 // Xinef: not all effects are covered, remove applications from all targets
3421 if (channelTargetEffectMask != 0)
3422 {
3423 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3424 if (ihit->missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE && (channelAuraMask & ihit->effectMask))
3425 if (Unit* unit = m_caster->GetGUID() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID))
3426 if (IsValidDeadOrAliveTarget(unit))
3427 if (AuraApplication* aurApp = unit->GetAuraApplication(m_spellInfo->Id, m_originalCasterGUID))
3428 {
3429 ihit->effectMask &= ~aurApp->GetEffectMask();
3430 unit->RemoveAura(aurApp);
3431 }
3432 }
3433
3434 // is all effects from m_needAliveTargetMask have alive targets
3435 return channelTargetEffectMask == 0;
3436}
3437
3438SpellCastResult Spell::prepare(SpellCastTargets const* targets, AuraEffect const* triggeredByAura)
3439{
3440 if (m_CastItem)
3441 {
3442 m_castItemGUID = m_CastItem->GetGUID();
3443 }
3444 else
3445 {
3446 m_castItemGUID = ObjectGuid::Empty;
3447 }
3448
3449 InitExplicitTargets(*targets);
3450
3451 if (!sScriptMgr->CanPrepare(this, targets, triggeredByAura))
3452 {
3453 finish(false);
3454 return SPELL_FAILED_UNKNOWN;
3455 }
3456
3457 // Fill aura scaling information
3458 if (sScriptMgr->CanScalingEverything(this) || m_caster->IsTotem() || (m_caster->IsControlledByPlayer() && !m_spellInfo->IsPassive() && m_spellInfo->SpellLevel && !m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_AURA_SCALING)))
3459 {
3460 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3461 {
3462 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA ||
3463 m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_PARTY ||
3464 m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_RAID)
3465 {
3466 // Change aura with ranks only if basepoints are taken from spellInfo and aura is positive
3467 if (m_spellInfo->IsPositiveEffect(i))
3468 {
3469 m_auraScaleMask |= (1 << i);
3470 if (m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[i] != m_spellInfo->Effects[i].BasePoints)
3471 {
3472 m_auraScaleMask = 0;
3473 break;
3474 }
3475 }
3476 }
3477 }
3478 }
3479
3480 m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_PREPARING;
3481
3482 if (triggeredByAura)
3483 {
3484 m_triggeredByAuraSpell.Init(triggeredByAura);
3485 }
3486
3487 // create and add update event for this spell
3488 _spellEvent = new SpellEvent(this);
3489 m_caster->m_Events.AddEvent(_spellEvent, m_caster->m_Events.CalculateTime(1));
3490
3491 if (DisableMgr::IsDisabledFor(DISABLE_TYPE_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster))
3492 {
3493 SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_UNAVAILABLE);
3494 finish(false);
3495 return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_UNAVAILABLE;
3496 }
3497
3498 //Prevent casting at cast another spell (ServerSide check)
3499 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_IN_PROGRESS) && m_caster->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, true, true, m_spellInfo->Id == 75) && m_cast_count)
3500 {
3501 SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS);
3502 finish(false);
3503 return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS;
3504 }
3505
3506 LoadScripts();
3507
3508 OnSpellLaunch();
3509
3510 m_powerCost = m_CastItem ? 0 : m_spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(m_caster, m_spellSchoolMask, this);
3511
3512 // Set combo point requirement
3513 if ((_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_COMBO_POINTS) || m_CastItem)
3514 m_needComboPoints = false;
3515
3516 SpellCastResult result = CheckCast(true);
3517 if (result != SPELL_CAST_OK && !IsAutoRepeat()) //always cast autorepeat dummy for triggering
3518 {
3519 // Periodic auras should be interrupted when aura triggers a spell which can't be cast
3520 // for example bladestorm aura should be removed on disarm as of patch 3.3.5
3521 // channeled periodic spells should be affected by this (arcane missiles, penance, etc)
3522 // a possible alternative sollution for those would be validating aura target on unit state change
3523 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && triggeredByAura && triggeredByAura->IsPeriodic() && !triggeredByAura->GetBase()->IsPassive())
3524 {
3525 SendChannelUpdate(0);
3526 triggeredByAura->GetBase()->SetDuration(0);
3527 }
3528
3529 // Allows to cast melee attack spell if result is SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE
3530 if (!IsNextMeleeSwingSpell() || result != SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE)
3531 {
3532 SendCastResult(result);
3533
3534 finish(false);
3535 return result;
3536 }
3537 }
3538
3539 // Prepare data for triggers
3540 prepareDataForTriggerSystem(triggeredByAura);
3541
3542 // calculate cast time (calculated after first CheckCast check to prevent charge counting for first CheckCast fail)
3543 m_casttime = (_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_CAST_DIRECTLY) ? 0 : m_spellInfo->CalcCastTime(m_caster, this);
3544
3545 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3546 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_CASTTIME))
3547 m_casttime = 0;
3548
3549 // don't allow channeled spells / spells with cast time to be casted while moving
3550 // (even if they are interrupted on moving, spells with almost immediate effect get to have their effect processed before movement interrupter kicks in)
3551 if ((m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() || m_casttime) && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->isMoving() && m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOVEMENT && !IsTriggered())
3552 {
3553 // 1. Has casttime, 2. Or doesn't have flag to allow action during channel
3554 if (m_casttime || !m_spellInfo->IsActionAllowedChannel())
3555 {
3556 SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_MOVING);
3557 finish(false);
3558 return SPELL_FAILED_MOVING;
3559 }
3560 }
3561
3562 // xinef: if spell have nearby target entry only, do not allow to cast if no targets are found
3563 if (m_CastItem)
3564 {
3565 bool selectTargets = false;
3566 bool nearbyDest = false;
3567
3568 for (uint8 i = EFFECT_0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3569 {
3570 if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect())
3571 continue;
3572
3573 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetSelectionCategory() != TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_NEARBY || m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetCheckType() != TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY)
3574 {
3575 selectTargets = false;
3576 break;
3577 }
3578
3579 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetObjectType() == TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_DEST)
3580 {
3581 nearbyDest = true;
3582 }
3583
3584 // xinef: by default set it to false, and to true if any valid target is found
3585 selectTargets = true;
3586 }
3587
3588 if (selectTargets)
3589 {
3590 SelectSpellTargets();
3591 _spellTargetsSelected = true;
3592 bool spellFailed = false;
3593
3594 if (m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty() && m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.empty())
3595 {
3596 // no valid nearby target unit or game object found; check if nearby destination type
3597 if (nearbyDest)
3598 {
3599 if (!m_targets.HasDst())
3600 {
3601 // no valid target destination
3602 spellFailed = true;
3603 }
3604 }
3605 else
3606 {
3607 spellFailed = true;
3608 }
3609 }
3610
3611 if (spellFailed)
3612 {
3613 SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE);
3614 finish(false);
3615 return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
3616 }
3617 }
3618 }
3619
3620 // set timer base at cast time
3621 ReSetTimer();
3622
3623 LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell::prepare: spell id {} source {} caster {} customCastFlags {} mask {}", m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetEntry(), m_originalCaster ? m_originalCaster->GetEntry() : -1, _triggeredCastFlags, m_targets.GetTargetMask());
3624
3625 if (!(m_spellInfo->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_NOT_SEATED) && !(m_spellInfo->Attributes & SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_WHILE_SITTING) && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell && m_caster->IsSitState())
3626 {
3627 m_caster->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
3628 }
3629
3630 //Containers for channeled spells have to be set
3631 //TODO:Apply this to all casted spells if needed
3632 // Why check duration? 29350: channelled triggers channelled
3633 if ((_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_CAST_DIRECTLY) && (!m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() || !m_spellInfo->GetMaxDuration()))
3634 cast(true);
3635 else
3636 {
3637 // stealth must be removed at cast starting (at show channel bar)
3638 // skip triggered spell (item equip spell casting and other not explicit character casts/item uses)
3639 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAGS) && m_spellInfo->IsBreakingStealth())
3640 {
3641 // Farsight spells exception
3642 uint32 exceptSpellId = 0;
3643 if (m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_ADD_FARSIGHT))
3644 {
3645 exceptSpellId = m_spellInfo->Id;
3646 }
3647
3648 m_caster->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_CAST, exceptSpellId, m_spellInfo->Id == 75);
3649 m_caster->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_SPELL_ATTACK, exceptSpellId, m_spellInfo->Id == 75);
3650 }
3651
3652 m_caster->SetCurrentCastedSpell(this);
3653 SendSpellStart();
3654
3655 // set target for proper facing
3656 if ((m_casttime || m_spellInfo->IsChanneled()) && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SET_FACING))
3657 {
3658 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !m_caster->ToCreature()->IsInEvadeMode() &&
3659 ((m_targets.GetObjectTarget() && m_caster != m_targets.GetObjectTarget()) || m_spellInfo->IsPositive()))
3660 {
3661 // Xinef: Creature should focus to cast target if there is explicit target or self if casting positive spell
3662 // Xinef: Creature should not rotate when casting spell... based on halion behavior
3663 m_caster->ToCreature()->FocusTarget(this, m_targets.GetObjectTarget() != nullptr ? m_targets.GetObjectTarget() : m_caster);
3664 }
3665 }
3666
3667 //item: first cast may destroy item and second cast causes crash
3668 // xinef: removed !m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime
3669 // second los check failed in events
3670 // xinef: removed itemguid check, currently there is no such item in database
3671 if (!m_casttime && GetCurrentContainer() == CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL)
3672 cast(true);
3673
3674 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_GCD))
3675 TriggerGlobalCooldown();
3676 }
3677
3678 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
3679}
3680
3681void Spell::cancel(bool bySelf)
3682{
3683 if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
3684 return;
3685
3686 uint32 oldState = m_spellState;
3687 bool autoRepeat = m_autoRepeat;
3688 m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_FINISHED;
3689
3690 m_autoRepeat = false;
3691 switch (oldState)
3692 {
3693 case SPELL_STATE_PREPARING:
3694 CancelGlobalCooldown();
3695 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3696 {
3697 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->NeedSendSpectatorData())
3698 ArenaSpectator::SendCommand_Spell(m_caster->FindMap(), m_caster->GetGUID(), "SPE", m_spellInfo->Id, bySelf ? 99998 : 99999);
3699 }
3700 [[fallthrough]]; // TODO: Not sure whether the fallthrough was a mistake (forgetting a break) or intended. This should be double-checked.
3701 case SPELL_STATE_DELAYED:
3702 SendInterrupted(0);
3703 // xinef: fixes bugged gcd reset in some cases
3704 if (!autoRepeat)
3705 SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_INTERRUPTED);
3706 break;
3707
3708 case SPELL_STATE_CASTING:
3709 if (!bySelf)
3710 {
3711 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3712 if ((*ihit).missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
3713 if (Unit* unit = m_caster->GetGUID() == ihit->targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID))
3714 unit->RemoveOwnedAura(m_spellInfo->Id, m_originalCasterGUID, 0, AURA_REMOVE_BY_CANCEL);
3715
3716 SendChannelUpdate(0);
3717 SendInterrupted(0);
3718 SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_INTERRUPTED);
3719 }
3720
3721 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->NeedSendSpectatorData())
3722 ArenaSpectator::SendCommand_Spell(m_caster->FindMap(), m_caster->GetGUID(), "SPE", m_spellInfo->Id, bySelf ? 99998 : 99999);
3723
3724 // spell is canceled-take mods and clear list
3725 if (Player* player = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
3726 player->RemoveSpellMods(this);
3727
3728 m_appliedMods.clear();
3729 break;
3730 default:
3731 break;
3732 }
3733
3734 SetReferencedFromCurrent(false);
3735 if (m_selfContainer && *m_selfContainer == this)
3736 *m_selfContainer = nullptr;
3737
3738 // Do not remove current far sight object (already done in Spell::EffectAddFarsight) to prevent from reset viewpoint to player
3739 if (!(bySelf && m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_ADD_FARSIGHT)))
3740 {
3741 m_caster->RemoveDynObject(m_spellInfo->Id);
3742 }
3743
3744 if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled()) // if not channeled then the object for the current cast wasn't summoned yet
3745 m_caster->RemoveGameObject(m_spellInfo->Id, true);
3746
3747 //set state back so finish will be processed
3748 m_spellState = oldState;
3749
3750 finish(false);
3751}
3752
3753void Spell::cast(bool skipCheck)
3754{
3755 Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner();
3756 Spell* lastMod = nullptr;
3757 if (modOwner)
3758 {
3759 lastMod = modOwner->m_spellModTakingSpell;
3760 if (lastMod)
3761 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(lastMod, false);
3762 }
3763
3764 _cast(skipCheck);
3765
3766 if (lastMod)
3767 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(lastMod, true);
3768}
3769
3770void Spell::_cast(bool skipCheck)
3771{
3772 // update pointers base at GUIDs to prevent access to non-existed already object
3773 if (!UpdatePointers())
3774 {
3775 // cancel the spell if UpdatePointers() returned false, something wrong happened there
3776 cancel();
3777 return;
3778 }
3779
3780 // cancel at lost explicit target during cast
3781 if (m_targets.GetObjectTargetGUID() && !m_targets.GetObjectTarget())
3782 {
3783 cancel();
3784 return;
3785 }
3786
3787 // Xinef: implement attribute SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST, on spell cast current pet is dismissed and charms are removed
3788 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
3789 {
3790 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PET))
3791 if (Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet())
3792 m_caster->ToPlayer()->RemovePet(pet, PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT);
3793
3794 if (Unit* charm = m_caster->GetCharm())
3795 charm->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM, m_caster->GetGUID());
3796 }
3797
3798 if (Player* playerCaster = m_caster->ToPlayer())
3799 {
3800 // now that we've done the basic check, now run the scripts
3801 // should be done before the spell is actually executed
3802 sScriptMgr->OnPlayerSpellCast(playerCaster, this, skipCheck);
3803
3804 // As of 3.0.2 pets begin attacking their owner's target immediately
3805 // Let any pets know we've attacked something. Check DmgClass for harmful spells only
3806 // This prevents spells such as Hunter's Mark from triggering pet attack
3807 // xinef: take into account SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS
3808 if ((m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT) && GetSpellInfo()->DmgClass != SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE && !GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS))
3809 if (!playerCaster->m_Controlled.empty())
3810 for (Unit::ControlSet::iterator itr = playerCaster->m_Controlled.begin(); itr != playerCaster->m_Controlled.end(); ++itr)
3811 if (Unit* pet = *itr)
3812 if (pet->IsAlive() && pet->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
3813 pet->ToCreature()->AI()->OwnerAttacked(m_targets.GetUnitTarget());
3814 }
3815
3816 SetExecutedCurrently(true);
3817
3818 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SET_FACING))
3819 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_targets.GetObjectTarget() && m_caster != m_targets.GetObjectTarget())
3820 m_caster->SetInFront(m_targets.GetObjectTarget());
3821
3822 CallScriptBeforeCastHandlers();
3823
3824 Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner();
3825 // skip check if done already (for instant cast spells for example)
3826 if (!skipCheck)
3827 {
3828 SpellCastResult castResult = CheckCast(false);
3829 if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
3830 {
3831 SendCastResult(castResult);
3832 SendInterrupted(0);
3833
3834 finish(false);
3835 SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3836 return;
3837 }
3838
3839 // additional check after cast bar completes (must not be in CheckCast)
3840 // if trade not complete then remember it in trade data
3841 if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
3842 {
3843 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3844 {
3845 if (TradeData* my_trade = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTradeData())
3846 {
3847 if (!my_trade->IsInAcceptProcess())
3848 {
3849 // Spell will be casted at completing the trade. Silently ignore at this place
3850 my_trade->SetSpell(m_spellInfo->Id, m_CastItem);
3851 SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT);
3852 SendInterrupted(0);
3853
3854 finish(false);
3855 SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3856 return;
3857 }
3858 }
3859 }
3860 }
3861 }
3862
3863 if (modOwner)
3864 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, true);
3865
3866 if (!_spellTargetsSelected)
3867 SelectSpellTargets();
3868
3869 if (modOwner)
3870 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, false);
3871
3872 // Spell may be finished after target map check
3873 if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
3874 {
3875 SendInterrupted(0);
3876 finish(false);
3877 SetExecutedCurrently(false);
3878 return;
3879 }
3880
3881 if (modOwner)
3882 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, true);
3883
3884 PrepareTriggersExecutedOnHit();
3885
3886 CallScriptOnCastHandlers();
3887
3888 if (modOwner)
3889 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, false);
3890
3891 // traded items have trade slot instead of guid in m_itemTargetGUID
3892 // set to real guid to be sent later to the client
3893 m_targets.UpdateTradeSlotItem();
3894
3895 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3896 {
3897 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_ITEM) && m_CastItem)
3898 {
3899 m_caster->ToPlayer()->StartTimedAchievement(ACHIEVEMENT_TIMED_TYPE_ITEM, m_CastItem->GetEntry());
3900 m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_USE_ITEM, m_CastItem->GetEntry());
3901 }
3902
3903 m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdateAchievementCriteria(ACHIEVEMENT_CRITERIA_TYPE_CAST_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, 0, (m_targets.GetUnitTarget() ? m_targets.GetUnitTarget() : m_caster));
3904 }
3905
3906 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_POWER_AND_REAGENT_COST))
3907 {
3908 // Powers have to be taken before SendSpellGo
3909 TakePower();
3910 TakeReagents(); // we must remove reagents before HandleEffects to allow place crafted item in same slot
3911 }
3912 else if (Item* targetItem = m_targets.GetItemTarget())
3913 {
3915 if (targetItem->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
3916 TakeReagents();
3917 }
3918
3919 SendSpellCooldown();
3920
3921 // CAST SPELL
3922 if (modOwner)
3923 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, true);
3924
3925 PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
3926
3927 HandleLaunchPhase();
3928
3929 // we must send smsg_spell_go packet before m_castItem delete in TakeCastItem()...
3930 SendSpellGo();
3931
3932 if (modOwner)
3933 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, false);
3934
3935 if (m_originalCaster)
3936 {
3937 // Handle procs on cast
3938 uint32 procAttacker = m_procAttacker;
3939 if (!procAttacker)
3940 {
3941 bool IsPositive = m_spellInfo->IsPositive();
3942 if (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC)
3943 {
3944 procAttacker = IsPositive ? PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_POS : PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
3945 }
3946 else
3947 {
3948 procAttacker = IsPositive ? PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_POS : PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
3949 }
3950 }
3951
3952 uint32 procEx = PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
3953
3954 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3955 {
3956 if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
3957 {
3958 continue;
3959 }
3960
3961 if (!ihit->crit)
3962 {
3963 continue;
3964 }
3965
3966 procEx |= PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT;
3967 break;
3968 }
3969
3970 Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(m_originalCaster, m_originalCaster, procAttacker, PROC_FLAG_NONE, procEx, 1, BASE_ATTACK, m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo,
3971 m_triggeredByAuraSpell.effectIndex, this, nullptr, nullptr, PROC_SPELL_PHASE_CAST);
3972 }
3973
3974 if (modOwner)
3975 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, true);
3976
3977 bool resetAttackTimers = IsAutoActionResetSpell() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_DO_NOT_RESET_COMBAT_TIMERS);
3978 if (resetAttackTimers)
3979 {
3980 Unit::AuraEffectList const& vIgnoreReset = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_MELEE_RESET);
3981 for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = vIgnoreReset.begin(); i != vIgnoreReset.end(); ++i)
3982 {
3983 if ((*i)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
3984 {
3985 resetAttackTimers = false;
3986 break;
3987 }
3988 }
3989 }
3990
3991 // Okay, everything is prepared. Now we need to distinguish between immediate and evented delayed spells
3992 if ((m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f && !m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())/* xinef: we dont need this || m_spellInfo->Id == 14157*/)
3993 {
3994 // Remove used for cast item if need (it can be already nullptr after TakeReagents call
3995 // in case delayed spell remove item at cast delay start
3996 TakeCastItem();
3997
3998 // Okay, maps created, now prepare flags
3999 m_immediateHandled = false;
4000 m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_DELAYED;
4001 SetDelayStart(0);
4002
4003 if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING) && !m_caster->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, false, true))
4004 m_caster->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING);
4005
4006 // remove all applied mods at this point
4007 // dont allow user to use them twice in case spell did not reach current target
4008 if (modOwner)
4009 modOwner->RemoveSpellMods(this);
4010
4011 // Xinef: why do we keep focus after spell is sent to air?
4012 // Xinef: Because of this, in the middle of some animation after setting targetguid to 0 etc
4013 // Xinef: we get focused to it out of nowhere...
4014 if (Creature* creatureCaster = m_caster->ToCreature())
4015 creatureCaster->ReleaseFocus(this);
4016 }
4017 else
4018 {
4019 // Immediate spell, no big deal
4020 handle_immediate();
4021 }
4022
4023 if (resetAttackTimers)
4024 {
4025 if (m_casttime == 0 && m_spellInfo->CalcCastTime())
4026 {
4027 resetAttackTimers = false;
4028 }
4029
4030 if (resetAttackTimers)
4031 {
4032 m_caster->resetAttackTimer(BASE_ATTACK);
4033
4034 if (m_caster->haveOffhandWeapon())
4035 {
4036 m_caster->resetAttackTimer(OFF_ATTACK);
4037 }
4038
4039 m_caster->resetAttackTimer(RANGED_ATTACK);
4040 }
4041 }
4042
4043 CallScriptAfterCastHandlers();
4044
4045 if (modOwner)
4046 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, false);
4047
4048 if (const std::vector<int32>* spell_triggered = sSpellMgr->GetSpellLinked(m_spellInfo->Id))
4049 {
4050 for (std::vector<int32>::const_iterator i = spell_triggered->begin(); i != spell_triggered->end(); ++i)
4051 if (*i < 0)
4052 m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(-(*i));
4053 else
4054 m_caster->CastSpell(m_targets.GetUnitTarget() ? m_targets.GetUnitTarget() : m_caster, *i, true);
4055 }
4056
4057 // Interrupt Spell casting
4058 // handle this here, in other places SpellHitTarget can be set to nullptr, if there is an error in this function
4059 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_CAN_CAUSE_INTERRUPT))
4060 if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
4061 if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4062 m_caster->CastSpell(target, 32747, true);
4063
4064 // xinef: start combat at cast for delayed spells, only for explicit target
4065 if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
4066 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || (m_caster->IsPet() && m_caster->IsControlledByPlayer()))
4067 if (GetDelayMoment() > 0 && !m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(target) && !m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_BIND_SIGHT) && (!m_spellInfo->IsPositive() || m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_DISPEL)))
4068 m_caster->CombatStartOnCast(target, !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS), GetDelayMoment() + 500); // xinef: increase this time so we dont leave and enter combat in a moment
4069
4070 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4071 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_COOLDOWN))
4072 m_caster->ToPlayer()->RemoveSpellCooldown(m_spellInfo->Id, true);
4073
4074 SetExecutedCurrently(false);
4075}
4076
4077void Spell::handle_immediate()
4078{
4079 // start channeling if applicable
4080 if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
4081 {
4082 int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
4083 if (duration > 0)
4084 {
4085 // First mod_duration then haste - see Missile Barrage
4086 // Apply duration mod
4087 if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
4088 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_DURATION, duration);
4089
4090 // Apply haste mods
4091 if (m_caster->HasAuraTypeWithAffectMask(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HASTE, m_spellInfo) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_SPELL_HASTE_AFFECTS_PERIODIC))
4092 duration = int32(duration * m_caster->GetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED));
4093
4094 m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_CASTING;
4095 m_caster->AddInterruptMask(m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags);
4096 m_channeledDuration = duration;
4097 SendChannelStart(duration);
4098 }
4099 else if (duration == -1)
4100 {
4101 m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_CASTING;
4102 m_caster->AddInterruptMask(m_spellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags);
4103 SendChannelStart(duration);
4104 }
4105 }
4106
4107 PrepareTargetProcessing();
4108
4109 // process immediate effects (items, ground, etc.) also initialize some variables
4110 _handle_immediate_phase();
4111
4112 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4113 DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ihit));
4114
4115 for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4116 DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ihit));
4117
4118 FinishTargetProcessing();
4119
4120 // spell is finished, perform some last features of the spell here
4121 _handle_finish_phase();
4122
4123 // Remove used for cast item if need (it can be already nullptr after TakeReagents call
4124 TakeCastItem();
4125
4126 // handle ammo consumption for Hunter's volley spell
4127 if (m_spellInfo->IsRangedWeaponSpell() && m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
4128 TakeAmmo();
4129
4130 if (m_spellState != SPELL_STATE_CASTING)
4131 finish(true); // successfully finish spell cast (not last in case autorepeat or channel spell)
4132}
4133
4134uint64 Spell::handle_delayed(uint64 t_offset)
4135{
4136 if (!UpdatePointers())
4137 {
4138 // finish the spell if UpdatePointers() returned false, something wrong happened there
4139 finish(false);
4140 return 0;
4141 }
4142
4143 Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner();
4144 if (modOwner)
4145 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, true);
4146
4147 uint64 next_time = m_delayTrajectory;
4148
4149 PrepareTargetProcessing();
4150
4151 if (!m_immediateHandled && m_delayTrajectory <= t_offset)
4152 {
4153 _handle_immediate_phase();
4154 m_immediateHandled = true;
4155 m_delayTrajectory = 0;
4156 next_time = 0;
4157 }
4158
4159 bool single_missile = (m_targets.HasDst());
4160
4161 // now recheck units targeting correctness (need before any effects apply to prevent adding immunity at first effect not allow apply second spell effect and similar cases)
4162 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4163 {
4164 if (ihit->processed == false)
4165 {
4166 if (single_missile || ihit->timeDelay <= t_offset)
4167 {
4168 ihit->timeDelay = t_offset;
4169 DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ihit));
4170 }
4171 else if (next_time == 0 || ihit->timeDelay < next_time)
4172 next_time = ihit->timeDelay;
4173 }
4174 }
4175
4176 // now recheck gameobject targeting correctness
4177 for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::iterator ighit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); ighit != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++ighit)
4178 {
4179 if (ighit->processed == false)
4180 {
4181 if (single_missile || ighit->timeDelay <= t_offset)
4182 DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ighit));
4183 else if (next_time == 0 || ighit->timeDelay < next_time)
4184 next_time = ighit->timeDelay;
4185 }
4186 }
4187
4188 FinishTargetProcessing();
4189
4190 if (modOwner)
4191 modOwner->SetSpellModTakingSpell(this, false);
4192
4193 // All targets passed - need finish phase
4194 if (next_time == 0)
4195 {
4196 // spell is finished, perform some last features of the spell here
4197 _handle_finish_phase();
4198
4199 finish(true); // successfully finish spell cast
4200
4201 // return zero, spell is finished now
4202 return 0;
4203 }
4204 else
4205 {
4206 // spell is unfinished, return next execution time
4207 return next_time;
4208 }
4209}
4210
4211void Spell::_handle_immediate_phase()
4212{
4213 m_spellAura = nullptr;
4214 // initialize Diminishing Returns Data
4215 m_diminishLevel = DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1;
4216 m_diminishGroup = DIMINISHING_NONE;
4217
4218 // handle some immediate features of the spell here
4219 HandleThreatSpells();
4220
4221 PrepareScriptHitHandlers();
4222
4223 // handle effects with SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT mode
4224 for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
4225 {
4226 // don't do anything for empty effect
4227 if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[j].IsEffect())
4228 continue;
4229
4230 // call effect handlers to handle destination hit
4231 HandleEffects(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, j, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT);
4232 }
4233
4234 // process items
4235 for (std::list<ItemTargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueItemInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueItemInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4236 DoAllEffectOnTarget(&(*ihit));
4237}
4238
4239void Spell::_handle_finish_phase()
4240{
4241 // Take for real after all targets are processed
4242 if (m_needComboPoints)
4243 {
4244 m_caster->ClearComboPoints();
4245 }
4246
4247 // Real add combo points from effects
4248 if (m_comboTarget && m_comboPointGain)
4249 {
4250 // remove Premed-like effects unless they were caused by ourselves
4251 // (this Aura removes the already-added CP when it expires from duration - now that we've added CP, this shouldn't happen anymore!)
4252 if (!m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_RETAIN_COMBO_POINTS))
4253 {
4254 m_caster->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_RETAIN_COMBO_POINTS);
4255 }
4256
4257 m_caster->AddComboPoints(m_comboTarget, m_comboPointGain);
4258 }
4259
4260 if (m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_ADD_EXTRA_ATTACKS))
4261 {
4262 m_caster->SetLastExtraAttackSpell(m_spellInfo->Id);
4263 }
4264
4265 if (!IsAutoRepeat() && !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell())
4266 if (m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself())
4267 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4268 {
4269 // Xinef: Properly clear infinite cooldowns in some cases
4270 if (ihit->targetGUID == m_caster->GetGUID() && ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
4271 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent())
4272 m_caster->ToPlayer()->SendCooldownEvent(m_spellInfo);
4273 }
4274
4275 // Handle procs on finish
4276 if (m_originalCaster)
4277 {
4278 uint32 procAttacker = m_procAttacker;
4279 if (!procAttacker)
4280 {
4281 bool IsPositive = m_spellInfo->IsPositive();
4282 if (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC)
4283 {
4284 procAttacker = IsPositive ? PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_POS : PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
4285 }
4286 else
4287 {
4288 procAttacker = IsPositive ? PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_POS : PROC_FLAG_DONE_SPELL_NONE_DMG_CLASS_NEG;
4289 }
4290 }
4291
4292 uint32 procEx = PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
4293 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4294 {
4295 if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
4296 {
4297 continue;
4298 }
4299
4300 if (!ihit->crit)
4301 {
4302 continue;
4303 }
4304
4305 procEx |= PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT;
4306 break;
4307 }
4308
4309 Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(m_originalCaster, m_originalCaster, procAttacker, PROC_FLAG_NONE, procEx, 1, BASE_ATTACK, m_spellInfo, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo,
4310 m_triggeredByAuraSpell.effectIndex, this, nullptr, nullptr, PROC_SPELL_PHASE_FINISH);
4311 }
4312}
4313
4314void Spell::SendSpellCooldown()
4315{
4316 // xinef: properly add creature cooldowns
4317 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4318 {
4319 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD))
4320 {
4321 // xinef: this should be added here
4322 //m_caster->AddSpellCooldown(m_spellInfo->Id, 0, 0);
4323
4324 // xinef: this adds cooldowns to vehicle spells which misses them client-side (when we overwrote dbc info in eg.)
4325 if (m_spellInfo->RequireCooldownInfo())
4326 if (Player* player = m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself())
4327 {
4328 WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_COOLDOWN, 8 + 1 + 4 + 4);
4329 data << m_caster->GetGUID();
4330 data << uint8(SPELL_COOLDOWN_FLAG_INCLUDE_GCD);
4331 data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
4332 data << uint32(m_spellInfo->RecoveryTime);
4333 player->SendDirectMessage(&data);
4334 }
4335 }
4336 return;
4337 }
4338
4339 Player* _player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
4340
4341 // mana/health/etc potions, disabled by client (until combat out as declarate)
4342 if (m_CastItem && (m_CastItem->IsPotion() || m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent()))
4343 {
4344 // need in some way provided data for Spell::finish SendCooldownEvent
4345 _player->SetLastPotionId(m_CastItem->GetEntry());
4346 return;
4347 }
4348
4349 // have infinity cooldown but set at aura apply // do not set cooldown for triggered spells (needed by reincarnation)
4350 if (m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent() || m_spellInfo->IsPassive() || ((_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD) && !m_CastItem))
4351 return;
4352
4353 _player->AddSpellAndCategoryCooldowns(m_spellInfo, m_CastItem ? m_CastItem->GetEntry() : 0, this);
4354}
4355
4356void Spell::update(uint32 difftime)
4357{
4358 // update pointers based at it's GUIDs
4359 if (!UpdatePointers())
4360 {
4361 // cancel the spell if UpdatePointers() returned false, something wrong happened there
4362 cancel();
4363 return;
4364 }
4365
4366 if (m_targets.GetUnitTargetGUID() && !m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
4367 {
4368 LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell {} is cancelled due to removal of target.", m_spellInfo->Id);
4369 cancel();
4370 return;
4371 }
4372
4373 // check if the player caster has moved before the spell finished
4374 // xinef: added preparing state (real cast, skip channels as they have other flags for this)
4375 if ((m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_timer != 0) &&
4376 m_caster->isMoving() && (m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOVEMENT) && m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_PREPARING &&
4377 (m_spellInfo->Effects[0].Effect != SPELL_EFFECT_STUCK || !m_caster->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING_FAR)))
4378 {
4379 // don't cancel for melee, autorepeat, triggered and instant spells
4380 if (!IsNextMeleeSwingSpell() && !IsAutoRepeat() && !IsTriggered())
4381 cancel(true);
4382 }
4383
4384 switch (m_spellState)
4385 {
4386 case SPELL_STATE_PREPARING:
4387 {
4388 if (m_timer > 0)
4389 {
4390 if (difftime >= (uint32)m_timer)
4391 m_timer = 0;
4392 else
4393 m_timer -= difftime;
4394 }
4395
4396 if (m_timer == 0 && !IsNextMeleeSwingSpell() && !IsAutoRepeat())
4397 // don't CheckCast for instant spells - done in spell::prepare, skip duplicate checks, needed for range checks for example
4398 cast(!m_casttime);
4399 break;
4400 }
4401 case SPELL_STATE_CASTING:
4402 {
4403 if (m_timer)
4404 {
4405 if (m_timer > 0)
4406 {
4407 if (difftime >= (uint32)m_timer)
4408 m_timer = 0;
4409 else
4410 m_timer -= difftime;
4411 }
4412 }
4413
4414 if (m_timer == 0)
4415 {
4416 SendChannelUpdate(0);
4417
4418 finish();
4419 }
4420 // Xinef: Dont update channeled target list on last tick, allow auras to update duration properly
4421 // Xinef: Added this strange check because of diffrent update routines for players / creatures
4422 // Xinef: If creature gets new aura in 800ms and in 840ms its updated with diff 270, not 40 is removed from duration but 270
4423 // Xinef: so the aura can be removed in different updates for all units
4424 else if ((m_timer < 0 || m_timer > 300) && !UpdateChanneledTargetList())
4425 {
4426 LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Channeled spell {} is removed due to lack of targets", m_spellInfo->Id);
4427 SendChannelUpdate(0);
4428 finish();
4429 }
4430 break;
4431 }
4432 default:
4433 break;
4434 }
4435}
4436
4437void Spell::finish(bool ok)
4438{
4439 if (!m_caster)
4440 return;
4441
4442 if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
4443 return;
4444 m_spellState = SPELL_STATE_FINISHED;
4445
4446 if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
4447 m_caster->UpdateInterruptMask();
4448
4449 if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING) && !m_caster->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, false, true))
4450 m_caster->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING);
4451
4452 // Unsummon summon as possessed creatures on spell cancel
4453 if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4454 {
4455 if (Unit* charm = m_caster->GetCharm())
4456 if (charm->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT
4457 && charm->ToCreature()->HasUnitTypeMask(UNIT_MASK_PUPPET)
4458 && charm->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL) == m_spellInfo->Id)
4459 ((Puppet*)charm)->UnSummon();
4460 }
4461
4462 if (Creature* creatureCaster = m_caster->ToCreature())
4463 creatureCaster->ReleaseFocus(this);
4464
4465 if (!ok)
4466 {
4467 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4468 {
4469 // Xinef: Restore spell mods in case of fail cast
4470 m_caster->ToPlayer()->RestoreSpellMods(this);
4471
4472 // Xinef: Reset cooldown event in case of fail cast
4473 if (m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent())
4474 m_caster->ToPlayer()->SendCooldownEvent(m_spellInfo, 0, 0, false);
4475 }
4476 return;
4477 }
4478
4479 // pussywizard:
4480 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_ENCOUNTER_REWARD) && m_caster->FindMap())
4481 m_caster->FindMap()->UpdateEncounterState(ENCOUNTER_CREDIT_CAST_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster);
4482
4483 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->ToCreature()->IsSummon())
4484 {
4485 // Unsummon statue
4486 uint32 spell = m_caster->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL);
4487 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spell);
4488 if (spellInfo && spellInfo->SpellIconID == 2056)
4489 {
4490 LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Statue {} is unsummoned in spell {} finish", m_caster->GetGUID().ToString(), m_spellInfo->Id);
4491 m_caster->setDeathState(JUST_DIED);
4492 return;
4493 }
4494 }
4495
4496 // potions disabled by client, send event "not in combat" if need
4497 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
4498 m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdatePotionCooldown(this);
4499
4500 // Take mods after trigger spell (needed for 14177 to affect 48664)
4501 // mods are taken only on succesfull cast and independantly from targets of the spell
4502 if (Player* player = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
4503 player->RemoveSpellMods(this);
4504
