4505 // xinef: clear reactive auras states after spell cast
4506 if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState == AURA_STATE_DEFENSE || m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState == AURA_STATE_HUNTER_PARRY)
4507 m_caster->ModifyAuraState(AuraStateType(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState), false);
4508
4509 // Stop Attack for some spells
4510 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CANCELS_AUTO_ATTACK_COMBAT))
4511 m_caster->AttackStop();
4512}
4513
4514void Spell::WriteCastResultInfo(WorldPacket& data, Player* caster, SpellInfo const* spellInfo, uint8 castCount, SpellCastResult result, SpellCustomErrors customError)
4515{
4516 data << uint8(castCount); // single cast or multi 2.3 (0/1)
4517 data << uint32(spellInfo->Id);
4518 data << uint8(result); // problem
4519 switch (result)
4520 {
4521 case SPELL_FAILED_REQUIRES_SPELL_FOCUS:
4522 data << uint32(spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus); // SpellFocusObject.dbc id
4523 break;
4524 case SPELL_FAILED_REQUIRES_AREA: // AreaTable.dbc id
4525 // hardcode areas limitation case
4526 switch (spellInfo->Id)
4527 {
4528 case 41617: // Cenarion Mana Salve
4529 case 41619: // Cenarion Healing Salve
4530 data << uint32(3905);
4531 break;
4532 case 41618: // Bottled Nethergon Energy
4533 case 41620: // Bottled Nethergon Vapor
4534 data << uint32(3842);
4535 break;
4536 case 45373: // Bloodberry Elixir
4537 data << uint32(4075);
4538 break;
4539 default: // default case (don't must be)
4540 data << uint32(0);
4541 break;
4542 }
4543 break;
4544 case SPELL_FAILED_TOTEMS:
4545 if (spellInfo->Totem[0])
4546 data << uint32(spellInfo->Totem[0]);
4547 if (spellInfo->Totem[1])
4548 data << uint32(spellInfo->Totem[1]);
4549 break;
4550 case SPELL_FAILED_TOTEM_CATEGORY:
4551 if (spellInfo->TotemCategory[0])
4552 data << uint32(spellInfo->TotemCategory[0]);
4553 if (spellInfo->TotemCategory[1])
4554 data << uint32(spellInfo->TotemCategory[1]);
4555 break;
4556 case SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS:
4557 case SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_MAINHAND:
4558 case SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_OFFHAND:
4559 data << uint32(spellInfo->EquippedItemClass);
4560 data << uint32(spellInfo->EquippedItemSubClassMask);
4561 break;
4562 case SPELL_FAILED_TOO_MANY_OF_ITEM:
4563 {
4564 uint32 item = 0;
4565 for (int8 eff = 0; eff < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; eff++)
4566 if (spellInfo->Effects[eff].ItemType)
4567 item = spellInfo->Effects[eff].ItemType;
4568 ItemTemplate const* proto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(item);
4569 if (proto && proto->ItemLimitCategory)
4570 data << uint32(proto->ItemLimitCategory);
4571 break;
4572 }
4573 case SPELL_FAILED_CUSTOM_ERROR:
4574 data << uint32(customError);
4575 break;
4576 case SPELL_FAILED_REAGENTS:
4577 {
4578 uint32 missingItem = 0;
4579 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_REAGENTS; i++)
4580 {
4581 if (spellInfo->Reagent[i] <= 0)
4582 continue;
4583
4584 uint32 itemid = spellInfo->Reagent[i];
4585 uint32 itemcount = spellInfo->ReagentCount[i];
4586
4587 if (!caster->HasItemCount(itemid, itemcount))
4588 {
4589 missingItem = itemid;
4590 break;
4591 }
4592 }
4593
4594 data << uint32(missingItem); // first missing item
4595 break;
4596 }
4597 case SPELL_FAILED_PREVENTED_BY_MECHANIC:
4598 data << uint32(spellInfo->Mechanic);
4599 break;
4600 case SPELL_FAILED_NEED_EXOTIC_AMMO:
4601 data << uint32(spellInfo->EquippedItemSubClassMask);
4602 break;
4603 case SPELL_FAILED_NEED_MORE_ITEMS:
4604 data << uint32(0); // Item entry
4605 data << uint32(0); // Count
4606 break;
4607 case SPELL_FAILED_MIN_SKILL:
4608 data << uint32(0); // SkillLine.dbc Id
4609 data << uint32(0); // Amount
4610 break;
4611 case SPELL_FAILED_FISHING_TOO_LOW:
4612 data << uint32(0); // Skill level
4613 break;
4614 default:
4615 break;
4616 }
4617}
4618
4619void Spell::SendCastResult(Player* caster, SpellInfo const* spellInfo, uint8 castCount, SpellCastResult result, SpellCustomErrors customError /*= SPELL_CUSTOM_ERROR_NONE*/)
4620{
4621 if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
4622 return;
4623
4624 WorldPacket data(SMSG_CAST_FAILED, 1 + 4 + 1);
4625 WriteCastResultInfo(data, caster, spellInfo, castCount, result, customError);
4626
4627 caster->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
4628}
4629
4630void Spell::SendCastResult(SpellCastResult result)
4631{
4632 if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
4633 return;
4634
4635 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || m_caster->IsCharmed())
4636 return;
4637
4638 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->PlayerLoading()) // don't send cast results at loading time
4639 return;
4640
4641 // Xinef: override every possible result, except for gm fail result... breaks many things and goes unnoticed because of this and makes me rage when i find this out
4642 if ((_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_DONT_REPORT_CAST_ERROR) && result != SPELL_FAILED_BM_OR_INVISGOD)
4643 result = SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
4644
4645 SendCastResult(m_caster->ToPlayer(), m_spellInfo, m_cast_count, result, m_customError);
4646}
4647
4648void Spell::SendPetCastResult(SpellCastResult result)
4649{
4650 if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK)
4651 return;
4652
4653 Unit* owner = m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwner();
4654 if (!owner)
4655 return;
4656
4657 Player* player = owner->ToPlayer();
4658 if (!player)
4659 return;
4660
4661 WorldPacket data(SMSG_PET_CAST_FAILED, 1 + 4 + 1);
4662 WriteCastResultInfo(data, player, m_spellInfo, m_cast_count, result, m_customError);
4663
4664 player->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
4665}
4666
4667void Spell::SendSpellStart()
4668{
4669 if (!IsNeedSendToClient(false))
4670 return;
4671
4672 //LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Sending SMSG_SPELL_START id={}", m_spellInfo->Id);
4673
4674 uint32 castFlags = CAST_FLAG_HAS_TRAJECTORY;
4675
4676 if (((IsTriggered() && !m_spellInfo->IsAutoRepeatRangedSpell()) || m_triggeredByAuraSpell) && !m_cast_count && !m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
4677 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PENDING;
4678
4679 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_USES_RANGED_SLOT) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NEEDS_AMMO_DATA))
4680 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PROJECTILE;
4681
4682 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || m_caster->IsPet())
4683 {
4684 switch (m_spellInfo->PowerType)
4685 {
4686 case POWER_HEALTH:
4687 break;
4688 case POWER_RUNE:
4689 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF;
4690 break;
4691 default:
4692 if (m_powerCost != 0)
4693 {
4694 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF;
4695 }
4696 break;
4697 }
4698 }
4699
4700 if (m_spellInfo->RuneCostID && m_spellInfo->PowerType == POWER_RUNE)
4701 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_NO_GCD; // not needed, but Blizzard sends it
4702
4703 PackedGuid realCasterGUID = m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4704 if (TempSummon const* tempSummon = m_caster->ToTempSummon())
4705 {
4706 if (tempSummon->GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER)
4707 {
4708 if (GameObject* casterGameobject = tempSummon->GetSummonerGameObject())
4709 {
4710 realCasterGUID = casterGameobject->GetPackGUID();
4711 }
4712 }
4713 }
4714
4715 WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_START, (8 + 8 + 4 + 4 + 2));
4716 if (m_CastItem)
4717 data << m_CastItem->GetPackGUID();
4718 else
4719 data << realCasterGUID;
4720
4721 data << realCasterGUID;
4722 data << uint8(m_cast_count); // pending spell cast?
4723 data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // spellId
4724 data << uint32(castFlags); // cast flags
4725 data << int32(m_timer); // delay?
4726
4727 m_targets.Write(data);
4728
4729 if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF)
4730 data << uint32(m_caster->GetPower((Powers)m_spellInfo->PowerType));
4731
4732 if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_PROJECTILE)
4733 WriteAmmoToPacket(&data);
4734
4735 if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_UNKNOWN_23)
4736 {
4737 data << uint32(0);
4738 data << uint32(0);
4739 }
4740
4741 m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4742
4743 if (!m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->NeedSendSpectatorData())
4744 ArenaSpectator::SendCommand_Spell(m_caster->FindMap(), m_caster->GetGUID(), "SPE", m_spellInfo->Id, m_timer);
4745}
4746
4747void Spell::SendSpellGo()
4748{
4749 // not send invisible spell casting
4750 if (!IsNeedSendToClient(true))
4751 return;
4752
4753 //LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Sending SMSG_SPELL_GO id={}", m_spellInfo->Id);
4754
4755 uint32 castFlags = CAST_FLAG_UNKNOWN_9;
4756
4757 // triggered spells with spell visual != 0
4758 if (((IsTriggered() && !m_spellInfo->IsAutoRepeatRangedSpell()) || m_triggeredByAuraSpell) && !m_cast_count && !m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
4759 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PENDING;
4760
4761 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_USES_RANGED_SLOT) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NEEDS_AMMO_DATA))
4762 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_PROJECTILE; // arrows/bullets visual
4763
4764 // should only be sent to self, but the current messaging doesn't make that possible
4765 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || m_caster->IsPet())
4766 {
4767 switch (m_spellInfo->PowerType)
4768 {
4769 case POWER_HEALTH:
4770 break;
4771 case POWER_RUNE:
4772 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF;
4773 break;
4774 default:
4775 if (m_powerCost != 0)
4776 {
4777 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF;
4778 }
4779 break;
4780 }
4781 }
4782
4783 if ((m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4784 && (m_caster->getClass() == CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
4785 && m_spellInfo->RuneCostID
4786 && m_spellInfo->PowerType == POWER_RUNE)
4787 {
4788 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_NO_GCD; // not needed, but Blizzard sends it
4789 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_RUNE_LIST; // rune cooldowns list
4790 }
4791
4792 if (m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_ACTIVATE_RUNE))
4793 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_RUNE_LIST; // rune cooldowns list
4794
4795 if (m_targets.HasTraj())
4796 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_ADJUST_MISSILE;
4797
4798 if (!m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime)
4799 castFlags |= CAST_FLAG_NO_GCD;
4800
4801 PackedGuid realCasterGUID = m_caster->GetPackGUID();
4802 if (TempSummon const* tempSummon = m_caster->ToTempSummon())
4803 {
4804 if (tempSummon->GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER)
4805 {
4806 if (GameObject* casterGameobject = tempSummon->GetSummonerGameObject())
4807 {
4808 realCasterGUID = casterGameobject->GetPackGUID();
4809 }
4810 }
4811 }
4812
4813 WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_GO, 150); // guess size
4814
4815 if (m_CastItem)
4816 data << m_CastItem->GetPackGUID();
4817 else
4818 data << realCasterGUID;
4819
4820 data << realCasterGUID;
4821 data << uint8(m_cast_count); // pending spell cast?
4822 data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // spellId
4823 data << uint32(castFlags); // cast flags
4824 data << uint32(GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count()); // timestamp
4825
4826 WriteSpellGoTargets(&data);
4827
4828 m_targets.Write(data);
4829
4830 if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_POWER_LEFT_SELF)
4831 data << uint32(m_caster->GetPower((Powers)m_spellInfo->PowerType));
4832
4833 if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_RUNE_LIST) // rune cooldowns list
4834 {
4835 //TODO: There is a crash caused by a spell with CAST_FLAG_RUNE_LIST casted by a creature
4836 //The creature is the mover of a player, so HandleCastSpellOpcode uses it as the caster
4837 if (Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer())
4838 {
4839 uint8 runeMaskInitial = m_runesState;
4840 uint8 runeMaskAfterCast = player->GetRunesState();
4841 data << uint8(runeMaskInitial); // runes state before
4842 data << uint8(runeMaskAfterCast); // runes state after
4843 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
4844 {
4845 uint8 mask = (1 << i);
4846 if (mask & runeMaskInitial && !(mask & runeMaskAfterCast)) // usable before andon cooldown now...
4847 {
4848 // float casts ensure the division is performed on floats as we need float result
4849 float baseCd = float(player->GetRuneBaseCooldown(i, true));
4850 data << uint8((baseCd - float(player->GetRuneCooldown(i))) / baseCd * 255); // rune cooldown passed
4851 }
4852 }
4853 }
4854 }
4855 if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_ADJUST_MISSILE)
4856 {
4857 data << m_targets.GetElevation();
4858 data << uint32(m_delayTrajectory ? m_delayTrajectory : m_delayMoment);
4859 }
4860
4861 if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_PROJECTILE)
4862 WriteAmmoToPacket(&data);
4863
4864 if (castFlags & CAST_FLAG_VISUAL_CHAIN)
4865 {
4866 data << uint32(0);
4867 data << uint32(0);
4868 }
4869
4870 if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
4871 {
4872 data << uint8(0);
4873 }
4874
4875 m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
4876}
4877
4878void Spell::WriteAmmoToPacket(WorldPacket* data)
4879{
4880 uint32 ammoInventoryType = 0;
4881 uint32 ammoDisplayID = 0;
4882
4883 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4884 {
4885 Item* pItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK);
4886 if (pItem)
4887 {
4888 ammoInventoryType = pItem->GetTemplate()->InventoryType;
4889 if (ammoInventoryType == INVTYPE_THROWN)
4890 ammoDisplayID = pItem->GetTemplate()->DisplayInfoID;
4891 else
4892 {
4893 uint32 ammoID = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID);
4894 if (ammoID)
4895 {
4896 ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(ammoID);
4897 if (pProto)
4898 {
4899 ammoDisplayID = pProto->DisplayInfoID;
4900 ammoInventoryType = pProto->InventoryType;
4901 }
4902 }
4903 else if (m_caster->HasAura(46699)) // Requires No Ammo
4904 {
4905 ammoDisplayID = 5996; // normal arrow
4906 ammoInventoryType = INVTYPE_AMMO;
4907 }
4908 }
4909 }
4910 }
4911 else
4912 {
4913 uint32 nonRangedAmmoDisplayID = 0;
4914 uint32 nonRangedAmmoInventoryType = 0;
4915 for (uint8 i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
4916 {
4917 if (uint32 item_id = m_caster->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + i))
4918 {
4919 if (ItemTemplate const* itemEntry = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(item_id))
4920 {
4921 if (itemEntry->Class == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON)
4922 {
4923 switch (itemEntry->SubClass)
4924 {
4925 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_THROWN:
4926 ammoDisplayID = itemEntry->DisplayInfoID;
4927 ammoInventoryType = itemEntry->InventoryType;
4928 break;
4929 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_BOW:
4930 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_CROSSBOW:
4931 ammoDisplayID = 5996; // is this need fixing?
4932 ammoInventoryType = INVTYPE_AMMO;
4933 break;
4934 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_GUN:
4935 ammoDisplayID = 5998; // is this need fixing?
4936 ammoInventoryType = INVTYPE_AMMO;
4937 break;
4938 default:
4939 nonRangedAmmoDisplayID = itemEntry->DisplayInfoID;
4940 nonRangedAmmoInventoryType = itemEntry->InventoryType;
4941 break;
4942 }
4943
4944 if (ammoDisplayID)
4945 break;
4946 }
4947 }
4948 }
4949 }
4950
4951 if (!ammoDisplayID && !ammoInventoryType)
4952 {
4953 ammoDisplayID = nonRangedAmmoDisplayID;
4954 ammoInventoryType = nonRangedAmmoInventoryType;
4955 }
4956 }
4957
4958 *data << uint32(ammoDisplayID);
4959 *data << uint32(ammoInventoryType);
4960}
4961
4963void Spell::WriteSpellGoTargets(WorldPacket* data)
4964{
4965 // This function also fill data for channeled spells:
4966 // m_needAliveTargetMask req for stop channelig if one target die
4967 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
4968 {
4969 if ((*ihit).effectMask == 0) // No effect apply - all immuned add state
4970 // possibly SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2 for this??
4971 ihit->missCondition = SPELL_MISS_IMMUNE2;
4972 }
4973
4974 // Hit and miss target counts are both uint8, that limits us to 255 targets for each
4975 // sending more than 255 targets crashes the client (since count sent would be wrong)
4976 // Spells like 40647 (with a huge radius) can easily reach this limit (spell might need
4977 // target conditions but we still need to limit the number of targets sent and keeping
4978 // correct count for both hit and miss).
4979
4980 uint32 hit = 0;
4981 size_t hitPos = data->wpos();
4982 *data << (uint8)0; // placeholder
4983 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end() && hit < 255; ++ihit)
4984 {
4985 if ((*ihit).missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE) // Add only hits
4986 {
4987 *data << ihit->targetGUID;
4988 // Xinef: No channeled spell checked, no anything
4989 //m_channelTargetEffectMask |=ihit->effectMask;
4990 ++hit;
4991 }
4992 }
4993
4994 for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::const_iterator ighit = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); ighit != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end() && hit < 255; ++ighit)
4995 {
4996 *data << ighit->targetGUID; // Always hits
4997 ++hit;
4998 }
4999
5000 uint32 miss = 0;
5001 size_t missPos = data->wpos();
5002 *data << (uint8)0; // placeholder
5003 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end() && miss < 255; ++ihit)
5004 {
5005 if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE) // Add only miss
5006 {
5007 *data << ihit->targetGUID;
5008 *data << uint8(ihit->missCondition);
5009 if (ihit->missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
5010 *data << uint8(ihit->reflectResult);
5011 ++miss;
5012 }
5013 }
5014 // Reset m_needAliveTargetMask for non channeled spell
5015 // Xinef: Why do we reset something that is not set??????
5016 //if (!m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
5017 // m_channelTargetEffectMask = 0;
5018
5019 data->put<uint8>(hitPos, (uint8)hit);
5020 data->put<uint8>(missPos, (uint8)miss);
5021}
5022
5023void Spell::SendLogExecute()
5024{
5025 WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLLOGEXECUTE, (8 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 8));
5026
5027 data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
5028
5029 data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
5030
5031 uint8 effCount = 0;
5032 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
5033 {
5034 if (m_effectExecuteData[i])
5035 ++effCount;
5036 }
5037
5038 if (!effCount)
5039 return;
5040
5041 data << uint32(effCount);
5042 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
5043 {
5044 if (!m_effectExecuteData[i])
5045 continue;
5046
5047 data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect); // spell effect
5048
5049 data.append(*m_effectExecuteData[i]);
5050
5051 delete m_effectExecuteData[i];
5052 m_effectExecuteData[i] = nullptr;
5053 }
5054 m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
5055}
5056
5057void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectTakeTargetPower(uint8 effIndex, Unit* target, uint32 PowerType, uint32 powerTaken, float gainMultiplier)
5058{
5059 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5060 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << target->GetPackGUID();
5061 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(powerTaken);
5062 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(PowerType);
5063 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << float(gainMultiplier);
5064}
5065
5066void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectExtraAttacks(uint8 effIndex, Unit* victim, uint32 attCount)
5067{
5068 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5069 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << victim->GetPackGUID();
5070 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(attCount);
5071}
5072
5073void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectInterruptCast(uint8 effIndex, Unit* victim, uint32 spellId)
5074{
5075 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5076 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << victim->GetPackGUID();
5077 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(spellId);
5078}
5079
5080void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectDurabilityDamage(uint8 effIndex, Unit* victim, int32 itemId, int32 slot)
5081{
5082 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5083 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << victim->GetPackGUID();
5084 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << int32(itemId);
5085 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << int32(slot);
5086}
5087
5088void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectOpenLock(uint8 effIndex, Object* obj)
5089{
5090 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5091 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << obj->GetPackGUID();
5092}
5093
5094void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectCreateItem(uint8 effIndex, uint32 entry)
5095{
5096 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5097 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(entry);
5098}
5099
5100void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectDestroyItem(uint8 effIndex, uint32 entry)
5101{
5102 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5103 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(entry);
5104}
5105
5106void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(uint8 effIndex, WorldObject* obj)
5107{
5108 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5109 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << obj->GetPackGUID();
5110}
5111
5112void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectUnsummonObject(uint8 effIndex, WorldObject* obj)
5113{
5114 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5115 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << obj->GetPackGUID();
5116}
5117
5118void Spell::ExecuteLogEffectResurrect(uint8 effIndex, Unit* target)
5119{
5120 InitEffectExecuteData(effIndex);
5121 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << target->GetPackGUID();
5122}
5123
5124void Spell::SendInterrupted(uint8 result)
5125{
5126 WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_FAILURE, (8 + 1 + 4 + 1));
5127 data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
5128 data << uint8(m_cast_count);
5129 data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
5130 data << uint8(result);
5131 m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
5132
5133 data.Initialize(SMSG_SPELL_FAILED_OTHER, (8 + 1 + 4 + 1));
5134 data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
5135 data << uint8(m_cast_count);
5136 data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
5137 data << uint8(result);
5138 m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
5139}
5140
5141void Spell::SendChannelUpdate(uint32 time)
5142{
5143 if (time == 0)
5144 {
5145 m_caster->SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_OBJECT, ObjectGuid::Empty);
5146 m_caster->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_CHANNEL_SPELL, 0);
5147 }
5148
5149 WorldPacket data(MSG_CHANNEL_UPDATE, 8 + 4);
5150 data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
5151 data << uint32(time);
5152
5153 m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
5154}
5155
5156void Spell::SendChannelStart(uint32 duration)
5157{
5158 ObjectGuid channelTarget = m_targets.GetObjectTargetGUID();
5159 if (!channelTarget && !m_spellInfo->NeedsExplicitUnitTarget())
5160 if (m_UniqueTargetInfo.size() + m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.size() == 1) // this is for TARGET_SELECT_CATEGORY_NEARBY
5161 channelTarget = !m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty() ? m_UniqueTargetInfo.front().targetGUID : m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.front().targetGUID;
5162
5163 WorldPacket data(MSG_CHANNEL_START, (8 + 4 + 4));
5164 data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
5165 data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
5166 data << uint32(duration);
5167
5168 m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
5169
5170 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->NeedSendSpectatorData())
5171 ArenaSpectator::SendCommand_Spell(m_caster->FindMap(), m_caster->GetGUID(), "SPE", m_spellInfo->Id, -((int32)duration));
5172
5173 m_timer = duration;
5174 if (channelTarget)
5175 m_caster->SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_OBJECT, channelTarget);
5176
5177 m_caster->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_CHANNEL_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id);
5178}
5179
5180void Spell::SendResurrectRequest(Player* target)
5181{
5182 // get resurrector name for creature resurrections, otherwise packet will be not accepted
5183 // for player resurrections the name is looked up by guid
5184 std::string const sentName(m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER
5185 ? ""
5186 : m_caster->GetNameForLocaleIdx(target->GetSession()->GetSessionDbLocaleIndex()));
5187
5188 WorldPacket data(SMSG_RESURRECT_REQUEST, (8 + 4 + sentName.size() + 1 + 1 + 1 + 4));
5189 data << m_caster->GetGUID();
5190 data << uint32(sentName.size() + 1);
5191
5192 data << sentName;
5193 data << uint8(0); // null terminator
5194
5195 data << uint8(m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? 0 : 1); // "you'll be afflicted with resurrection sickness"
5196 // override delay sent with SMSG_CORPSE_RECLAIM_DELAY, set instant resurrection for spells with this attribute
5197 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_NO_RES_TIMER))
5198 data << uint32(0);
5199 target->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
5200}
5201
5202void Spell::TakeCastItem()
5203{
5204 if (!m_CastItem || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5205 return;
5206
5207 // not remove cast item at triggered spell (equipping, weapon damage, etc)
5208 if (_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_ITEM)
5209 return;
5210
5211 ItemTemplate const* proto = m_CastItem->GetTemplate();
5212
5213 if (!proto)
5214 {
5215 // This code is to avoid a crash
5216 // I'm not sure, if this is really an error, but I guess every item needs a prototype
5217 LOG_ERROR("spells", "Cast item has no item prototype {}", m_CastItem->GetGUID().ToString());
5218 return;
5219 }
5220
5221 bool expendable = false;
5222 bool withoutCharges = false;
5223
5224 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++i)
5225 {
5226 if (proto->Spells[i].SpellId)
5227 {
5228 // item has limited charges
5229 if (proto->Spells[i].SpellCharges)
5230 {
5231 if (proto->Spells[i].SpellCharges < 0)
5232 expendable = true;
5233
5234 int32 charges = m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(i);
5235
5236 // item has charges left
5237 if (charges)
5238 {
5239 (charges > 0) ? --charges : ++charges; // std::abs(charges) less at 1 after use
5240 if (proto->Stackable == 1)
5241 m_CastItem->SetSpellCharges(i, charges);
5242 m_CastItem->SetState(ITEM_CHANGED, m_caster->ToPlayer());
5243 }
5244
5245 // all charges used
5246 withoutCharges = (charges == 0);
5247 }
5248 }
5249 }
5250
5251 if (expendable && withoutCharges)
5252 {
5253 uint32 count = 1;
5254 m_caster->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(m_CastItem, count, true);
5255
5256 // prevent crash at access to deleted m_targets.GetItemTarget
5257 if (m_CastItem == m_targets.GetItemTarget())
5258 m_targets.SetItemTarget(nullptr);
5259
5260 m_CastItem = nullptr;
5261 m_castItemGUID.Clear();
5262 }
5263}
5264
5265void Spell::TakePower()
5266{
5267 if (m_CastItem || m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
5268 return;
5269
5270 //Don't take power if the spell is cast while .cheat power is enabled.
5271 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5272 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_POWER))
5273 return;
5274
5275 Powers PowerType = Powers(m_spellInfo->PowerType);
5276 bool hit = true;
5277 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5278 {
5279 if (PowerType == POWER_RAGE || PowerType == POWER_ENERGY || PowerType == POWER_RUNE || PowerType == POWER_RUNIC_POWER)
5280 if (ObjectGuid targetGUID = m_targets.GetUnitTargetGUID())
5281 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
5282 if (ihit->targetGUID == targetGUID)
5283 {
5284 if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE && ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_BLOCK && ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_ABSORB && ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_REFLECT)
5285 {
5286 hit = false;
5287 //lower spell cost on fail (by talent aura)
5288 if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSpellModOwner())
5289 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_SPELL_COST_REFUND_ON_FAIL, m_powerCost, this);
5290 }
5291 break;
5292 }
5293 }
5294
5295 if (PowerType == POWER_RUNE)
5296 {
5297 TakeRunePower(hit);
5298 return;
5299 }
5300
5301 if (!m_powerCost)
5302 return;
5303
5304 // health as power used
5305 if (PowerType == POWER_HEALTH)
5306 {
5307 m_caster->ModifyHealth(-(int32)m_powerCost);
5308 return;
5309 }
5310
5311 if (PowerType >= MAX_POWERS)
5312 {
5313 LOG_ERROR("spells", "Spell::TakePower: Unknown power type '{}'", PowerType);
5314 return;
5315 }
5316
5317 if (hit)
5318 m_caster->ModifyPower(PowerType, -m_powerCost);
5319 else
5320 m_caster->ModifyPower(PowerType, -irand(0, m_powerCost / 4));
5321
5322 // Set the five second timer
5323 if (PowerType == POWER_MANA && m_powerCost > 0)
5324 {
5325 m_caster->SetLastManaUse(GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count());
5326 }
5327}
5328
5329void Spell::TakeAmmo()
5330{
5331 if (m_attackType == RANGED_ATTACK && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5332 {
5333 Item* pItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK);
5334
5335 // wands don't have ammo
5336 if (!pItem || pItem->IsBroken() || pItem->GetTemplate()->SubClass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_WAND)
5337 return;
5338
5339 if (pItem->GetTemplate()->InventoryType == INVTYPE_THROWN)
5340 {
5341 if (pItem->GetMaxStackCount() == 1)
5342 {
5343 // decrease durability for non-stackable throw weapon
5344 m_caster->ToPlayer()->DurabilityPointLossForEquipSlot(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_RANGED);
5345 }
5346 else
5347 {
5348 // decrease items amount for stackable throw weapon
5349 uint32 count = 1;
5350 m_caster->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(pItem, count, true);
5351 }
5352 }
5353 else if (uint32 ammo = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID))
5354 m_caster->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(ammo, 1, true);
5355 }
5356}
5357
5358SpellCastResult Spell::CheckRuneCost(uint32 RuneCostID)
5359{
5360 if (m_spellInfo->PowerType != POWER_RUNE || !RuneCostID)
5361 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5362
5363 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5364 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5365
5366 Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5367 //If we are in .cheat power mode we dont need to check the cost as we are expected to be able to use it anyways (infinite power)
5368 if (player->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_POWER))
5369 {
5370 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5371 }
5372
5373 if (player->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
5374 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5375
5376 SpellRuneCostEntry const* src = sSpellRuneCostStore.LookupEntry(RuneCostID);
5377
5378 if (!src)
5379 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5380
5381 if (src->NoRuneCost())
5382 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5383
5384 int32 runeCost[NUM_RUNE_TYPES]; // blood, frost, unholy, death
5385
5386 for (uint32 i = 0; i < RUNE_DEATH; ++i)
5387 {
5388 runeCost[i] = src->RuneCost[i];
5389 if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
5390 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COST, runeCost[i], this);
5391 }
5392
5393 runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] = MAX_RUNES; // calculated later
5394
5395 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
5396 {
5397 RuneType rune = player->GetCurrentRune(i);
5398 if ((player->GetRuneCooldown(i) == 0) && (runeCost[rune] > 0))
5399 runeCost[rune]--;
5400 }
5401
5402 for (uint32 i = 0; i < RUNE_DEATH; ++i)
5403 if (runeCost[i] > 0)
5404 runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] += runeCost[i];
5405
5406 if (runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] > MAX_RUNES)
5407 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_POWER; // not sure if result code is correct
5408
5409 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
5410}
5411
5412void Spell::TakeRunePower(bool didHit)
5413{
5414 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || m_caster->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
5415 return;
5416
5417 SpellRuneCostEntry const* runeCostData = sSpellRuneCostStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->RuneCostID);
5418 if (!runeCostData || (runeCostData->NoRuneCost() && runeCostData->NoRunicPowerGain()))
5419 return;
5420
5421 Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5422 m_runesState = player->GetRunesState(); // store previous state
5423
5424 int32 runeCost[NUM_RUNE_TYPES]; // blood, frost, unholy, death
5425
5426 for (uint32 i = 0; i < RUNE_DEATH; ++i)
5427 {
5428 runeCost[i] = runeCostData->RuneCost[i];
5429 if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
5430 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_COST, runeCost[i], this);
5431 }
5432
5433 runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] = 0; // calculated later
5434
5435 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
5436 {
5437 RuneType rune = player->GetCurrentRune(i);
5438 if (!player->GetRuneCooldown(i) && runeCost[rune] > 0)
5439 {
5440 player->SetRuneCooldown(i, didHit ? player->GetRuneBaseCooldown(i, false) : uint32(RUNE_MISS_COOLDOWN));
5441 player->SetLastUsedRune(rune);
5442 runeCost[rune]--;
5443 }
5444 }
5445
5446 // Xinef: firstly consume death runes of base type
5447 // Xinef: in second loop consume all available
5448 for (uint8 loop = 0; loop < 2; ++loop)
5449 {
5450 runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] = runeCost[RUNE_BLOOD] + runeCost[RUNE_UNHOLY] + runeCost[RUNE_FROST];
5451 if (runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] > 0)
5452 {
5453 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
5454 {
5455 RuneType rune = player->GetCurrentRune(i);
5456 if (!player->GetRuneCooldown(i) && rune == RUNE_DEATH && (loop ? true : (runeCost[player->GetBaseRune(i)] > 0)))
5457 {
5458 player->SetRuneCooldown(i, didHit ? player->GetRuneBaseCooldown(i, false) : uint32(RUNE_MISS_COOLDOWN));
5459 player->SetLastUsedRune(rune);
5460 runeCost[rune]--;
5461 if (!loop)
5462 runeCost[player->GetBaseRune(i)]--;
5463
5464 // keep Death Rune type if missed
5465 if (didHit)
5466 player->RestoreBaseRune(i);
5467
5468 if (runeCost[RUNE_DEATH] == 0)
5469 break;
5470 }
5471 }
5472 }
5473 }
5474
5475 // you can gain some runic power when use runes
5476 if (didHit)
5477 if (int32 rp = int32(runeCostData->runePowerGain * sWorld->getRate(RATE_POWER_RUNICPOWER_INCOME)))
5478 player->ModifyPower(POWER_RUNIC_POWER, int32(rp));
5479}
5480
5481void Spell::TakeReagents()
5482{
5483 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5484 return;
5485
5486 ItemTemplate const* castItemTemplate = m_CastItem ? m_CastItem->GetTemplate() : nullptr;
5487
5488 // do not take reagents for these item casts
5489 if (castItemTemplate && castItemTemplate->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST)
5490 return;
5491
5492 Player* p_caster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5493 if (p_caster->CanNoReagentCast(m_spellInfo))
5494 return;
5495
5496 for (uint32 x = 0; x < MAX_SPELL_REAGENTS; ++x)
5497 {
5498 if (m_spellInfo->Reagent[x] <= 0)
5499 continue;
5500
5501 uint32 itemid = m_spellInfo->Reagent[x];
5502 uint32 itemcount = m_spellInfo->ReagentCount[x];
5503
5504 // if CastItem is also spell reagent
5505 if (castItemTemplate && castItemTemplate->ItemId == itemid)
5506 {
5507 for (int s = 0; s < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++s)
5508 {
5509 // CastItem will be used up and does not count as reagent
5510 int32 charges = m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(s);
5511 if (castItemTemplate->Spells[s].SpellCharges < 0 && std::abs(charges) < 2)
5512 {
5513 ++itemcount;
5514 break;
5515 }
5516 }
5517
5518 m_CastItem = nullptr;
5519 m_castItemGUID.Clear();
5520 }
5521
5522 // if GetItemTarget is also spell reagent
5523 if (m_targets.GetItemTargetEntry() == itemid)
5524 m_targets.SetItemTarget(nullptr);
5525
5526 p_caster->DestroyItemCount(itemid, itemcount, true);
5527 }
5528}
5529
5530void Spell::HandleThreatSpells()
5531{
5532 if (m_UniqueTargetInfo.empty())
5533 return;
5534
5535 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_NO_THREAT) || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_SUPRESS_TARGET_PROCS))
5536 return;
5537
5538 float threat = 0.0f;
5539 if (SpellThreatEntry const* threatEntry = sSpellMgr->GetSpellThreatEntry(m_spellInfo->Id))
5540 {
5541 if (threatEntry->apPctMod != 0.0f)
5542 threat += threatEntry->apPctMod * m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK);
5543
5544 threat += threatEntry->flatMod;
5545 }
5546 else if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_NO_INITIAL_THREAT))
5547 threat += m_spellInfo->SpellLevel;
5548
5549 // past this point only multiplicative effects occur
5550 if (threat == 0.0f)
5551 return;
5552
5553 // since 2.0.1 threat from positive effects also is distributed among all targets, so the overall caused threat is at most the defined bonus
5554 threat /= m_UniqueTargetInfo.size();
5555
5556 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
5557 {
5558 float threatToAdd = threat;
5559 if (ihit->missCondition != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
5560 threatToAdd = 0.0f;
5561
5562 Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID);
5563 if (!target)
5564 continue;
5565
5566 bool IsFriendly = m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(target);
5567 // positive spells distribute threat among all units that are in combat with target, like healing
5568 if (m_spellInfo->_IsPositiveSpell() && IsFriendly)
5569 target->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(m_caster, threatToAdd, m_spellInfo);
5570 // for negative spells threat gets distributed among affected targets
5571 else if (!m_spellInfo->_IsPositiveSpell() && !IsFriendly && target->CanHaveThreatList())
5572 target->AddThreat(m_caster, threatToAdd, m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask(), m_spellInfo);
5573 }
5574 LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell {}, added an additional {} threat for {} {} target(s)", m_spellInfo->Id, threat, m_spellInfo->_IsPositiveSpell() ? "assisting" : "harming", uint32(m_UniqueTargetInfo.size()));
5575}
5576
5577void Spell::HandleEffects(Unit* pUnitTarget, Item* pItemTarget, GameObject* pGOTarget, uint32 i, SpellEffectHandleMode mode)
5578{
5579 effectHandleMode = mode;
5580 unitTarget = pUnitTarget;
5581 itemTarget = pItemTarget;
5582 gameObjTarget = pGOTarget;
5583 destTarget = &m_destTargets[i]._position;
5584
5585 uint8 eff = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect;
5586
5587 LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell: {} Effect : {}", m_spellInfo->Id, eff);
5588
5589 // we do not need DamageMultiplier here.
5590 damage = CalculateSpellDamage(i, nullptr);
5591
5592 bool preventDefault = CallScriptEffectHandlers((SpellEffIndex)i, mode);
5593
5594 if (!preventDefault && eff < TOTAL_SPELL_EFFECTS)
5595 {
5596 (this->*SpellEffects[eff])((SpellEffIndex)i);
5597 }
5598}
5599
5600SpellCastResult Spell::CheckCast(bool strict)
5601{
5602 // check death state
5603 if (!m_caster->IsAlive() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_PASSIVE) && !(m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_CAST_WHILE_DEAD) || (IsTriggered() && !m_triggeredByAuraSpell)))
5604 return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_DEAD;
5605
5606 // Spectator check
5607 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5608 if (((Player const*)m_caster)->IsSpectator() && m_spellInfo->Id != SPECTATOR_SPELL_BINDSIGHT)
5609 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_HERE;
5610
5611 SpellCastResult res = SPELL_CAST_OK;
5612
5613 sScriptMgr->OnSpellCheckCast(this, strict, res);
5614
5615 if (res != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5616 return res;
5617
5618 // check cooldowns to prevent cheating
5619 if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_PASSIVE))
5620 {
5621 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5622 {
5623 //can cast triggered (by aura only?) spells while have this flag
5624 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURASTATE) && m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasPlayerFlag(PLAYER_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY))
5625 return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS;
5626
5627 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD) && m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasSpellCooldown(m_spellInfo->Id))
5628 {
5629 if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
5630 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5631 else
5632 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5633 }
5634
5635 // check if we are using a potion in combat for the 2nd+ time. Cooldown is added only after caster gets out of combat
5636 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetLastPotionId() && m_CastItem && (m_CastItem->IsPotion() || m_spellInfo->IsCooldownStartedOnEvent()))
5637 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5638 }
5639 else if (!IsTriggered() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->ToCreature()->IsSpellProhibited(m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()))
5640 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5641 }
5642
5643 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_DEBUG_SPELL) && !m_caster->HasUnitFlag2(UNIT_FLAG2_ALLOW_CHEAT_SPELLS))
5644 {
5645 m_customError = SPELL_CUSTOM_ERROR_GM_ONLY;
5646 return SPELL_FAILED_CUSTOM_ERROR;
5647 }
5648
5649 // Check global cooldown
5650 if (strict && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_GCD) && HasGlobalCooldown())
5651 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
5652
5653 // only triggered spells can be processed an ended battleground
5654 if (!IsTriggered() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5655 if (Battleground* bg = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetBattleground())
5656 if (bg->GetStatus() == STATUS_WAIT_LEAVE)
5657 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5658
5659 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER /*&& VMAP::VMapFactory::createOrGetVMapMgr()->isLineOfSightCalcEnabled()*/) // pussywizard: optimization (commented)
5660 {
5661 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ONLY_OUTDOORS) &&
5662 !m_caster->IsOutdoors())
5663 return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_OUTDOORS;
5664
5665 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ONLY_INDOORS) &&
5666 m_caster->IsOutdoors())
5667 return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_INDOORS;
5668 }
5669
5670 // only check at first call, Stealth auras are already removed at second call
5671 // for now, ignore triggered spells
5672 if (strict && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SHAPESHIFT))
5673 {
5674 bool checkForm = true;
5675 // Ignore form req aura
5676 Unit::AuraEffectList const& ignore = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_SHAPESHIFT);
5677 for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = ignore.begin(); i != ignore.end(); ++i)
5678 {
5679 if (!(*i)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
5680 continue;
5681 checkForm = false;
5682 break;
5683 }
5684 if (checkForm)
5685 {
5686 // Cannot be used in this stance/form
5687 SpellCastResult shapeError = m_spellInfo->CheckShapeshift(m_caster->GetShapeshiftForm());
5688 if (shapeError != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5689 return shapeError;
5690
5691 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ONLY_STEALTHED) && !(m_caster->HasStealthAura()))
5692 return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_STEALTHED;
5693 }
5694 }
5695
5696 Unit::AuraEffectList const& blockSpells = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_BLOCK_SPELL_FAMILY);
5697 for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator blockItr = blockSpells.begin(); blockItr != blockSpells.end(); ++blockItr)
5698 if (uint32((*blockItr)->GetMiscValue()) == m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
5699 return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_UNAVAILABLE;
5700
5701 bool reqCombat = true;
5702 Unit::AuraEffectList const& stateAuras = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_IGNORE_AURASTATE);
5703 for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator j = stateAuras.begin(); j != stateAuras.end(); ++j)
5704 {
5705 if ((*j)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
5706 {
5707 m_needComboPoints = false;
5708 if ((*j)->GetMiscValue() == 1)
5709 {
5710 reqCombat = false;
5711 break;
5712 }
5713 }
5714 }
5715
5716 // caster state requirements
5717 // not for triggered spells (needed by execute)
5718 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURASTATE))
5719 {
5720 if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState && !m_caster->HasAuraState(AuraStateType(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraState), m_spellInfo, m_caster))
5721 return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5722 if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraStateNot && m_caster->HasAuraState(AuraStateType(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraStateNot), m_spellInfo, m_caster))
5723 return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5724
5725 // Note: spell 62473 requres CasterAuraSpell = triggering spell
5726 if (m_spellInfo->CasterAuraSpell && !m_caster->HasAura(sSpellMgr->GetSpellIdForDifficulty(m_spellInfo->CasterAuraSpell, m_caster)))
5727 return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5728 if (m_spellInfo->ExcludeCasterAuraSpell && m_caster->HasAura(sSpellMgr->GetSpellIdForDifficulty(m_spellInfo->ExcludeCasterAuraSpell, m_caster)))
5729 return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5730
5731 if (reqCombat && m_caster->IsInCombat() && !m_spellInfo->CanBeUsedInCombat())
5732 return SPELL_FAILED_AFFECTING_COMBAT;
5733 }
5734
5735 // Xinef: exploit protection
5736 if (reqCombat && !m_spellInfo->CanBeUsedInCombat() && (m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT) || m_spellInfo->HasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT_NEW)))
5737 {
5738 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
5739 if (InstanceScript* instanceScript = m_caster->GetInstanceScript())
5740 if (instanceScript->IsEncounterInProgress())
5741 {
5742 if (Group* group = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetGroup())
5743 for (GroupReference* itr = group->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
5744 if (Player* member = itr->GetSource())
5745 if (member->IsInMap(m_caster))
5746 if (Unit* victim = member->GetVictim())
5747 if (victim->IsInCombat() && m_caster->GetDistance(victim) < m_caster->GetVisibilityRange())
5748 {
5749 m_caster->CombatStart(victim);
5750 victim->AddThreat(m_caster, 1.0f);
5751 break;
5752 }
5753 return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_RESURRECTED;
5754 }
5755 }
5756
5757 // cancel autorepeat spells if cast start when moving
5758 // (not wand currently autorepeat cast delayed to moving stop anyway in spell update code)
5759 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->isMoving() && !IsTriggered())
5760 {
5761 // skip stuck spell to allow use it in falling case and apply spell limitations at movement
5762 if ((!m_caster->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_FALLING_FAR) || m_spellInfo->Effects[0].Effect != SPELL_EFFECT_STUCK) &&
5763 (IsAutoRepeat() || (m_spellInfo->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_NOT_SEATED) != 0))
5764 return SPELL_FAILED_MOVING;
5765 }
5766
5767 Vehicle* vehicle = m_caster->GetVehicle();
5768 if (vehicle && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_MOUNTED_OR_ON_VEHICLE))
5769 {
5770 uint16 checkMask = 0;
5771 for (uint8 effIndex = EFFECT_0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
5772 {
5773 SpellEffectInfo const* effInfo = &m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex];
5774 if (effInfo->ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT)
5775 {
5776 SpellShapeshiftEntry const* shapeShiftEntry = sSpellShapeshiftStore.LookupEntry(effInfo->MiscValue);
5777 if (shapeShiftEntry && (shapeShiftEntry->flags1 & 1) == 0) // unk flag
5778 checkMask |= VEHICLE_SEAT_FLAG_UNCONTROLLED;
5779 break;
5780 }
5781 }
5782
5783 if (m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED))
5784 checkMask |= VEHICLE_SEAT_FLAG_CAN_CAST_MOUNT_SPELL;
5785
5786 if (!checkMask)
5787 checkMask = VEHICLE_SEAT_FLAG_CAN_ATTACK;
5788
5789 // All creatures should be able to cast as passengers freely, restriction and attribute are only for players
5790 VehicleSeatEntry const* vehicleSeat = vehicle->GetSeatForPassenger(m_caster);
5791 if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_ALLOW_WHILE_RIDING_VEHICLE) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_WHILE_MOUNTED)
5792 && (vehicleSeat->m_flags & checkMask) != checkMask && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5793 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5794 }
5795
5796 // check spell cast conditions from database
5797 {
5798 ConditionSourceInfo condInfo = ConditionSourceInfo(m_caster);
5799 condInfo.mConditionTargets[1] = m_targets.GetObjectTarget();
5800 ConditionList conditions = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForNotGroupedEntry(CONDITION_SOURCE_TYPE_SPELL, m_spellInfo->Id);
5801 if (!conditions.empty() && !sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(condInfo, conditions))
5802 {
5803 // mLastFailedCondition can be nullptr if there was an error processing the condition in Condition::Meets (i.e. wrong data for ConditionTarget or others)
5804 if (condInfo.mLastFailedCondition && condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ErrorType)
5805 {
5806 if (condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ErrorType == SPELL_FAILED_CUSTOM_ERROR)
5807 m_customError = SpellCustomErrors(condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ErrorTextId);
5808 return SpellCastResult(condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ErrorType);
5809 }
5810 if (!condInfo.mLastFailedCondition || !condInfo.mLastFailedCondition->ConditionTarget)
5811 return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
5812 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
5813 }
5814 }
5815
5816 // Don't check explicit target for passive spells (workaround) (check should be skipped only for learn case)
5817 // those spells may have incorrect target entries or not filled at all (for example 15332)
5818 // such spells when learned are not targeting anyone using targeting system, they should apply directly to caster instead
5819 // also, such casts shouldn't be sent to client
5820 // Xinef: do not check explicit casts for self cast of triggered spells (eg. reflect case)
5821 if (!(m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_PASSIVE) && (!m_targets.GetUnitTarget() || m_targets.GetUnitTarget() == m_caster)))
5822 {
5823 // Check explicit target for m_originalCaster - todo: get rid of such workarounds
5824 // Xinef: do not check explicit target for triggered spell casted on self with targetflag enemy
5825 if (!m_triggeredByAuraSpell || m_targets.GetUnitTarget() != m_caster || !(m_spellInfo->GetExplicitTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_ENEMY))
5826 {
5827 SpellCastResult castResult = m_spellInfo->CheckExplicitTarget((m_originalCaster && m_caster->GetEntry() != WORLD_TRIGGER) ? m_originalCaster : m_caster, m_targets.GetObjectTarget(), m_targets.GetItemTarget());
5828 if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5829 return castResult;
5830 }
5831 }
5832
5833 if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
5834 {
5835 SpellCastResult castResult = m_spellInfo->CheckTarget(m_caster, target, false);
5836 if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5837 return castResult;
5838
5839 if (target != m_caster)
5840 {
5841 // Must be behind the target
5842 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_REQ_CASTER_BEHIND_TARGET) && target->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), m_caster))
5843 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_BEHIND;
5844
5845 // Target must be facing you
5846 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_REQ_TARGET_FACING_CASTER) && !target->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), m_caster))
5847 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_INFRONT;
5848
5849 if ((!m_caster->IsTotem() || !m_spellInfo->IsPositive()) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_IGNORE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) &&
5850 !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALWAYS_AOE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) && !(m_spellFlags & SPELL_FLAG_REDIRECTED))
5851 {
5852 bool castedByGameobject = false;
5853 uint32 losChecks = LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS;
5854 if (m_originalCasterGUID.IsGameObject())
5855 {
5856 castedByGameobject = m_caster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(m_originalCasterGUID) != nullptr;
5857 }
5858 else if (m_caster->GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER)
5859 {
5860 if (TempSummon* tempSummon = m_caster->ToTempSummon())
5861 {
5862 castedByGameobject = tempSummon->GetSummonerGameObject() != nullptr;
5863 }
5864 }
5865
5866 if (castedByGameobject)
5867 {
5868 // If spell casted by gameobject then ignore M2 models
5869 losChecks &= ~LINEOFSIGHT_CHECK_GOBJECT_M2;
5870 }
5871
5872 if (!m_caster->IsWithinLOSInMap(target, VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags::M2, LineOfSightChecks(losChecks)))
5873 {
5874 return SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
5875 }
5876 }
5877 }
5878 }
5879
5880 // Check for line of sight for spells with dest
5881 if (m_targets.HasDst())
5882 {
5883 float x, y, z;
5884 m_targets.GetDstPos()->GetPosition(x, y, z);
5885
5886 if ((!m_caster->IsTotem() || !m_spellInfo->IsPositive()) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_IGNORE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) &&
5887 !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALWAYS_AOE_LINE_OF_SIGHT))
5888 {
5889 bool castedByGameobject = false;
5890 uint32 losChecks = LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS;
5891 if (m_originalCasterGUID.IsGameObject())
5892 {
5893 castedByGameobject = m_caster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(m_originalCasterGUID) != nullptr;
5894 }
5895 else if (m_caster->GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER)
5896 {
5897 if (TempSummon* tempSummon = m_caster->ToTempSummon())
5898 {
5899 castedByGameobject = tempSummon->GetSummonerGameObject() != nullptr;
5900 }
5901 }
5902
5903 if (castedByGameobject)
5904 {
5905 // If spell casted by gameobject then ignore M2 models
5906 losChecks &= ~LINEOFSIGHT_CHECK_GOBJECT_M2;
5907 }
5908
5909 if (!m_caster->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z, VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags::M2, LineOfSightChecks((losChecks))))
5910 {
5911 return SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
5912 }
5913 }
5914 }
5915
5916 // check pet presence
5917 for (int j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
5918 {
5919 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[j].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_PET)
5920 {
5921 if (!m_caster->GetGuardianPet() && !m_caster->GetCharm())
5922 {
5923 if (m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo) // not report pet not existence for triggered spells
5924 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
5925 else
5926 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
5927 }
5928 break;
5929 }
5930 }
5931 // Spell casted only on battleground
5932 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_ONLY_BATTLEGROUNDS) && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5933 if (!m_caster->ToPlayer()->InBattleground())
5934 return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_BATTLEGROUNDS;
5935
5936 // do not allow spells to be cast in arenas
5937 // - with greater than 10 min CD without SPELL_ATTR4_IGNORE_DEFAULT_ARENA_RESTRICTIONS flag
5938 // - with SPELL_ATTR4_NOT_IN_ARENA_OR_RATED_BATTLEGROUND flag
5939 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_NOT_IN_ARENA_OR_RATED_BATTLEGROUND) ||
5940 (m_spellInfo->GetRecoveryTime() >= 10 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_IGNORE_DEFAULT_ARENA_RESTRICTIONS)))
5941 if (MapEntry const* mapEntry = sMapStore.LookupEntry(m_caster->GetMapId()))
5942 if (mapEntry->IsBattleArena())
5943 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_IN_ARENA;
5944
5945 // zone check
5946 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT || !m_caster->ToPlayer()->IsGameMaster())
5947 {
5948 uint32 zone, area;
5949 m_caster->GetZoneAndAreaId(zone, area);
5950
5951 SpellCastResult locRes = m_spellInfo->CheckLocation(m_caster->GetMapId(), zone, area,
5952 m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? m_caster->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
5953 if (locRes != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5954 return locRes;
5955 }
5956
5957 // not let players cast spells at mount (and let do it to creatures)
5958 if (m_caster->IsMounted() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_MOUNTED_OR_ON_VEHICLE) &&
5959 !m_spellInfo->IsPassive() && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_WHILE_MOUNTED))
5960 {
5961 if (m_caster->IsInFlight())
5962 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_ON_TAXI;
5963 else
5964 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_MOUNTED;
5965 }
5966
5967 SpellCastResult castResult = SPELL_CAST_OK;
5968
5969 // always (except passive spells) check items (focus object can be required for any type casts)
5970 if (!m_spellInfo->IsPassive())
5971 {
5972 // spell focus needs to be checked not only for players! there are vehicle spells that require spell focus
5973 castResult = CheckSpellFocus();
5974 if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5975 return castResult;
5976
5977 castResult = CheckItems();
5978 if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5979 return castResult;
5980 }
5981
5982 // Triggered spells also have range check
5983 // TODO: determine if there is some flag to enable/disable the check
5984 castResult = CheckRange(strict);
5985 if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5986 return castResult;
5987
5988 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_POWER_AND_REAGENT_COST))
5989 {
5990 castResult = CheckPower();
5991 if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
5992 return castResult;
5993 }
5994
5995 // xinef: do not skip triggered spells if they posses prevention type (eg. Bladestorm vs Hand of Protection)
5996 if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURAS) || (m_spellInfo->PreventionType > SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_NONE && m_triggeredByAuraSpell && m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo->IsPositive()))
5997 {
5998 castResult = CheckCasterAuras(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURAS);
5999 if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6000 return castResult;
6001
6002 // xinef: Enraged Regeneration: While this is active, the warrior is blocked from using abilities that trigger being enraged (which would do nothing and waste the cooldowns).
6003 if (m_spellInfo->Mechanic && m_spellInfo->IsSelfCast())
6004 {
6005 SpellImmuneList const& mechanicList = m_caster->m_spellImmune[IMMUNITY_MECHANIC];
6006 for (SpellImmuneList::const_iterator itr = mechanicList.begin(); itr != mechanicList.end(); ++itr)
6007 if (itr->type == m_spellInfo->Mechanic)
6008 return SPELL_FAILED_DAMAGE_IMMUNE;
6009 }
6010 }
6011
6012 // script hook
6013 castResult = CallScriptCheckCastHandlers();
6014 if (castResult != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6015 return castResult;
6016
6017 bool hasDispellableAura = false;
6018 bool hasNonDispelEffect = false;
6019 uint32 dispelMask = 0;
6020 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
6021 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_DISPEL)
6022 {
6023 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsTargetingArea() || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_INITIATE_COMBAT))
6024 {
6025 hasDispellableAura = true;
6026 break;
6027 }
6028
6029 dispelMask |= SpellInfo::GetDispelMask(DispelType(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue));
6030 }
6031 else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect())
6032 {
6033 hasNonDispelEffect = true;
6034 break;
6035 }
6036
6037 if (!hasNonDispelEffect && !hasDispellableAura && dispelMask && !IsTriggered())
6038 {
6039 if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6040 {
6041 // Xinef: do not allow to cast on hostile targets in sanctuary
6042 if (!m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(target))
6043 {
6044 if (m_caster->IsInSanctuary() || target->IsInSanctuary())
6045 {
6046 // Xinef: fix for duels
6047 Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
6048 if (!player || !player->duel || target != player->duel->Opponent)
6049 return SPELL_FAILED_NOTHING_TO_DISPEL;
6050 }
6051 }
6052
6053 DispelChargesList dispelList;
6054 target->GetDispellableAuraList(m_caster, dispelMask, dispelList);
6055 if (dispelList.empty())
6056 return SPELL_FAILED_NOTHING_TO_DISPEL;
6057 }
6058 }
6059
6060 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
6061 {
6062 // for effects of spells that have only one target
6063 switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect)
6064 {
6065 case SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY:
6066 {
6067 if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT)
6068 {
6069 // Raise Ally
6070 if( m_spellInfo->Id == 61999 )
6071 {
6072 Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget();
6073 if (!target)
6074 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6075
6076 if (target->IsAlive()) // not discovered attributeEx5?
6077 return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_DEAD;
6078 }
6079 }
6080 break;
6081 }
6082 case SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_SPELL:
6083 {
6084 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6085 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6086
6087 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() != TARGET_UNIT_PET)
6088 break;
6089
6090 Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet();
6091
6092 if (!pet)
6093 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6094
6095 SpellInfo const* learn_spellproto = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TriggerSpell);
6096
6097 if (!learn_spellproto)
6098 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_KNOWN;
6099
6100 if (m_spellInfo->SpellLevel > pet->getLevel())
6101 return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
6102
6103 break;
6104 }
6105 case SPELL_EFFECT_LEARN_PET_SPELL:
6106 {
6107 // check target only for unit target case
6108 if (Unit* unitTarget = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6109 {
6110 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6111 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6112
6113 Pet* pet = unitTarget->ToPet();
6114 if (!pet || pet->GetOwner() != m_caster)
6115 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6116
6117 SpellInfo const* learn_spellproto = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TriggerSpell);
6118
6119 if (!learn_spellproto)
6120 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_KNOWN;
6121
6122 if (m_spellInfo->SpellLevel > pet->getLevel())
6123 return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
6124 }
6125 break;
6126 }
6127 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_GLYPH:
6128 {
6129 uint32 glyphId = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue;
6130 if (GlyphPropertiesEntry const* gp = sGlyphPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(glyphId))
6131 if (m_caster->HasAura(gp->SpellId))
6132 return SPELL_FAILED_UNIQUE_GLYPH;
6133 break;
6134 }
6135 case SPELL_EFFECT_FEED_PET:
6136 {
6137 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6138 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6139
6140 Item* foodItem = m_targets.GetItemTarget();
6141 if (!foodItem)
6142 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6143
6144 Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet();
6145
6146 if (!pet)
6147 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6148
6149 if (!pet->HaveInDiet(foodItem->GetTemplate()))
6150 return SPELL_FAILED_WRONG_PET_FOOD;
6151
6152 if (!pet->GetCurrentFoodBenefitLevel(foodItem->GetTemplate()->ItemLevel))
6153 return SPELL_FAILED_FOOD_LOWLEVEL;
6154
6155 if (m_caster->IsInCombat() || pet->IsInCombat())
6156 return SPELL_FAILED_AFFECTING_COMBAT;
6157
6158 break;
6159 }
6160 case SPELL_EFFECT_POWER_BURN:
6161 case SPELL_EFFECT_POWER_DRAIN:
6162 {
6163 // Can be area effect, Check only for players and not check if target - caster (spell can have multiply drain/burn effects)
6164 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6165 if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6166 if (target != m_caster && target->getPowerType() != Powers(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue))
6167 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6168 break;
6169 }
6170 case SPELL_EFFECT_CHARGE:
6171 {
6172 if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CHARGING))
6173 {
6174 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6175 }
6176
6177 if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR)
6178 {
6179 // Warbringer - can't be handled in proc system - should be done before checkcast root check and charge effect process
6180 if (strict && m_caster->IsScriptOverriden(m_spellInfo, 6953))
6181 m_caster->RemoveMovementImpairingAuras(true);
6182 }
6183 if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT))
6184 {
6185 // Exception for Master's Call
6186 if (m_spellInfo->Id != 54216)
6187 {
6188 return SPELL_FAILED_ROOTED;
6189 }
6190 }
6191 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6192 if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6193 if (!target->IsAlive())
6194 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6195 // Xinef: Pass only explicit unit target spells
6196 // pussywizard:
6197 if (DisableMgr::IsPathfindingEnabled(m_caster->FindMap()) && m_spellInfo->NeedsExplicitUnitTarget())
6198 {
6199 Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget();
6200 if (!target)
6201 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6202
6203 // first we must check to see if the target is in LoS. A path can usually be built but LoS matters for charge spells
6204 if (!target->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_caster)) //Do full LoS/Path check. Don't exclude m2
6205 return SPELL_FAILED_LINE_OF_SIGHT;
6206
6207 float objSize = target->GetCombatReach();
6208 float range = m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true, m_caster, this) * 1.5f + objSize; // can't be overly strict
6209
6210 m_preGeneratedPath = std::make_unique<PathGenerator>(m_caster);
6211 m_preGeneratedPath->SetPathLengthLimit(range);
6212
6213 // first try with raycast, if it fails fall back to normal path
6214 bool result = m_preGeneratedPath->CalculatePath(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ(), false);
6215 if (m_preGeneratedPath->GetPathType() & PATHFIND_SHORT)
6216 return SPELL_FAILED_NOPATH;
6217 else if (!result || m_preGeneratedPath->GetPathType() & (PATHFIND_NOPATH | PATHFIND_INCOMPLETE))
6218 return SPELL_FAILED_NOPATH;
6219 else if (m_preGeneratedPath->IsInvalidDestinationZ(target)) // Check position z, if not in a straight line
6220 return SPELL_FAILED_NOPATH;
6221
6222 m_preGeneratedPath->ShortenPathUntilDist(G3D::Vector3(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ()), objSize); // move back
6223 }
6224 if (Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer())
6225 player->SetCanTeleport(true);
6226 break;
6227 }
6228 case SPELL_EFFECT_SKINNING:
6229 {
6230 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !m_targets.GetUnitTarget() || m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
6231 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6232
6233 if (!(m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetUnitFlags() & UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE))
6234 return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_UNSKINNABLE;
6235
6236 Creature* creature = m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->ToCreature();
6237 if (!creature->IsCritter() && !creature->loot.isLooted())
6238 return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_LOOTED;
6239
6240 uint32 skill = creature->GetCreatureTemplate()->GetRequiredLootSkill();
6241
6242 int32 skillValue = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSkillValue(skill);
6243 int32 TargetLevel = m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->getLevel();
6244 int32 ReqValue = (skillValue < 100 ? (TargetLevel - 10) * 10 : TargetLevel * 5);
6245 if (ReqValue > skillValue)
6246 return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
6247
6248 break;
6249 }
6250 case SPELL_EFFECT_OPEN_LOCK:
6251 {
6252 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() != TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_TARGET &&
6253 m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() != TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET)
6254 break;
6255
6256 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER // only players can open locks, gather etc.
6257 // we need a go target in case of TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_TARGET
6258 || (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_TARGET && !m_targets.GetGOTarget()))
6259 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6260
6261 Item* pTempItem = nullptr;
6262 if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
6263 {
6264 if (TradeData* pTrade = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTradeData())
6265 pTempItem = pTrade->GetTraderData()->GetItem(TradeSlots(m_targets.GetItemTargetGUID().GetRawValue()));
6266 }
6267 else if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_ITEM)
6268 pTempItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetItemByGuid(m_targets.GetItemTargetGUID());
6269
6270 // we need a go target, or an openable item target in case of TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET
6271 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET &&
6272 !m_targets.GetGOTarget() &&
6273 (!pTempItem || !pTempItem->GetTemplate()->LockID || !pTempItem->IsLocked()))
6274 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6275
6276 // We must also ensure the gameobject we are opening is still closed by the time the spell finishes.
6277 if (GameObject* go = m_targets.GetGOTarget())
6278 {
6279 if (go->GetGoType() == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DOOR && go->GetGoState() != GO_STATE_READY)
6280 {
6281 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_OPEN;
6282 }
6283 }
6284 if (m_spellInfo->Id != 1842 || (m_targets.GetGOTarget() &&
6285 m_targets.GetGOTarget()->GetGOInfo()->type != GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_TRAP))
6286 {
6287 if (m_targets.GetGOTarget() && m_targets.GetGOTarget()->GetEntry() == 179697)
6288 {
6289 if (!m_caster->ToPlayer()->CanUseBattlegroundObject(nullptr))
6290 return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
6291 }
6292 else if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->InBattleground() && // In Battleground players can use only flags and banners, or Gurubashi chest
6293 !m_caster->ToPlayer()->CanUseBattlegroundObject(m_targets.GetGOTarget()))
6294 return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
6295 }
6296
6297 // get the lock entry
6298 uint32 lockId = 0;
6299 if (GameObject* go = m_targets.GetGOTarget())
6300 {
6301 lockId = go->GetGOInfo()->GetLockId();
6302 if (!lockId)
6303 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6304 }
6305 else if (Item* itm = m_targets.GetItemTarget())
6306 lockId = itm->GetTemplate()->LockID;
6307
6308 SkillType skillId = SKILL_NONE;
6309 int32 reqSkillValue = 0;
6310 int32 skillValue = 0;
6311
6312 // check lock compatibility
6313 SpellCastResult res = CanOpenLock(i, lockId, skillId, reqSkillValue, skillValue);
6314 if (res != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6315 return res;
6316
6317 // chance for fail at lockpicking attempt
6318 // second check prevent fail at rechecks
6319 if (skillId != SKILL_NONE && (!m_selfContainer || ((*m_selfContainer) != this)))
6320 {
6321 // chance for failure in orange lockpick
6322 if (skillId == SKILL_LOCKPICKING && reqSkillValue > irand(skillValue - 25, skillValue + 37))
6323 {
6324 return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
6325 }
6326 }
6327 break;
6328 }
6329 case SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT_PET:
6330 {
6331 Unit* unitCaster = m_caster->ToUnit();
6332 if (!unitCaster)
6333 {
6334 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6335 }
6336
6337 Creature* pet = unitCaster->GetGuardianPet();
6338 if (pet)
6339 {
6340 if (pet->IsAlive())
6341 {
6342 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6343 }
6344 }
6345 else if (Player* playerCaster = m_caster->ToPlayer())
6346 {
6347 PetStable& petStable = playerCaster->GetOrInitPetStable();
6348 if (!petStable.CurrentPet && petStable.UnslottedPets.empty())
6349 {
6350 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6351 }
6352 }
6353
6354 break;
6355 }
6356 // This is generic summon effect
6357 case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON:
6358 {
6359 SummonPropertiesEntry const* SummonProperties = sSummonPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValueB);
6360 if (!SummonProperties || m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
6361 break;
6362 switch (SummonProperties->Category)
6363 {
6364 case SUMMON_CATEGORY_PET:
6365 if (m_caster->GetPetGUID())
6366 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6367 [[fallthrough]];
6368 case SUMMON_CATEGORY_PUPPET:
6369 if (m_caster->GetCharmGUID())
6370 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6371 break;
6372 }
6373 break;
6374 }
6375 case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_TAMED_PET:
6376 {
6377 if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6378 {
6379 if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6380 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6381 if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetPetGUID())
6382 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6383 }
6384 break;
6385 }
6386 case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PET:
6387 {
6388 Unit* unitCaster = m_caster->ToUnit();
6389 if (!unitCaster)
6390 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6391
6392 if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
6393 {
6394 if (m_caster->GetPetGUID())
6395 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6396 if (m_caster->GetCharmGUID())
6397 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6398 }
6399
6400 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->getClass() == CLASS_WARLOCK && strict)
6401 if (Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet())
6402 pet->CastSpell(pet, 32752, true, nullptr, nullptr, pet->GetGUID()); //starting cast, trigger pet stun (cast by pet so it doesn't attack player)
6403
6404 Player* playerCaster = unitCaster->ToPlayer();
6405 if (playerCaster && playerCaster->GetPetStable())
6406 {
6407 std::pair<PetStable::PetInfo const*, PetSaveMode> info = Pet::GetLoadPetInfo(*playerCaster->GetPetStable(), m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue, 0, false);
6408 if (info.first)
6409 {
6410 if (info.first->Type == HUNTER_PET)
6411 {
6412 if (!info.first->Health)
6413 {
6414 playerCaster->SendTameFailure(PET_TAME_DEAD);
6415 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6416 }
6417
6418 CreatureTemplate const* creatureInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(info.first->CreatureId);
6419 if (!creatureInfo || !creatureInfo->IsTameable(playerCaster->CanTameExoticPets()))
6420 {
6421 // if problem in exotic pet
6422 if (creatureInfo && creatureInfo->IsTameable(true))
6423 playerCaster->SendTameFailure(PET_TAME_CANT_CONTROL_EXOTIC);
6424 else
6425 playerCaster->SendTameFailure(PET_TAME_NOPET_AVAILABLE);
6426
6427 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6428 }
6429 }
6430 }
6431 else if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue) // when miscvalue is present it is allowed to create new pets
6432 {
6433 playerCaster->SendTameFailure(PET_TAME_NOPET_AVAILABLE);
6434 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6435 }
6436 }
6437 break;
6438 }
6439 case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PLAYER:
6440 {
6441 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6442 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6443 if (!m_caster->GetTarget())
6444 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6445
6446 Player* target = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTarget());
6447 if (!target || m_caster->ToPlayer() == target || (!target->IsInSameRaidWith(m_caster->ToPlayer()) && m_spellInfo->Id != 48955)) // refer-a-friend spell
6448 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6449
6450 // Xinef: Implement summon pending error
6451 if (target->GetSummonExpireTimer() > GameTime::GetGameTime().count())
6452 return SPELL_FAILED_SUMMON_PENDING;
6453
6454 // check if our map is dungeon
6455 MapEntry const* map = sMapStore.LookupEntry(m_caster->GetMapId());
6456 if (map->IsDungeon())
6457 {
6458 uint32 mapId = m_caster->GetMap()->GetId();
6459 Difficulty difficulty = m_caster->GetMap()->GetDifficulty();
6460 /*if (map->IsRaid())
6461 if (InstancePlayerBind* targetBind = target->GetBoundInstance(mapId, difficulty))
6462 if (targetBind->perm && targetBind != m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetBoundInstance(mapId, difficulty))
6463 return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_LOCKED_TO_RAID_INSTANCE;*/
6464
6465 InstanceTemplate const* instance = sObjectMgr->GetInstanceTemplate(mapId);
6466 if (!instance)
6467 return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_IN_INSTANCE;
6468 if (!target->Satisfy(sObjectMgr->GetAccessRequirement(mapId, difficulty), mapId))
6469 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6470 }
6471 break;
6472 }
6473 // RETURN HERE
6474 case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_RAF_FRIEND:
6475 {
6476 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6477 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6478
6479 Player* playerCaster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
6480 //
6481 if (!(playerCaster->GetTarget()))
6482 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6483
6484 Player* target = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTarget());
6485
6486 if (!target ||
6487 !(target->GetSession()->GetRecruiterId() == playerCaster->GetSession()->GetAccountId() || target->GetSession()->GetAccountId() == playerCaster->GetSession()->GetRecruiterId()))
6488 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6489
6490 // Xinef: Implement summon pending error
6491 if (target->GetSummonExpireTimer() > GameTime::GetGameTime().count())
6492 return SPELL_FAILED_SUMMON_PENDING;
6493
6494 break;
6495 }
6496 case SPELL_EFFECT_LEAP:
6497 case SPELL_EFFECT_TELEPORT_UNITS_FACE_CASTER:
6498 {
6499 //Do not allow to cast it before BG starts.
6500 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6501 if (Battleground const* bg = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetBattleground())
6502 if (bg->GetStatus() != STATUS_IN_PROGRESS)
6503 return SPELL_FAILED_TRY_AGAIN;
6504 break;
6505 }
6506 case SPELL_EFFECT_STEAL_BENEFICIAL_BUFF:
6507 {
6508 if( !m_targets.GetUnitTarget() || m_targets.GetUnitTarget() == m_caster)
6509 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6510
6511 bool found = false;
6512 Unit::VisibleAuraMap const* visibleAuras = m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetVisibleAuras();
6513 for(Unit::VisibleAuraMap::const_iterator itr = visibleAuras->begin(); itr != visibleAuras->end(); ++itr)
6514 {
6515 if( itr->second->GetBase()->IsPassive() )
6516 continue;
6517
6518 if( !itr->second->IsPositive() )
6519 continue;
6520
6521 found = true;
6522 break;
6523 }
6524
6525 if( !found )
6526 return SPELL_FAILED_NOTHING_TO_STEAL;
6527
6528 break;
6529 }
6530 case SPELL_EFFECT_LEAP_BACK:
6531 {
6532 if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT))
6533 {
6534 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6535 return SPELL_FAILED_ROOTED;
6536 else
6537 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6538 }
6539 break;
6540 }
6541 // xinef: do not allow to use leaps while rooted
6542 case SPELL_EFFECT_JUMP:
6543 case SPELL_EFFECT_JUMP_DEST:
6544 {
6545 if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT))
6546 return SPELL_FAILED_ROOTED;
6547 break;
6548 }
6549 case SPELL_EFFECT_TALENT_SPEC_SELECT:
6550 if (!sScriptMgr->CanSelectSpecTalent(this))
6551 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
6552 // can't change during already started arena/battleground
6553 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6554 if (Battleground const* bg = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetBattleground())
6555 if (bg->GetStatus() == STATUS_IN_PROGRESS)
6556 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_IN_BATTLEGROUND;
6557 break;
6558 default:
6559 break;
6560 }
6561 }
6562
6563 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
6564 {
6565 switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName)
6566 {
6567 case SPELL_AURA_DUMMY:
6568 break;
6569 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS_PET:
6570 {
6571 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6572 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6573
6574 Pet* pet = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPet();
6575 if (!pet)
6576 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_PET;
6577
6578 if (pet->GetCharmerGUID())
6579 return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6580 break;
6581 }
6582 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS:
6583 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM:
6584 case SPELL_AURA_AOE_CHARM:
6585 {
6586 if (m_caster->GetCharmerGUID())
6587 return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6588
6589 // Xinef: allow SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS to posses target if caster has some pet
6590 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_DISMISS_PET_FIRST))
6591 {
6592 if (m_caster->GetPetGUID())
6593 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_SUMMON;
6594
6595 if (m_caster->GetCharmGUID())
6596 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6597 }
6598 else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS)
6599 {
6600 if (m_caster->GetCharmGUID())
6601 return SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_HAVE_CHARM;
6602 }
6603
6604 if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6605 {
6606 if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->ToCreature()->IsVehicle())
6607 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6608
6609 if (target->IsMounted())
6610 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_CHARMED;
6611
6612 if (target->GetCharmerGUID())
6613 return SPELL_FAILED_CHARMED;
6614
6615 if (target->GetOwnerGUID() && target->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer())
6616 return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_IS_PLAYER_CONTROLLED;
6617
6618 if (target->IsPet() && (!target->GetOwner() || target->GetOwner()->ToPlayer()))
6619 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_CHARMED;
6620
6621 int32 damage = CalculateSpellDamage(i, target);
6622 if (damage && int32(target->getLevel()) > damage)
6623 return SPELL_FAILED_HIGHLEVEL;
6624 }
6625
6626 break;
6627 }
6628 case SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED:
6629 {
6630 // Xinef: disallow casting in water for mounts not increasing water movement Speed
6631 if (m_caster->IsInWater() && !m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_SWIM_SPEED))
6632 return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_ABOVEWATER;
6633
6634 // Ignore map check if spell have AreaId. AreaId already checked and this prevent special mount spells
6635 bool allowMount = !m_caster->GetMap()->IsDungeon() || m_caster->GetMap()->IsBattlegroundOrArena();
6636 InstanceTemplate const* it = sObjectMgr->GetInstanceTemplate(m_caster->GetMapId());
6637 if (it)
6638 allowMount = it->AllowMount;
6639 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !allowMount && !m_spellInfo->AreaGroupId)
6640 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_MOUNTS_ALLOWED;
6641
6642 if (m_caster->IsInDisallowedMountForm())
6643 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_SHAPESHIFT;
6644
6645 // xinef: dont allow to cast mounts in specific transforms
6646 if (m_caster->getTransForm())
6647 if (SpellInfo const* transformSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_caster->getTransForm()))
6648 if (transformSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_NO_IMMUNITIES) &&
6649 !transformSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SpellAttr0(SPELL_ATTR0_ALLOW_WHILE_MOUNTED | SPELL_ATTR0_AURA_IS_DEBUFF)))
6650 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_SHAPESHIFT;
6651
6652 break;
6653 }
6654 case SPELL_AURA_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_ATTACKER_BONUS:
6655 {
6656 if (!m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6657 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6658
6659 // can be casted at non-friendly unit or own pet/charm
6660 if (m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(m_targets.GetUnitTarget()))
6661 return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_FRIENDLY;
6662
6663 break;
6664 }
6665 case SPELL_AURA_FLY:
6666 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_MOUNTED_FLIGHT_SPEED:
6667 {
6668 // Xinef: added water check
6669 if (m_caster->IsInWater())
6670 return SPELL_FAILED_ONLY_ABOVEWATER;
6671
6672 // not allow cast fly spells if not have req. skills (all spells is self target)
6673 // allow always ghost flight spells
6674 if (m_originalCaster && m_originalCaster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_originalCaster->IsAlive())
6675 {
6676 Battlefield* Bf = sBattlefieldMgr->GetBattlefieldToZoneId(m_originalCaster->GetZoneId());
6677 if (AreaTableEntry const* pArea = sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(m_originalCaster->GetAreaId()))
6678 if ((pArea->flags & AREA_FLAG_NO_FLY_ZONE) || (Bf && !Bf->CanFlyIn()))
6679 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_HERE;
6680 }
6681 break;
6682 }
6683 case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH:
6684 {
6685 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsTargetingArea())
6686 break;
6687
6688 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || m_CastItem)
6689 break;
6690
6691 if (!m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6692 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6693
6694 if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->getPowerType() != POWER_MANA)
6695 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6696
6697 break;
6698 }
6699 case SPELL_AURA_HOVER:
6700 {
6701 if ((m_spellInfo->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_MOUNT) != 0 && m_targets.GetUnitTarget() && m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->IsMounted())
6702 {
6703 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_ON_MOUNTED;
6704 }
6705 break;
6706 }
6707 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT:
6708 {
6709 if (m_caster && m_caster->HasAura(23397)) // Nefarian Class Call (Warrior): Berserk -- Nefertum: I don't really like this but I didn't find another way.
6710 {
6711 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_SHAPESHIFT;
6712 }
6713 break;
6714 }
6715 default:
6716 break;
6717 }
6718 }
6719
6720 // check trade slot case (last, for allow catch any another cast problems)
6721 if (m_targets.GetTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_TRADE_ITEM)
6722 {
6723 if (m_CastItem)
6724 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_ENCHANT_TRADE_WINDOW;
6725
6726 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6727 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADING;
6728
6729 TradeData* my_trade = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTradeData();
6730
6731 if (!my_trade)
6732 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADING;
6733
6734 TradeSlots slot = TradeSlots(m_targets.GetItemTargetGUID().GetRawValue());
6735 if (slot != TRADE_SLOT_NONTRADED)
6736 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
6737
6738 if (!IsTriggered())
6739 if (my_trade->GetSpell())
6740 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_ALREADY_ENCHANTED;
6741 }
6742
6743 // check if caster has at least 1 combo point on target for spells that require combo points
6744 if (m_needComboPoints)
6745 {
6746 if (m_spellInfo->NeedsExplicitUnitTarget())
6747 {
