6748 if (!m_caster->GetComboPoints(m_targets.GetUnitTarget()))
6749 {
6750 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_COMBO_POINTS;
6751 }
6752 }
6753 else
6754 {
6755 if (!m_caster->GetComboPoints())
6756 {
6757 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_COMBO_POINTS;
6758 }
6759 }
6760 }
6761
6762 // xinef: check relic cooldown
6763 if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->InventoryType == INVTYPE_RELIC && m_triggeredByAuraSpell)
6764 if (m_caster->HasSpellCooldown(SPELL_RELIC_COOLDOWN) && !m_caster->HasSpellItemCooldown(SPELL_RELIC_COOLDOWN, m_CastItem->GetEntry()))
6765 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
6766
6767 // all ok
6768 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6769}
6770
6771SpellCastResult Spell::CheckPetCast(Unit* target)
6772{
6773 if (m_caster->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING) && !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_IN_PROGRESS)) //prevent spellcast interruption by another spellcast
6774 return SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS;
6775
6776 // dead owner (pets still alive when owners ressed?)
6777 if (Unit* owner = m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwner())
6778 if (!owner->IsAlive() && m_caster->GetEntry() != 30230) // Rise Ally
6779 return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_DEAD;
6780
6781 if (!target && m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
6782 target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget();
6783
6784 if (m_spellInfo->NeedsExplicitUnitTarget())
6785 {
6786 if (!target)
6787 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
6788 m_targets.SetUnitTarget(target);
6789 }
6790
6791 // xinef: Calculate power cost here, so funciton checking power can work properly and dont return bad results
6792 m_powerCost = m_spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(m_caster, m_spellSchoolMask, this);
6793
6794 // cooldown
6795 if (Creature const* creatureCaster = m_caster->ToCreature())
6796 if (creatureCaster->HasSpellCooldown(m_spellInfo->Id))
6797 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
6798
6799 // Check if spell is affected by GCD
6800 if (m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryCategory > 0)
6801 if (m_caster->GetCharmInfo() && m_caster->GetCharmInfo()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().HasGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo))
6802 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_READY;
6803
6804 return CheckCast(true);
6805}
6806
6807SpellCastResult Spell::CheckCasterAuras(bool preventionOnly) const
6808{
6809 // spells totally immuned to caster auras (wsg flag drop, give marks etc)
6810 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_NOT_AN_ATTACK))
6811 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6812
6813 uint8 school_immune = 0;
6814 uint32 mechanic_immune = 0;
6815 uint32 dispel_immune = 0;
6816
6817 // Check if the spell grants school or mechanic immunity.
6818 // We use bitmasks so the loop is done only once and not on every aura check below.
6819 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
6820 {
6821 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
6822 {
6823 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_SCHOOL_IMMUNITY)
6824 school_immune |= uint32(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue);
6825 else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_IMMUNITY)
6826 mechanic_immune |= 1 << uint32(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue);
6827 else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName == SPELL_AURA_DISPEL_IMMUNITY)
6828 dispel_immune |= SpellInfo::GetDispelMask(DispelType(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue));
6829 }
6830 // immune movement impairment and loss of control
6831 // PVP trinket EMFH TOC PVP trinket Bullheaded Bestial Wrath // Beath Within // Medalion of Immunity
6832 if (m_spellInfo->Id == 42292 || m_spellInfo->Id == 59752 || m_spellInfo->Id == 65547 || m_spellInfo->Id == 53490 || m_spellInfo->Id == 19574 || m_spellInfo->Id == 34471 || m_spellInfo->Id == 46227)
6833 mechanic_immune = IMMUNE_TO_MOVEMENT_IMPAIRMENT_AND_LOSS_CONTROL_MASK;
6834 }
6835
6836 bool usableInStun = m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_STUNNED);
6837
6838 // Glyph of Pain Suppression
6839 // there is no other way to handle it
6840 if (m_spellInfo->Id == 33206 && !m_caster->HasAura(63248))
6841 usableInStun = false;
6842
6843 // Check whether the cast should be prevented by any state you might have.
6844 SpellCastResult prevented_reason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
6845 // Have to check if there is a stun aura. Otherwise will have problems with ghost aura apply while logging out
6846 uint32 unitflag = m_caster->GetUnitFlags(); // Get unit state
6847
6848 // Xinef: if spell is triggered check preventionType only
6849 if (!preventionOnly)
6850 {
6851 if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED)
6852 {
6853 // spell is usable while stunned, check if caster has only mechanic stun auras, another stun types must prevent cast spell
6854 if (usableInStun)
6855 {
6856 bool foundNotStun = false;
6857 uint32 mask = (1 << MECHANIC_STUN) | (1 << MECHANIC_FREEZE) | (1 << MECHANIC_HORROR);
6858 // Barkskin should skip sleep effects, sap and fears
6859 if (m_spellInfo->Id == 22812)
6860 mask |= 1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED | 1 << MECHANIC_HORROR | 1 << MECHANIC_SLEEP;
6861 // Hand of Freedom, can be used while sapped
6862 if (m_spellInfo->Id == 1044)
6863 mask |= 1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED;
6864 Unit::AuraEffectList const& stunAuras = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
6865 for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = stunAuras.begin(); i != stunAuras.end(); ++i)
6866 {
6867 if ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() && !((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() & mask))
6868 {
6869 foundNotStun = true;
6870 break;
6871 }
6872 }
6873 if (foundNotStun)
6874 prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_STUNNED;
6875 }
6876 else
6877 prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_STUNNED;
6878 }
6879 else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_CONFUSED))
6880 prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_CONFUSED;
6881 else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_FLEEING))
6882 prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_FLEEING;
6883 }
6884
6885 // Xinef: if there is no prevented_reason, check prevention types
6886 if (prevented_reason == SPELL_CAST_OK)
6887 {
6888 if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED && m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE)
6889 prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_SILENCED;
6890 else if (unitflag & UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED && m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY)
6891 prevented_reason = SPELL_FAILED_PACIFIED;
6892 }
6893
6894 // Attr must make flag drop spell totally immune from all effects
6895 if (prevented_reason != SPELL_CAST_OK)
6896 {
6897 if (school_immune || mechanic_immune || dispel_immune)
6898 {
6899 //Checking auras is needed now, because you are prevented by some state but the spell grants immunity.
6900 Unit::AuraApplicationMap const& auras = m_caster->GetAppliedAuras();
6901 for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::const_iterator itr = auras.begin(); itr != auras.end(); ++itr)
6902 {
6903 Aura const* aura = itr->second->GetBase();
6904 SpellInfo const* auraInfo = aura->GetSpellInfo();
6905 if (auraInfo->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() & mechanic_immune)
6906 continue;
6907 if (auraInfo->GetSchoolMask() & school_immune && !auraInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR1_IMMUNITY_TO_HOSTILE_AND_FRIENDLY_EFFECTS))
6908 continue;
6909 if (auraInfo->GetDispelMask() & dispel_immune)
6910 continue;
6911
6912 //Make a second check for spell failed so the right SPELL_FAILED message is returned.
6913 //That is needed when your casting is prevented by multiple states and you are only immune to some of them.
6914 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
6915 {
6916 if (AuraEffect* part = aura->GetEffect(i))
6917 {
6918 switch (part->GetAuraType())
6919 {
6920 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN:
6921 {
6922 uint32 mask = 1 << MECHANIC_STUN;
6923 // Barkskin should skip sleep effects, sap and fears
6924 if (m_spellInfo->Id == 22812)
6925 mask |= 1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED | 1 << MECHANIC_HORROR | 1 << MECHANIC_SLEEP;
6926 // Hand of Freedom, can be used while sapped
6927 if (m_spellInfo->Id == 1044)
6928 mask |= 1 << MECHANIC_SAPPED;
6929
6930 if (!usableInStun || !(auraInfo->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() & mask))
6931 return SPELL_FAILED_STUNNED;
6932 break;
6933 }
6934 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE:
6935 if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_CONFUSED))
6936 return SPELL_FAILED_CONFUSED;
6937 break;
6938 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR:
6939 if (!m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR5_ALLOW_WHILE_FLEEING))
6940 return SPELL_FAILED_FLEEING;
6941 break;
6942 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_SILENCE:
6943 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY:
6944 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_PACIFY_SILENCE:
6945 if (m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_PACIFY)
6946 return SPELL_FAILED_PACIFIED;
6947 else if (m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE)
6948 return SPELL_FAILED_SILENCED;
6949 break;
6950 default:
6951 break;
6952 }
6953 }
6954 }
6955 }
6956 }
6957 // You are prevented from casting and the spell casted does not grant immunity. Return a failed error.
6958 else
6959 return prevented_reason;
6960 }
6961 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
6962}
6963
6964bool Spell::CanAutoCast(Unit* target)
6965{
6966 ObjectGuid targetguid = target->GetGUID();
6967
6968 for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
6969 {
6970 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AURA)
6971 {
6972 if (m_spellInfo->StackAmount <= 1)
6973 {
6974 if (target->HasAuraEffect(m_spellInfo->Id, j))
6975 return false;
6976 }
6977 else
6978 {
6979 if (AuraEffect* aureff = target->GetAuraEffect(m_spellInfo->Id, j))
6980 if (aureff->GetBase()->GetStackAmount() >= m_spellInfo->StackAmount)
6981 return false;
6982 }
6983 }
6984 else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[j].IsAreaAuraEffect())
6985 {
6986 if (target->HasAuraEffect(m_spellInfo->Id, j))
6987 return false;
6988 }
6989 }
6990
6991 SpellCastResult result = CheckPetCast(target);
6992
6993 if (result == SPELL_CAST_OK || result == SPELL_FAILED_UNIT_NOT_INFRONT)
6994 {
6995 SelectSpellTargets();
6996 //check if among target units, our WANTED target is as well (->only self cast spells return false)
6997 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
6998 if (ihit->targetGUID == targetguid)
6999 return true;
7000 }
7001 return false; //target invalid
7002}
7003
7004SpellCastResult Spell::CheckRange(bool strict)
7005{
7006 // Don't check for instant cast spells
7007 if (!strict && m_casttime == 0)
7008 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7009
7010 uint32 range_type = 0;
7011
7012 if (m_spellInfo->RangeEntry)
7013 {
7014 // check needed by 68766 51693 - both spells are cast on enemies and have 0 max range
7015 // these are triggered by other spells - possibly we should omit range check in that case?
7016 if (m_spellInfo->RangeEntry->ID == 1)
7017 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7018
7019 range_type = m_spellInfo->RangeEntry->Flags;
7020 }
7021
7022 Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget();
7023 float max_range = m_caster->GetSpellMaxRangeForTarget(target, m_spellInfo);
7024 float min_range = m_caster->GetSpellMinRangeForTarget(target, m_spellInfo);
7025
7026 // xinef: hack for npc shooters
7027 if (min_range && GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !GetCaster()->GetOwnerGUID().IsPlayer() && min_range <= 6.0f)
7028 range_type = SPELL_RANGE_RANGED;
7029
7030 if (Player* modOwner = m_caster->GetSpellModOwner())
7031 modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_RANGE, max_range, this);
7032
7033 // xinef: dont check max_range to strictly after cast
7034 if (range_type != SPELL_RANGE_MELEE && !strict)
7035 max_range += std::min(3.0f, max_range * 0.1f); // 10% but no more than 3yd
7036
7037 if (target)
7038 {
7039 if (target != m_caster)
7040 {
7041 // Xinef: Spells with 5yd range can hit target 9yd away?
7042 if (range_type == SPELL_RANGE_MELEE)
7043 {
7044 float real_max_range = max_range;
7045 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->isMoving() && target->isMoving() && !m_caster->IsWalking() && !target->IsWalking())
7046 real_max_range -= MIN_MELEE_REACH; // Because of lag, we can not check too strictly here (is only used if both caster and target are moving)
7047 else
7048 real_max_range -= 2 * MIN_MELEE_REACH;
7049
7050 if (!m_caster->IsWithinMeleeRange(target, std::max(real_max_range, 0.0f)))
7051 return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
7052 }
7053 else if (!m_caster->IsWithinCombatRange(target, max_range))
7054 return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE; //0x5A;
7055
7056 if (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED && range_type == SPELL_RANGE_RANGED)
7057 {
7058 if (m_caster->IsWithinMeleeRange(target))
7059 return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_CLOSE;
7060 }
7061
7062 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (m_spellInfo->FacingCasterFlags & SPELL_FACING_FLAG_INFRONT) && !m_caster->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), target))
7063 return SPELL_FAILED_UNIT_NOT_INFRONT;
7064 }
7065
7066 // Xinef: check min range for self casts
7067 if (min_range && range_type != SPELL_RANGE_RANGED && m_caster->IsWithinCombatRange(target, min_range)) // skip this check if min_range = 0
7068 return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_CLOSE;
7069 }
7070
7071 if (GameObject* goTarget = m_targets.GetGOTarget())
7072 {
7073 if (!goTarget->IsAtInteractDistance(m_caster->ToPlayer(), m_spellInfo))
7074 {
7075 return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
7076 }
7077 }
7078
7079 if (m_targets.HasDst() && !m_targets.HasTraj())
7080 {
7081 if (!m_caster->IsWithinDist3d(m_targets.GetDstPos(), max_range))
7082 return SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE;
7083 if (min_range && m_caster->IsWithinDist3d(m_targets.GetDstPos(), min_range))
7084 return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_CLOSE;
7085 }
7086
7087 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7088}
7089
7090SpellCastResult Spell::CheckPower()
7091{
7092 // item cast not used power
7093 if (m_CastItem)
7094 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7095
7096 //While .cheat power is enabled dont check if we need power to cast the spell
7097 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7098 {
7099 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_POWER))
7100 {
7101 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7102 }
7103 }
7104
7105 // health as power used - need check health amount
7106 if (m_spellInfo->PowerType == POWER_HEALTH)
7107 {
7108 if (int32(m_caster->GetHealth()) <= m_powerCost)
7109 return SPELL_FAILED_CASTER_AURASTATE;
7110 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7111 }
7112 // Check valid power type
7113 if (m_spellInfo->PowerType >= MAX_POWERS)
7114 {
7115 LOG_ERROR("spells", "Spell::CheckPower: Unknown power type '{}'", m_spellInfo->PowerType);
7116 return SPELL_FAILED_UNKNOWN;
7117 }
7118
7119 //check rune cost only if a spell has PowerType == POWER_RUNE
7120 if (m_spellInfo->PowerType == POWER_RUNE)
7121 {
7122 SpellCastResult failReason = CheckRuneCost(m_spellInfo->RuneCostID);
7123 if (failReason != SPELL_CAST_OK)
7124 return failReason;
7125 }
7126
7127 // Check power amount
7128 Powers PowerType = Powers(m_spellInfo->PowerType);
7129 if (int32(m_caster->GetPower(PowerType)) < m_powerCost)
7130 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_POWER;
7131 else
7132 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7133}
7134
7135SpellCastResult Spell::CheckItems()
7136{
7137 Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
7138 if (!player)
7139 {
7140 // Non-player case: Check if creature is disarmed
7141 if (!m_caster->CanUseAttackType(m_attackType) && (m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE || m_spellInfo->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED))
7142 {
7143 return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS;
7144 }
7145
7146 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7147 }
7148
7149 if (!m_CastItem)
7150 {
7151 if (m_castItemGUID)
7152 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_READY;
7153 }
7154 else
7155 {
7156 uint32 itemid = m_CastItem->GetEntry();
7157 if (!player->HasItemCount(itemid))
7158 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_READY;
7159
7160 ItemTemplate const* proto = m_CastItem->GetTemplate();
7161 if (!proto)
7162 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_READY;
7163
7164 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ITEM_SPELLS; ++i)
7165 if (proto->Spells[i].SpellCharges)
7166 if (m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(i) == 0)
7167 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_CHARGES_REMAIN;
7168
7169 // consumable cast item checks
7170 if (proto->Class == ITEM_CLASS_CONSUMABLE && m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
7171 {
7172 // such items should only fail if there is no suitable effect at all - see Rejuvenation Potions for example
7173 SpellCastResult failReason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
7174 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; i++)
7175 {
7176 // skip check, pet not required like checks, and for TARGET_UNIT_PET m_targets.GetUnitTarget() is not the real target but the caster
7177 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_PET)
7178 continue;
7179
7180 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_HEAL)
7181 {
7182 if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->IsFullHealth())
7183 {
7184 failReason = SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_AT_FULL_HEALTH;
7185 continue;
7186 }
7187 else
7188 {
7189 failReason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
7190 break;
7191 }
7192 }
7193
7194 // Mana Potion, Rage Potion, Thistle Tea(Rogue), ...
7195 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_ENERGIZE)
7196 {
7197 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue < 0 || m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue >= int8(MAX_POWERS))
7198 {
7199 failReason = SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_AT_FULL_POWER;
7200 continue;
7201 }
7202
7203 Powers power = Powers(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue);
7204 if (m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetPower(power) == m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetMaxPower(power))
7205 {
7206 failReason = SPELL_FAILED_ALREADY_AT_FULL_POWER;
7207 continue;
7208 }
7209 else
7210 {
7211 failReason = SPELL_CAST_OK;
7212 break;
7213 }
7214 }
7215 }
7216 if (failReason != SPELL_CAST_OK)
7217 return failReason;
7218 }
7219 }
7220
7221 // check target item
7222 if (m_targets.GetItemTargetGUID())
7223 {
7224 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7225 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
7226
7227 if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget())
7228 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_GONE;
7229
7230 if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget()->IsFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
7231 return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS;
7232 }
7233 // if not item target then required item must be equipped
7234 else
7235 {
7236 // Xinef: this is not true in my opinion, in eg bladestorm will not be canceled after disarm
7237 //if (!(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_EQUIPPED_ITEM_REQUIREMENT))
7238 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasItemFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
7239 return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS;
7240 }
7241
7242 // do not take reagents for these item casts
7243 if (!(m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST))
7244 {
7245 bool checkReagents = !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_POWER_AND_REAGENT_COST) && !player->CanNoReagentCast(m_spellInfo);
7246 // Not own traded item (in trader trade slot) requires reagents even if triggered spell
7247 if (!checkReagents)
7248 if (Item* targetItem = m_targets.GetItemTarget())
7249 if (targetItem->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
7250 checkReagents = true;
7251
7252 // check reagents (ignore triggered spells with reagents processed by original spell) and special reagent ignore case.
7253 if (checkReagents)
7254 {
7255 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_REAGENTS; i++)
7256 {
7257 if (m_spellInfo->Reagent[i] <= 0)
7258 continue;
7259
7260 uint32 itemid = m_spellInfo->Reagent[i];
7261 uint32 itemcount = m_spellInfo->ReagentCount[i];
7262
7263 // if CastItem is also spell reagent
7264 if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetEntry() == itemid)
7265 {
7266 ItemTemplate const* proto = m_CastItem->GetTemplate();
7267 if (!proto)
7268 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_READY;
7269 for (int s = 0; s < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++s)
7270 {
7271 // CastItem will be used up and does not count as reagent
7272 int32 charges = m_CastItem->GetSpellCharges(s);
7273 if (proto->Spells[s].SpellCharges < 0 && std::abs(charges) < 2)
7274 {
7275 ++itemcount;
7276 break;
7277 }
7278 }
7279 }
7280 if (!player->HasItemCount(itemid, itemcount))
7281 return SPELL_FAILED_REAGENTS;
7282 }
7283 }
7284
7285 // check totem-item requirements (items presence in inventory)
7286 uint32 totems = 2;
7287 for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
7288 {
7289 if (m_spellInfo->Totem[i] != 0)
7290 {
7291 if (player->HasItemCount(m_spellInfo->Totem[i]))
7292 {
7293 totems -= 1;
7294 continue;
7295 }
7296 }
7297 else
7298 totems -= 1;
7299 }
7300 if (totems != 0)
7301 return SPELL_FAILED_TOTEMS; //0x7C
7302
7303 // Check items for TotemCategory (items presence in inventory)
7304 uint32 TotemCategory = 2;
7305 for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
7306 {
7307 if (m_spellInfo->TotemCategory[i] != 0)
7308 {
7309 if (player->HasItemTotemCategory(m_spellInfo->TotemCategory[i]))
7310 {
7311 TotemCategory -= 1;
7312 continue;
7313 }
7314 }
7315 else
7316 TotemCategory -= 1;
7317 }
7318 if (TotemCategory != 0)
7319 return SPELL_FAILED_TOTEM_CATEGORY; //0x7B
7320 }
7321
7322 // special checks for spell effects
7323 for (int i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; i++)
7324 {
7325 switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect)
7326 {
7327 case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM:
7328 case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM_2:
7329 {
7330 // m_targets.GetUnitTarget() means explicit cast, otherwise we dont check for possible equip error
7331 Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget() ? m_targets.GetUnitTarget() : player;
7332 if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !IsTriggered())
7333 {
7334 // SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM_2 differs from SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM in that it picks the random item to create from a pool of potential items,
7335 // so we need to make sure there is at least one free space in the player's inventory
7336 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_ITEM_2)
7337 if (target->ToPlayer()->GetFreeInventorySpace() == 0)
7338 {
7339 player->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
7340 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7341 }
7342
7343 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType)
7344 {
7345 ItemTemplate const* itemTemplate = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
7346 if (!itemTemplate)
7347 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
7348
7349 uint32 createCount = std::clamp<uint32>(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].CalcValue(), 1u, itemTemplate->GetMaxStackSize());
7350 ItemPosCountVec dest;
7351 InventoryResult msg = target->ToPlayer()->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType, createCount);
7352 if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
7353 {
7355 if (!itemTemplate->ItemLimitCategory)
7356 {
7357 player->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
7358 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7359 }
7360 else
7361 {
7362 // Conjure Food/Water/Refreshment spells
7363 if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_MAGE || (!(m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x40000000)))
7364 return SPELL_FAILED_TOO_MANY_OF_ITEM;
7365 else if (!(target->ToPlayer()->HasItemCount(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType)))
7366 {
7367 player->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
7368 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7369 }
7370 else
7371 player->CastSpell(player, m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcValue(), false); // move this to anywhere
7372
7373 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7374 }
7375 }
7376 }
7377 }
7378 break;
7379 }
7380 case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_RANDOM_ITEM:
7381 {
7382 if (player->GetFreeInventorySpace() == 0)
7383 {
7384 player->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
7385 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7386 }
7387 break;
7388 }
7389 case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM:
7390 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType && m_targets.GetItemTarget()
7391 && (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->IsWeaponVellum() || m_targets.GetItemTarget()->IsArmorVellum()))
7392 {
7393 // cannot enchant vellum for other player
7394 if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetOwner() != m_caster)
7395 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
7396 // do not allow to enchant vellum from scroll made by vellum-prevent exploit
7397 if (m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST)
7398 return SPELL_FAILED_TOTEM_CATEGORY;
7399 ItemPosCountVec dest;
7400 InventoryResult msg = player->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType, 1);
7401 if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
7402 {
7403 player->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
7404 return SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT;
7405 }
7406 }
7407 [[fallthrough]]; // TODO: Not sure whether the fallthrough was a mistake (forgetting a break) or intended. This should be double-checked.
7408 case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_PRISMATIC:
7409 {
7410 Item* targetItem = m_targets.GetItemTarget();
7411 if (!targetItem)
7412 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
7413
7414 // xinef: required level has to be checked also! Exploit fix
7415 if (targetItem->GetTemplate()->ItemLevel < m_spellInfo->BaseLevel || (targetItem->GetTemplate()->RequiredLevel && targetItem->GetTemplate()->RequiredLevel < m_spellInfo->BaseLevel))
7416 return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
7417
7418 bool isItemUsable = false;
7419 for (uint8 e = 0; e < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++e)
7420 {
7421 ItemTemplate const* proto = targetItem->GetTemplate();
7422 if (proto->Spells[e].SpellId && (
7423 proto->Spells[e].SpellTrigger == ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_USE ||
7424 proto->Spells[e].SpellTrigger == ITEM_SPELLTRIGGER_ON_NO_DELAY_USE))
7425 {
7426 isItemUsable = true;
7427 break;
7428 }
7429 }
7430
7431 SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* enchantEntry = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue);
7432 // do not allow adding usable enchantments to items that have use effect already
7433 if (enchantEntry)
7434 {
7435 for (uint8 s = 0; s < MAX_SPELL_ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_EFFECTS; ++s)
7436 {
7437 switch (enchantEntry->type[s])
7438 {
7439 case ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_USE_SPELL:
7440 if (isItemUsable)
7441 return SPELL_FAILED_ON_USE_ENCHANT;
7442 break;
7443 case ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_PRISMATIC_SOCKET:
7444 {
7445 uint32 numSockets = 0;
7446 for (uint32 socket = 0; socket < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SOCKETS; ++socket)
7447 if (targetItem->GetTemplate()->Socket[socket].Color)
7448 ++numSockets;
7449
7450 if (numSockets == MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SOCKETS || targetItem->GetEnchantmentId(PRISMATIC_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT))
7451 return SPELL_FAILED_MAX_SOCKETS;
7452 break;
7453 }
7454 }
7455 }
7456 }
7457
7458 // Not allow enchant in trade slot for some enchant type
7459 if (targetItem->GetOwner() != m_caster)
7460 {
7461 if (!enchantEntry)
7462 return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
7463 if (enchantEntry->slot & ENCHANTMENT_CAN_SOULBOUND)
7464 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
7465 }
7466 break;
7467 }
7468 case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_TEMPORARY:
7469 {
7470 Item* item = m_targets.GetItemTarget();
7471 if (!item)
7472 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
7473 // Not allow enchant in trade slot for some enchant type
7474 if (item->GetOwner() != m_caster)
7475 {
7476 uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue;
7477 SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
7478 if (!pEnchant)
7479 return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
7480 if (pEnchant->slot & ENCHANTMENT_CAN_SOULBOUND)
7481 return SPELL_FAILED_NOT_TRADEABLE;
7482 }
7483
7484 // Xinef: Apply item level restriction if the enchanting spell has max level restrition set
7485 if (m_CastItem && m_spellInfo->MaxLevel > 0)
7486 {
7487 if (item->GetTemplate()->ItemLevel < m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->RequiredLevel)
7488 return SPELL_FAILED_LOWLEVEL;
7489 if (item->GetTemplate()->ItemLevel > m_spellInfo->MaxLevel)
7490 return SPELL_FAILED_HIGHLEVEL;
7491 }
7492
7493 break;
7494 }
7495 case SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_HELD_ITEM:
7496 // check item existence in effect code (not output errors at offhand hold item effect to main hand for example
7497 break;
7498 case SPELL_EFFECT_DISENCHANT:
7499 {
7500 if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget())
7501 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7502
7503 // prevent disenchanting in trade slot
7504 if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
7505 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7506
7507 ItemTemplate const* itemProto = m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate();
7508 if (!itemProto)
7509 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7510
7511 uint32 item_quality = itemProto->Quality;
7512 // 2.0.x addon: Check player enchanting level against the item disenchanting requirements
7513 uint32 item_disenchantskilllevel = itemProto->RequiredDisenchantSkill;
7514 if (item_disenchantskilllevel == uint32(-1))
7515 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7516 if (item_disenchantskilllevel > player->GetSkillValue(SKILL_ENCHANTING))
7517 return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
7518 if (item_quality > 4 || item_quality < 2)
7519 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7520 if (itemProto->Class != ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON && itemProto->Class != ITEM_CLASS_ARMOR)
7521 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7522 if (!itemProto->DisenchantID)
7523 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_DISENCHANTED;
7524 break;
7525 }
7526 case SPELL_EFFECT_PROSPECTING:
7527 {
7528 if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget())
7529 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
7530 //ensure item is a prospectable ore
7531 if (!(m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_IS_PROSPECTABLE))
7532 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
7533 //prevent prospecting in trade slot
7534 if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
7535 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
7536 //Check for enough skill in jewelcrafting
7537 uint32 item_prospectingskilllevel = m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate()->RequiredSkillRank;
7538 if (item_prospectingskilllevel > player->GetSkillValue(SKILL_JEWELCRAFTING))
7539 return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
7540 //make sure the player has the required ores in inventory
7541 if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetCount() < 5)
7542 return SPELL_FAILED_NEED_MORE_ITEMS;
7543
7544 if (!LootTemplates_Prospecting.HaveLootFor(m_targets.GetItemTargetEntry()))
7545 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_PROSPECTED;
7546
7547 break;
7548 }
7549 case SPELL_EFFECT_MILLING:
7550 {
7551 if (!m_targets.GetItemTarget())
7552 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
7553 //ensure item is a millable herb
7554 if (!(m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_IS_MILLABLE))
7555 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
7556 //prevent milling in trade slot
7557 if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetOwnerGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
7558 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
7559 //Check for enough skill in inscription
7560 uint32 item_millingskilllevel = m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetTemplate()->RequiredSkillRank;
7561 if (item_millingskilllevel > player->GetSkillValue(SKILL_INSCRIPTION))
7562 return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
7563 //make sure the player has the required herbs in inventory
7564 if (m_targets.GetItemTarget()->GetCount() < 5)
7565 return SPELL_FAILED_NEED_MORE_ITEMS;
7566
7567 if (!LootTemplates_Milling.HaveLootFor(m_targets.GetItemTargetEntry()))
7568 return SPELL_FAILED_CANT_BE_MILLED;
7569
7570 break;
7571 }
7572 case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
7573 case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
7574 {
7575 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7576 return SPELL_FAILED_TARGET_NOT_PLAYER;
7577
7578 if (m_attackType != RANGED_ATTACK)
7579 break;
7580
7581 Item* pItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(m_attackType);
7582 if (!pItem || pItem->IsBroken())
7583 return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM;
7584
7585 switch (pItem->GetTemplate()->SubClass)
7586 {
7587 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_THROWN:
7588 {
7589 uint32 ammo = pItem->GetEntry();
7590 if (!m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasItemCount(ammo))
7591 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7592 };
7593 break;
7594 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_GUN:
7595 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_BOW:
7596 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_CROSSBOW:
7597 {
7598 uint32 ammo = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID);
7599 if (!ammo)
7600 {
7601 // Requires No Ammo
7602 if (m_caster->HasAura(46699))
7603 break; // skip other checks
7604
7605 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7606 }
7607
7608 ItemTemplate const* ammoProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(ammo);
7609 if (!ammoProto)
7610 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7611
7612 if (ammoProto->Class != ITEM_CLASS_PROJECTILE)
7613 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7614
7615 // check ammo ws. weapon compatibility
7616 switch (pItem->GetTemplate()->SubClass)
7617 {
7618 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_BOW:
7619 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_CROSSBOW:
7620 if (ammoProto->SubClass != ITEM_SUBCLASS_ARROW)
7621 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7622 break;
7623 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_GUN:
7624 if (ammoProto->SubClass != ITEM_SUBCLASS_BULLET)
7625 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7626 break;
7627 default:
7628 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7629 }
7630
7631 if (!m_caster->ToPlayer()->HasItemCount(ammo))
7632 {
7633 m_caster->ToPlayer()->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_AMMO_ID, 0);
7634 return SPELL_FAILED_NO_AMMO;
7635 }
7636 };
7637 break;
7638 case ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_WAND:
7639 break;
7640 default:
7641 break;
7642 }
7643 break;
7644 }
7645 case SPELL_EFFECT_CREATE_MANA_GEM:
7646 {
7647 uint32 item_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType;
7648 ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(item_id);
7649
7650 if (!pProto)
7651 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_AT_MAX_CHARGES;
7652
7653 if (Item* pitem = player->GetItemByEntry(item_id))
7654 {
7655 for (int x = 0; x < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++x)
7656 if (pProto->Spells[x].SpellCharges != 0 && pitem->GetSpellCharges(x) == pProto->Spells[x].SpellCharges)
7657 return SPELL_FAILED_ITEM_AT_MAX_CHARGES;
7658 }
7659 break;
7660 }
7661 default:
7662 break;
7663 }
7664 }
7665
7666 // check weapon presence in slots for main/offhand weapons
7667 if (/*never skip those checks !(_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_EQUIPPED_ITEM_REQUIREMENT) &&*/ m_spellInfo->EquippedItemClass >= 0)
7668 {
7669 // main hand weapon required
7670 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_REQUIRES_MAIN_HAND_WEAPON))
7671 {
7672 Item* item = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(BASE_ATTACK);
7673
7674 // skip spell if no weapon in slot or broken
7675 if (!item || item->IsBroken())
7676 return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_MAINHAND;
7677
7678 // skip spell if weapon not fit to triggered spell
7679 if (!item->IsFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
7680 return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_MAINHAND;
7681 }
7682
7683 // offhand hand weapon required
7684 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR3_REQUIRES_OFF_HAND_WEAPON))
7685 {
7686 Item* item = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(OFF_ATTACK);
7687
7688 // skip spell if no weapon in slot or broken
7689 if (!item || item->IsBroken())
7690 return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_OFFHAND;
7691
7692 // skip spell if weapon not fit to triggered spell
7693 if (!item->IsFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
7694 return SPELL_FAILED_EQUIPPED_ITEM_CLASS_OFFHAND;
7695 }
7696
7697 m_weaponItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(m_attackType, true);
7698 }
7699
7700 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7701}
7702
7703SpellCastResult Spell::CheckSpellFocus()
7704{
7705 // check spell focus object
7706 if (m_spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus)
7707 {
7708 CellCoord p(Acore::ComputeCellCoord(m_caster->GetPositionX(), m_caster->GetPositionY()));
7709 Cell cell(p);
7710
7711 GameObject* ok = nullptr;
7712 Acore::GameObjectFocusCheck go_check(m_caster, m_spellInfo->RequiresSpellFocus);
7713 Acore::GameObjectSearcher<Acore::GameObjectFocusCheck> checker(m_caster, ok, go_check);
7714
7715 TypeContainerVisitor<Acore::GameObjectSearcher<Acore::GameObjectFocusCheck>, GridTypeMapContainer > object_checker(checker);
7716 Map& map = *m_caster->GetMap();
7717 cell.Visit(p, object_checker, map, *m_caster, m_caster->GetVisibilityRange());
7718
7719 if (!ok)
7720 return SPELL_FAILED_REQUIRES_SPELL_FOCUS;
7721
7722 focusObject = ok; // game object found in range
7723 }
7724 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
7725}
7726
7727void Spell::Delayed() // only called in DealDamage()
7728{
7729 if (!m_caster)// || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7730 return;
7731
7732 //if (m_spellState == SPELL_STATE_DELAYED)
7733 // return; // spell is active and can't be time-backed
7734
7735 if (isDelayableNoMore()) // Spells may only be delayed twice
7736 return;
7737
7738 // spells not loosing casting time (slam, dynamites, bombs..)
7739 //if (!(m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE))
7740 // return;
7741
7742 //check pushback reduce
7743 int32 delaytime = 500; // spellcasting delay is normally 500ms
7744 int32 delayReduce = 100; // must be initialized to 100 for percent modifiers
7745 m_caster->ToPlayer()->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_NOT_LOSE_CASTING_TIME, delayReduce, this);
7746 delayReduce += m_caster->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_REDUCE_PUSHBACK) - 100;
7747 if (delayReduce >= 100)
7748 return;
7749
7750 AddPct(delaytime, -delayReduce);
7751
7752 if (m_timer + delaytime > m_casttime)
7753 {
7754 delaytime = m_casttime - m_timer;
7755 m_timer = m_casttime;
7756 }
7757 else
7758 m_timer += delaytime;
7759
7760 LOG_DEBUG("spells", "Spell {} partially interrupted for ({}) ms at damage", m_spellInfo->Id, delaytime);
7761
7762 WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELL_DELAYED, 8 + 4);
7763 data << m_caster->GetPackGUID();
7764 data << uint32(delaytime);
7765
7766 m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
7767}
7768
7769void Spell::DelayedChannel()
7770{
7771 if (!m_caster || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || getState() != SPELL_STATE_CASTING)
7772 return;
7773
7774 if (isDelayableNoMore()) // Spells may only be delayed twice
7775 return;
7776
7777 //check pushback reduce
7778 // should be affected by modifiers, not take the dbc duration.
7779 int32 duration = ((m_channeledDuration > 0) ? m_channeledDuration : m_spellInfo->GetDuration());
7780
7781 int32 delaytime = CalculatePct(duration, 25); // channeling delay is normally 25% of its time per hit
7782 int32 delayReduce = 100; // must be initialized to 100 for percent modifiers
7783 m_caster->ToPlayer()->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_NOT_LOSE_CASTING_TIME, delayReduce, this);
7784 delayReduce += m_caster->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_REDUCE_PUSHBACK) - 100;
7785 if (delayReduce >= 100)
7786 return;
7787
7788 AddPct(delaytime, -delayReduce);
7789
7790 if (m_timer <= delaytime)
7791 {
7792 delaytime = m_timer;
7793 m_timer = 0;
7794 }
7795 else
7796 m_timer -= delaytime;
7797
7798 LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell {} partially interrupted for {} ms, new duration: {} ms", m_spellInfo->Id, delaytime, m_timer);
7799
7800 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
7801 if ((*ihit).missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
7802 if (Unit* unit = (m_caster->GetGUID() == ihit->targetGUID) ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, ihit->targetGUID))
7803 unit->DelayOwnedAuras(m_spellInfo->Id, m_originalCasterGUID, delaytime);
7804
7805 // partially interrupt persistent area auras
7806 if (DynamicObject* dynObj = m_caster->GetDynObject(m_spellInfo->Id))
7807 dynObj->Delay(delaytime);
7808
7809 SendChannelUpdate(m_timer);
7810}
7811
7812bool Spell::UpdatePointers()
7813{
7814 if (m_originalCasterGUID == m_caster->GetGUID())
7815 m_originalCaster = m_caster;
7816 else
7817 {
7818 m_originalCaster = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, m_originalCasterGUID);
7819 if (m_originalCaster && !m_originalCaster->IsInWorld())
7820 m_originalCaster = nullptr;
7821 }
7822
7823 if (m_castItemGUID && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7824 {
7825 m_CastItem = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetItemByGuid(m_castItemGUID);
7826 // cast item not found, somehow the item is no longer where we expected
7827 if (!m_CastItem)
7828 return false;
7829 }
7830 else
7831 m_CastItem = nullptr;
7832
7833 m_targets.Update(m_caster);
7834
7835 // further actions done only for dest targets
7836 if (!m_targets.HasDst())
7837 return true;
7838
7839 // cache last transport
7840 WorldObject* transport = nullptr;
7841
7842 // update effect destinations (in case of moved transport dest target)
7843 for (uint8 effIndex = 0; effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++effIndex)
7844 {
7845 SpellDestination& dest = m_destTargets[effIndex];
7846 if (!dest._transportGUID)
7847 continue;
7848
7849 if (!transport || transport->GetGUID() != dest._transportGUID)
7850 transport = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*m_caster, dest._transportGUID);
7851
7852 if (transport)
7853 {
7854 dest._position.Relocate(transport);
7855 dest._position.RelocateOffset(dest._transportOffset);
7856 }
7857 }
7858
7859 return true;
7860}
7861
7862CurrentSpellTypes Spell::GetCurrentContainer() const
7863{
7864 if (IsNextMeleeSwingSpell())
7865 return(CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL);
7866 else if (IsAutoRepeat())
7867 return(CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL);
7868 else if (m_spellInfo->IsChanneled())
7869 return(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
7870 else
7871 return(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL);
7872}
7873
7874bool Spell::CheckEffectTarget(Unit const* target, uint32 eff) const
7875{
7876 switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[eff].ApplyAuraName)
7877 {
7878 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS:
7879 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_CHARM:
7880 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POSSESS_PET:
7881 case SPELL_AURA_AOE_CHARM:
7882 if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->IsVehicle())
7883 return false;
7884 if (target->IsMounted())
7885 return false;
7886 if (target->GetCharmerGUID())
7887 return false;
7888 if (int32 damage = CalculateSpellDamage(eff, target))
7889 if ((int32)target->getLevel() > damage)
7890 return false;
7891 break;
7892 default:
7893 break;
7894 }
7895
7896 // xinef: skip los checking if spell has appropriate attribute, or target requires specific entry
7897 // this is only for target addition and target has to have unselectable flag, this is valid for FLAG_EXTRA_TRIGGER and quest triggers however there are some without this flag, used not_selectable
7898 if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_IGNORE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) || (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE) && (m_spellInfo->Effects[eff].TargetA.GetCheckType() == TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY || m_spellInfo->Effects[eff].TargetB.GetCheckType() == TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY)))
7899 return true;
7900
7901 // if spell is triggered, need to check for LOS disable on the aura triggering it and inherit that behaviour
7902 if (IsTriggered() && m_triggeredByAuraSpell && (m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_IGNORE_LINE_OF_SIGHT) ||
7903 DisableMgr::IsDisabledFor(DISABLE_TYPE_SPELL, m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo->Id, nullptr, SPELL_DISABLE_LOS)))
7904 {
7905 return true;
7906 }
7907
7908 // todo: below shouldn't be here, but it's temporary
7909 //Check targets for LOS visibility (except spells without range limitations)
7910 switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[eff].Effect)
7911 {
7912 case SPELL_EFFECT_RESURRECT_NEW:
7913 // player far away, maybe his corpse near?
7914 if (target != m_caster && !target->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_caster))
7915 {
7916 if (!m_targets.GetCorpseTargetGUID())
7917 return false;
7918
7919 Corpse* corpse = ObjectAccessor::GetCorpse(*m_caster, m_targets.GetCorpseTargetGUID());
7920 if (!corpse)
7921 return false;
7922
7923 if (target->GetGUID() != corpse->GetOwnerGUID())
7924 return false;
7925
7926 if (!corpse->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_caster) && !(m_spellFlags & SPELL_FLAG_REDIRECTED))
7927 return false;
7928 }
7929 break;
7930 case SPELL_EFFECT_SKIN_PLAYER_CORPSE:
7931 {
7932 if (!m_targets.GetCorpseTargetGUID())
7933 {
7934 if (target->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_caster, VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags::M2) && target->HasUnitFlag(UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE))
7935 return true;
7936
7937 return false;
7938 }
7939
7940 Corpse* corpse = ObjectAccessor::GetCorpse(*m_caster, m_targets.GetCorpseTargetGUID());
7941 if (!corpse)
7942 return false;
7943
7944 if (target->GetGUID() != corpse->GetOwnerGUID())
7945 return false;
7946
7947 if (!corpse->HasFlag(CORPSE_FIELD_FLAGS, CORPSE_FLAG_LOOTABLE))
7948 return false;
7949
7950 if (!corpse->IsWithinLOSInMap(m_caster, VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags::M2))
7951 return false;
7952 }
7953 break;
7954 case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_RAF_FRIEND:
7955 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7956 return false;
7957 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->IsARecruiter() && target->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->GetRecruiterId() != m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->GetAccountId())
7958 return false;
7959 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->GetRecruiterId() != target->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->GetAccountId() && target->ToPlayer()->GetSession()->IsARecruiter())
7960 return false;
7961 if (target->ToPlayer()->getLevel() >= sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_RECRUIT_A_FRIEND_BONUS_PLAYER_LEVEL))
7962 return false;
7963 break;
7964 default: // normal case
7965 {
7966 uint32 losChecks = LINEOFSIGHT_ALL_CHECKS;
7967 GameObject* gobCaster = nullptr;
7968 if (m_originalCasterGUID.IsGameObject())
7969 {
7970 gobCaster = m_caster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(m_originalCasterGUID);
7971 }
7972 else if (m_caster->GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER)
7973 {
7974 if (TempSummon* tempSummon = m_caster->ToTempSummon())
7975 {
7976 gobCaster = tempSummon->GetSummonerGameObject();
7977 }
7978 }
7979
7980 if (gobCaster)
7981 {
7982 if (gobCaster->GetGOInfo()->IsIgnoringLOSChecks())
7983 {
7984 return true;
7985 }
7986
7987 // If spell casted by gameobject then ignore M2 models
7988 losChecks &= ~LINEOFSIGHT_CHECK_GOBJECT_M2;
7989 }
7990
7991 if (target != m_caster)
7992 {
7993 if (m_targets.HasDst())
7994 {
7995 float x = m_targets.GetDstPos()->GetPositionX();
7996 float y = m_targets.GetDstPos()->GetPositionY();
7997 float z = m_targets.GetDstPos()->GetPositionZ();
7998
7999 if (!target->IsWithinLOS(x, y, z, VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags::M2, LineOfSightChecks(losChecks)))
8000 {
8001 return false;
8002 }
8003 }
8004 else if (!m_caster->IsWithinLOSInMap(target, VMAP::ModelIgnoreFlags::M2, LineOfSightChecks(losChecks)))
8005 {
8006 return false;
8007 }
8008 }
8009 break;
8010 }
8011 }
8012
8013 return true;
8014}
8015
8016bool Spell::IsNextMeleeSwingSpell() const
8017{
8018 return m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_ON_NEXT_SWING_NO_DAMAGE);
8019}
8020
8021bool Spell::IsIgnoringCooldowns() const
8022{
8023 return (_triggeredCastFlags & TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD) != 0;
8024}
8025
8026bool Spell::IsAutoActionResetSpell() const
8027{
8029 if (IsTriggered() || !(m_spellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_INTERRUPT))
8030 {
8031 return false;
8032 }
8033
8034 if (!m_casttime && m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_DOESNT_RESET_SWING_TIMER_IF_INSTANT))
8035 {
8036 return false;
8037 }
8038
8039 return true;
8040}
8041
8042bool Spell::IsNeedSendToClient(bool go) const
8043{
8044 return m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[0] || m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[1] || m_spellInfo->IsChanneled() ||
8045 m_spellInfo->Speed > 0.0f || (!m_triggeredByAuraSpell && !IsTriggered()) ||
8046 (go && m_triggeredByAuraSpell && m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo->IsChanneled());
8047}
8048
8049bool Spell::HaveTargetsForEffect(uint8 effect) const
8050{
8051 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++itr)
8052 if (itr->effectMask & (1 << effect))
8053 return true;
8054
8055 for (std::list<GOTargetInfo>::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueGOTargetInfo.end(); ++itr)
8056 if (itr->effectMask & (1 << effect))
8057 return true;
8058
8059 for (std::list<ItemTargetInfo>::const_iterator itr = m_UniqueItemInfo.begin(); itr != m_UniqueItemInfo.end(); ++itr)
8060 if (itr->effectMask & (1 << effect))
8061 return true;
8062
8063 return false;
8064}
8065
8066SpellEvent::SpellEvent(Spell* spell) : BasicEvent()
8067{
8068 m_Spell = spell;
8069}
8070
8071SpellEvent::~SpellEvent()
8072{
8073 if (m_Spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
8074 m_Spell->cancel();
8075
8076 if (m_Spell->IsDeletable())
8077 {
8078 delete m_Spell;
8079 }
8080 else
8081 {
8082 LOG_ERROR("spells", "~SpellEvent: {} {} tried to delete non-deletable spell {}. Was not deleted, causes memory leak.",
8083 (m_Spell->GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? "Player" : "Creature"), m_Spell->GetCaster()->GetGUID().ToString(), m_Spell->m_spellInfo->Id);
8084 ABORT();
8085 }
8086}
8087
8088bool SpellEvent::Execute(uint64 e_time, uint32 p_time)
8089{
8090 // update spell if it is not finished
8091 if (m_Spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
8092 m_Spell->update(p_time);
8093
8094 // check spell state to process
8095 switch (m_Spell->getState())
8096 {
8097 case SPELL_STATE_FINISHED:
8098 {
8099 // spell was finished, check deletable state
8100 if (m_Spell->IsDeletable())
8101 {
8102 // check, if we do have unfinished triggered spells
8103 return true; // spell is deletable, finish event
8104 }
8105 // event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
8106 }
8107 break;
8108
8109 case SPELL_STATE_DELAYED:
8110 {
8111 // first, check, if we have just started
8112 if (m_Spell->GetDelayStart() != 0)
8113 {
8114 {
8115 // run the spell handler and think about what we can do next
8116 uint64 t_offset = e_time - m_Spell->GetDelayStart();
8117 uint64 n_offset = m_Spell->handle_delayed(t_offset);
8118 if (n_offset)
8119 {
8120 // re-add us to the queue
8121 m_Spell->GetCaster()->m_Events.AddEvent(this, m_Spell->GetDelayStart() + n_offset, false);
8122 return false; // event not complete
8123 }
8124 // event complete
8125 // finish update event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
8126 }
8127 }
8128 else
8129 {
8130 // delaying had just started, record the moment
8131 m_Spell->SetDelayStart(e_time);
8132 // re-plan the event for the delay moment
8133 m_Spell->GetCaster()->m_Events.AddEvent(this, e_time + m_Spell->GetDelayMoment(), false);
8134 return false; // event not complete
8135 }
8136 }
8137 break;
8138
8139 default:
8140 {
8141 // all other states
8142 // event will be re-added automatically at the end of routine)
8143 } break;
8144 }
8145
8146 // spell processing not complete, plan event on the next update interval
8147 m_Spell->GetCaster()->m_Events.AddEvent(this, e_time + 1, false);
8148 return false; // event not complete
8149}
8150
8151void SpellEvent::Abort(uint64 /*e_time*/)
8152{
8153 // oops, the spell we try to do is aborted
8154 if (m_Spell->getState() != SPELL_STATE_FINISHED)
8155 m_Spell->cancel();
8156}
8157
8158bool SpellEvent::IsDeletable() const
8159{
8160 return m_Spell->IsDeletable();
8161}
8162
8163bool ReflectEvent::Execute(uint64 /*e_time*/, uint32 /*p_time*/)
8164{
8165 Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*_caster, _targetGUID);
8166 if (target && _caster->IsInMap(target))
8167 Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(_caster, target, PROC_FLAG_NONE, PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_SPELL_MAGIC_DMG_CLASS_NEG, PROC_EX_REFLECT, 1, BASE_ATTACK, _spellInfo);
8168 return true;
8169}
8170
8171bool Spell::IsValidDeadOrAliveTarget(Unit const* target) const
8172{
8173 if (target->IsAlive())
8174 return !m_spellInfo->IsRequiringDeadTarget();
8175
8176 return m_spellInfo->IsAllowingDeadTarget();
8177}
8178
8179void Spell::HandleLaunchPhase()
8180{
8181 // handle effects with SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH mode
8182 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
8183 {
8184 // don't do anything for empty effect
8185 if (!m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsEffect())
8186 continue;
8187
8188 HandleEffects(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, i, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH);
8189 }
8190
8191 float multiplier[MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS];
8192 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
8193 if (m_applyMultiplierMask & (1 << i))
8194 multiplier[i] = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].CalcDamageMultiplier(m_originalCaster, this);
8195
8196 bool usesAmmo = m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
8197 Unit::AuraEffectList const& Auras = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_CONSUME_NO_AMMO);
8198 for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator j = Auras.begin(); j != Auras.end(); ++j)
8199 {
8200 if ((*j)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
8201 usesAmmo = false;
8202 }
8203
8204 PrepareTargetProcessing();
8205
8206 for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
8207 {
8208 TargetInfo& target = *ihit;
8209
8210 uint32 mask = target.effectMask;
8211 if (!mask)
8212 continue;
8213
8214 // do not consume ammo anymore for Hunter's volley spell
8215 if (IsTriggered() && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER && m_spellInfo->IsTargetingArea())
8216 usesAmmo = false;
8217
8218 if (usesAmmo)
8219 {
8220 bool ammoTaken = false;
8221 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; i++)
8222 {
8223 if (!(mask & 1 << i))
8224 continue;
8225 switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect)
8226 {
8227 case SPELL_EFFECT_SCHOOL_DAMAGE:
8228 case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
8229 case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
8230 case SPELL_EFFECT_NORMALIZED_WEAPON_DMG:
8231 case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_PERCENT_DAMAGE:
8232 ammoTaken = true;
8233 TakeAmmo();
8234 }
8235 if (ammoTaken)
8236 break;
8237 }
8238 }
8239
8240 DoAllEffectOnLaunchTarget(target, multiplier);
8241 }
8242
8243 FinishTargetProcessing();
8244}
8245
8246void Spell::DoAllEffectOnLaunchTarget(TargetInfo& targetInfo, float* multiplier)
8247{
8248 Unit* unit = nullptr;
8249 // In case spell hit target, do all effect on that target
8250 if (targetInfo.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
8251 unit = m_caster->GetGUID() == targetInfo.targetGUID ? m_caster : ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, targetInfo.targetGUID);
8252 // In case spell reflect from target, do all effect on caster (if hit)
8253 else if (targetInfo.missCondition == SPELL_MISS_REFLECT && targetInfo.reflectResult == SPELL_MISS_NONE)
8254 unit = m_caster;
8255 if (!unit)
8256 return;
8257
8258 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
8259 {
8260 if (targetInfo.effectMask & (1 << i))
8261 {
8262 m_damage = 0;
8263 m_healing = 0;
8264
8265 HandleEffects(unit, nullptr, nullptr, i, SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET);
8266
8267 if (m_damage > 0)
8268 {
8269 // Xinef: Area Auras, AoE Targetting spells AND Chain Target spells (cleave etc.)
8270 if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsAreaAuraEffect() || m_spellInfo->Effects[i].IsTargetingArea() || (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ChainTarget > 1 && m_spellInfo->DmgClass != SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC))
8271 {
8272 m_damage = unit->CalculateAOEDamageReduction(m_damage, m_spellInfo->SchoolMask, m_caster);
8273 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8274 {
8275 uint32 targetAmount = m_UniqueTargetInfo.size();
8276 if (targetAmount > 10)
8277 m_damage = m_damage * 10 / targetAmount;
8278 }
8279 }
8280 }
8281
8282 if (m_applyMultiplierMask & (1 << i))
8283 {
8284 m_damage = int32(m_damage * m_damageMultipliers[i]);
8285 m_damageMultipliers[i] *= multiplier[i];
8286 }
8287 targetInfo.damage += m_damage;
8288 }
8289 }
8290
8291 // xinef: totem's inherit owner crit chance and dancing rune weapon
8292 Unit* caster = m_caster;
8293 if (m_caster->IsTotem() || m_caster->GetEntry() == 27893)
8294 {
8295 if (Unit* owner = m_caster->GetOwner())
8296 caster = owner;
8297 }
8298 else if (m_originalCaster)
8299 caster = m_originalCaster;
8300
8301 float critChance = caster->SpellDoneCritChance(unit, m_spellInfo, m_spellSchoolMask, m_attackType, false);
8302 critChance = unit->SpellTakenCritChance(caster, m_spellInfo, m_spellSchoolMask, critChance, m_attackType, false);
8303 targetInfo.crit = roll_chance_f(std::max(0.0f, critChance));
8304}
8305
8306SpellCastResult Spell::CanOpenLock(uint32 effIndex, uint32 lockId, SkillType& skillId, int32& reqSkillValue, int32& skillValue)
8307{
8308 if (!lockId) // possible case for GO and maybe for items.
8309 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8310
8311 // Get LockInfo
8312 LockEntry const* lockInfo = sLockStore.LookupEntry(lockId);
8313
8314 if (!lockInfo)
8315 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
8316
8317 bool reqKey = false; // some locks not have reqs
8318
8319 for (int j = 0; j < MAX_LOCK_CASE; ++j)
8320 {
8321 switch (lockInfo->Type[j])
8322 {
8323 // check key item (many fit cases can be)
8324 case LOCK_KEY_ITEM:
8325 if (lockInfo->Index[j] && m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetEntry() == lockInfo->Index[j])
8326 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8327 reqKey = true;
8328 break;
8329 // check key skill (only single first fit case can be)
8330 case LOCK_KEY_SKILL:
8331 {
8332 reqKey = true;
8333
8334 // wrong locktype, skip
8335 if (uint32(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue) != lockInfo->Index[j])
8336 continue;
8337
8338 skillId = SkillByLockType(LockType(lockInfo->Index[j]));
8339
8340 if (skillId != SKILL_NONE)
8341 {
8342 reqSkillValue = lockInfo->Skill[j];
8343
8344 // castitem check: rogue using skeleton keys. the skill values should not be added in this case.
8345 skillValue = m_CastItem || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER ?
8346 0 : m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetSkillValue(skillId);
8347
8348 // skill bonus provided by casting spell (mostly item spells)
8349 // add the effect base points modifier from the spell casted (cheat lock / skeleton key etc.)
8350 if ((m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET || m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TargetB.GetTarget() == TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_ITEM_TARGET)
8351 && !m_spellInfo->IsAbilityOfSkillType(SKILL_LOCKPICKING))
8352 {
8353 skillValue += m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValue();
8354 }
8355
8356 if (skillValue < reqSkillValue)
8357 return SPELL_FAILED_LOW_CASTLEVEL;
8358 }
8359
8360 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8361 }
8362 case LOCK_KEY_SPELL:
8363 {
8364 if (m_spellInfo->Id == lockInfo->Index[j])
8365 {
8366 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8367 }
8368 reqKey = true;
8369 break;
8370 }
8371 }
8372 }
8373
8374 if (reqKey)
8375 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_TARGETS;
8376
8377 return SPELL_CAST_OK;
8378}
8379
8380void Spell::SetSpellValue(SpellValueMod mod, int32 value)
8381{
8382 switch (mod)
8383 {
8384 case SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0:
8385 m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[0] = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_0].CalcBaseValue(value);
8386 break;
8387 case SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1:
8388 m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[1] = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcBaseValue(value);
8389 break;
8390 case SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT2:
8391 m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[2] = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_2].CalcBaseValue(value);
8392 break;
8393 case SPELLVALUE_RADIUS_MOD:
8394 m_spellValue->RadiusMod = (float)value / 10000;
8395 break;
8396 case SPELLVALUE_MAX_TARGETS:
8397 m_spellValue->MaxAffectedTargets = (uint32)value;
8398 break;
8399 case SPELLVALUE_AURA_STACK:
8400 m_spellValue->AuraStackAmount = uint8(value);
8401 break;
8402 case SPELLVALUE_AURA_DURATION:
8403 m_spellValue->AuraDuration = value;
8404 break;
8405 case SPELLVALUE_FORCED_CRIT_RESULT:
8406 m_spellValue->ForcedCritResult = (bool)value;
8407 break;
8408 }
8409}
8410
8411void Spell::PrepareTargetProcessing()
8412{
8413 CheckEffectExecuteData();
8414}
8415
8416void Spell::FinishTargetProcessing()
8417{
8418 SendLogExecute();
8419}
8420
8421void Spell::InitEffectExecuteData(uint8 effIndex)
8422{
8423 ASSERT(effIndex < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS);
8424 if (!m_effectExecuteData[effIndex])
8425 {
8426 m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] = new ByteBuffer(0x20);
8427 // first dword - target counter
8428 *m_effectExecuteData[effIndex] << uint32(1);
8429 }
8430 else
8431 {
8432 // increase target counter by one
8433 uint32 count = (*m_effectExecuteData[effIndex]).read<uint32>(0);
8434 (*m_effectExecuteData[effIndex]).put<uint32>(0, ++count);
8435 }
8436}
8437
8438void Spell::CheckEffectExecuteData()
8439{
8440 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
8441 ASSERT(!m_effectExecuteData[i]);
8442}
8443
8444void Spell::LoadScripts()
8445{
8446 if (_scriptsLoaded)
8447 return;
8448 _scriptsLoaded = true;
8449 sScriptMgr->CreateSpellScripts(m_spellInfo->Id, m_loadedScripts);
8450 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator itr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); itr != m_loadedScripts.end();)
8451 {
8452 if (!(*itr)->_Load(this))
8453 {
8454 std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator bitr = itr;
8455 ++itr;
8456 delete (*bitr);
8457 m_loadedScripts.erase(bitr);
8458 continue;
8459 }
8460 LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell::LoadScripts: Script `{}` for spell `{}` is loaded now", (*itr)->_GetScriptName()->c_str(), m_spellInfo->Id);
8461 (*itr)->Register();
8462 ++itr;
8463 }
8464}
8465
8466void Spell::CallScriptBeforeCastHandlers()
8467{
8468 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8469 {
8470 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_BEFORE_CAST);
8471 std::list<SpellScript::CastHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->BeforeCast.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->BeforeCast.begin();
8472 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8473 (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8474
8475 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8476 }
8477}
8478
8479void Spell::CallScriptOnCastHandlers()
8480{
8481 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8482 {
8483 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_ON_CAST);
8484 std::list<SpellScript::CastHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnCast.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnCast.begin();
8485 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8486 (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8487
8488 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8489 }
8490}
8491
8492void Spell::CallScriptAfterCastHandlers()
8493{
8494 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8495 {
8496 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_AFTER_CAST);
8497 std::list<SpellScript::CastHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->AfterCast.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->AfterCast.begin();
8498 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8499 (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8500
8501 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8502 }
8503}
8504
8505SpellCastResult Spell::CallScriptCheckCastHandlers()
8506{
8507 SpellCastResult retVal = SPELL_CAST_OK;
8508 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8509 {
8510 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_CHECK_CAST);
8511 std::list<SpellScript::CheckCastHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnCheckCast.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnCheckCast.begin();
8512 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8513 {
8514 SpellCastResult tempResult = (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8515 if (retVal == SPELL_CAST_OK)
8516 retVal = tempResult;
8517 }
8518
8519 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8520 }
8521 return retVal;
8522}
8523
8524void Spell::PrepareScriptHitHandlers()
8525{
8526 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8527 (*scritr)->_InitHit();
8528}
8529
8530bool Spell::CallScriptEffectHandlers(SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellEffectHandleMode mode)
8531{
8532 // execute script effect handler hooks and check if effects was prevented
8533 bool preventDefault = false;
8534 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8535 {
8536 std::list<SpellScript::EffectHandler>::iterator effItr, effEndItr;
8537 SpellScriptHookType hookType;
8538 switch (mode)
8539 {
8540 case SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH:
8541 effItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectLaunch.begin();
8542 effEndItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectLaunch.end();
8543 hookType = SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_EFFECT_LAUNCH;
8544 break;
8545 case SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET:
8546 effItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectLaunchTarget.begin();
8547 effEndItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectLaunchTarget.end();
8548 hookType = SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_EFFECT_LAUNCH_TARGET;
8549 break;
8550 case SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT:
8551 effItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectHit.begin();
8552 effEndItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectHit.end();
8553 hookType = SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_EFFECT_HIT;
8554 break;
8555 case SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET:
8556 effItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectHitTarget.begin();
8557 effEndItr = (*scritr)->OnEffectHitTarget.end();
8558 hookType = SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_EFFECT_HIT_TARGET;
8559 break;
8560 default:
8561 ABORT();
8562 return false;
8563 }
8564 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(hookType);
8565 for (; effItr != effEndItr; ++effItr)
8566 // effect execution can be prevented
8567 if (!(*scritr)->_IsEffectPrevented(effIndex) && (*effItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex))
8568 (*effItr).Call(*scritr, effIndex);
8569
8570 if (!preventDefault)
8571 preventDefault = (*scritr)->_IsDefaultEffectPrevented(effIndex);
8572
8573 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8574 }
8575 return preventDefault;
8576}
8577
8578void Spell::CallScriptBeforeHitHandlers(SpellMissInfo missInfo)
8579{
8580 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8581 {
8582 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_BEFORE_HIT);
8583 std::list<SpellScript::BeforeHitHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->BeforeHit.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->BeforeHit.begin();
8584 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8585 (*hookItr).Call(*scritr, missInfo);
8586
8587 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8588 }
8589}
8590
8591void Spell::CallScriptOnHitHandlers()
8592{
8593 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8594 {
8595 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_HIT);
8596 std::list<SpellScript::HitHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnHit.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnHit.begin();
8597 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8598 (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8599
8600 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8601 }
8602}
8603
8604void Spell::CallScriptAfterHitHandlers()
8605{
8606 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8607 {
8608 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_AFTER_HIT);
8609 std::list<SpellScript::HitHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->AfterHit.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->AfterHit.begin();
8610 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8611 (*hookItr).Call(*scritr);
8612
8613 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8614 }
8615}
8616
8617void Spell::CallScriptObjectAreaTargetSelectHandlers(std::list<WorldObject*>& targets, SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
8618{
8619 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8620 {
8621 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_OBJECT_AREA_TARGET_SELECT);
8622 std::list<SpellScript::ObjectAreaTargetSelectHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnObjectAreaTargetSelect.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnObjectAreaTargetSelect.begin();
8623 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8624 if (hookItr->IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && targetType.GetTarget() == hookItr->GetTarget())
8625 hookItr->Call(*scritr, targets);
8626
8627 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8628 }
8629}
8630
8631void Spell::CallScriptObjectTargetSelectHandlers(WorldObject*& target, SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
8632{
8633 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8634 {
8635 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_OBJECT_TARGET_SELECT);
8636 std::list<SpellScript::ObjectTargetSelectHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnObjectTargetSelect.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnObjectTargetSelect.begin();
8637 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8638 if (hookItr->IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && targetType.GetTarget() == hookItr->GetTarget())
8639 hookItr->Call(*scritr, target);
8640
8641 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8642 }
8643}
8644
8645void Spell::CallScriptDestinationTargetSelectHandlers(SpellDestination& target, SpellEffIndex effIndex, SpellImplicitTargetInfo const& targetType)
8646{
8647 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator scritr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); scritr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++scritr)
8648 {
8649 (*scritr)->_PrepareScriptCall(SPELL_SCRIPT_HOOK_DESTINATION_TARGET_SELECT);
8650 std::list<SpellScript::DestinationTargetSelectHandler>::iterator hookItrEnd = (*scritr)->OnDestinationTargetSelect.end(), hookItr = (*scritr)->OnDestinationTargetSelect.begin();
8651 for (; hookItr != hookItrEnd; ++hookItr)
8652 if (hookItr->IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && targetType.GetTarget() == hookItr->GetTarget())
8653 hookItr->Call(*scritr, target);
8654
8655 (*scritr)->_FinishScriptCall();
8656 }
8657}
8658
8659bool Spell::CheckScriptEffectImplicitTargets(uint32 effIndex, uint32 effIndexToCheck)
8660{
8661 // Skip if there are not any script
8662 if (!m_loadedScripts.size())
8663 return true;
8664
8665 for (std::list<SpellScript*>::iterator itr = m_loadedScripts.begin(); itr != m_loadedScripts.end(); ++itr)
8666 {
8667 std::list<SpellScript::ObjectTargetSelectHandler>::iterator targetSelectHookEnd = (*itr)->OnObjectTargetSelect.end(), targetSelectHookItr = (*itr)->OnObjectTargetSelect.begin();
8668 for (; targetSelectHookItr != targetSelectHookEnd; ++targetSelectHookItr)
8669 if (((*targetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && !(*targetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndexToCheck)) ||
8670 (!(*targetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && (*targetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndexToCheck)))
8671 return false;
8672
8673 std::list<SpellScript::ObjectAreaTargetSelectHandler>::iterator areaTargetSelectHookEnd = (*itr)->OnObjectAreaTargetSelect.end(), areaTargetSelectHookItr = (*itr)->OnObjectAreaTargetSelect.begin();
8674 for (; areaTargetSelectHookItr != areaTargetSelectHookEnd; ++areaTargetSelectHookItr)
8675 if (((*areaTargetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && !(*areaTargetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndexToCheck)) ||
8676 (!(*areaTargetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && (*areaTargetSelectHookItr).IsEffectAffected(m_spellInfo, effIndexToCheck)))
8677 return false;
8678 }
8679 return true;
8680}
8681
8682bool Spell::CanExecuteTriggersOnHit(uint8 effMask, SpellInfo const* triggeredByAura) const
8683{
8684 // Relentless strikes, proc only from first effect
8685 if (triggeredByAura && triggeredByAura->SpellIconID == 559)
8686 return effMask & (1 << EFFECT_0);
8687
8688 bool only_on_caster = (triggeredByAura && triggeredByAura->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_CLASS_TRIGGER_ONLY_ON_TARGET));
8689 // If triggeredByAura has SPELL_ATTR4_CLASS_TRIGGER_ONLY_ON_TARGET then it can only proc on a casted spell with TARGET_UNIT_CASTER
8690 for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
8691 {
8692 if ((effMask & (1 << i)) && (!only_on_caster || (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].TargetA.GetTarget() == TARGET_UNIT_CASTER)))
8693 return true;
8694 }
8695 return effMask;
8696}
8697
8698void Spell::PrepareTriggersExecutedOnHit()
8699{
8700 // todo: move this to scripts
8701 if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
8702 {
8703 SpellInfo const* excludeCasterSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spellInfo->ExcludeCasterAuraSpell);
8704 if (excludeCasterSpellInfo && !excludeCasterSpellInfo->IsPositive())
8705 m_preCastSpell = m_spellInfo->ExcludeCasterAuraSpell;
8706 SpellInfo const* excludeTargetSpellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spellInfo->ExcludeTargetAuraSpell);
8707 if (excludeTargetSpellInfo && !excludeTargetSpellInfo->IsPositive())
8708 m_preCastSpell = m_spellInfo->ExcludeTargetAuraSpell;
8709 }
8710
8711 // todo: move this to scripts
8712 switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
8713 {
8714 case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
8715 {
8716 if( m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x40000000 )
8717 {
8718 Unit::AuraEffectList const& mVindication = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL);
8719 for(Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator itr = mVindication.begin(); itr != mVindication.end(); ++itr)
8720 {
8721 if( (*itr)->GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_0].TriggerSpell == 26017 )
8722 {
8723 m_preCastSpell = 26017;
8724 break;
8725 }
8726 else if( (*itr)->GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_0].TriggerSpell == 67 )
8727 m_preCastSpell = 67;
8728 }
8729 }
8730 break;
8731 }
8732 case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
8733 {
8734 // Faerie Fire (Feral)
8735 if( m_spellInfo->Id == 16857 && (m_caster->GetShapeshiftForm() == FORM_BEAR || m_caster->GetShapeshiftForm() == FORM_DIREBEAR) )
8736 m_preCastSpell = 60089;
8737
8738 break;
8739 }
8740 }
8741
8742 // handle SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER auras:
8743 // save auras which were present on spell caster on cast, to prevent triggered auras from affecting caster
8744 // and to correctly calculate proc chance when combopoints are present
8745 Unit::AuraEffectList const& targetTriggers = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_ADD_TARGET_TRIGGER);
8746 for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = targetTriggers.begin(); i != targetTriggers.end(); ++i)
8747 {
8748 if (!(*i)->IsAffectedOnSpell(m_spellInfo))
8749 continue;
8750 SpellInfo const* auraSpellInfo = (*i)->GetSpellInfo();
8751 uint32 auraSpellIdx = (*i)->GetEffIndex();
8752 if (SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(auraSpellInfo->Effects[auraSpellIdx].TriggerSpell))
8753 {
8754 // calculate the chance using spell base amount, because aura amount is not updated on combo-points change
8755 // this possibly needs fixing
8756 int32 auraBaseAmount = (*i)->GetBaseAmount();
8757 // proc chance is stored in effect amount
8758 int32 chance = m_caster->CalculateSpellDamage(nullptr, auraSpellInfo, auraSpellIdx, &auraBaseAmount);
8759 // build trigger and add to the list
8760 HitTriggerSpell spellTriggerInfo;
8761 spellTriggerInfo.triggeredSpell = spellInfo;
8762 spellTriggerInfo.triggeredByAura = auraSpellInfo;
8763 spellTriggerInfo.triggeredByEffIdx = (*i)->GetEffIndex();
8764 spellTriggerInfo.chance = chance * (*i)->GetBase()->GetStackAmount();
8765 m_hitTriggerSpells.push_back(spellTriggerInfo);
8766 }
8767 }
8768}
8769
8770// Global cooldowns management
8771enum GCDLimits
8772{
8773 MIN_GCD = 1000,
8774 MAX_GCD = 1500
8775};
8776
8777bool Spell::HasGlobalCooldown() const
8778{
8779 // Only player or controlled units have global cooldown
8780 if (m_caster->GetCharmInfo())
8781 return m_caster->GetCharmInfo()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().HasGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo);
8782 else if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8783 return m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().HasGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo);
8784 else
8785 return false;
8786}
8787
8788void Spell::TriggerGlobalCooldown()
8789{
8790 int32 gcd = m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime;
8791 if (!gcd)
8792 {
8793 // Xinef: fix for charmed pet spells with no cooldown info
8794 if (m_spellInfo->RecoveryTime == 0 && m_spellInfo->CategoryRecoveryTime == 0 && m_caster->GetCharmInfo())
8795 gcd = MIN_GCD;
8796 else
8797 return;
8798 }
8799
8800 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8801 if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_COOLDOWN))
8802 return;
8803
8804 // Global cooldown can't leave range 1..1.5 secs
8805 // There are some spells (mostly not casted directly by player) that have < 1 sec and > 1.5 sec global cooldowns
8806 // but as tests show are not affected by any spell mods.
8807 if (m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime >= MIN_GCD && m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime <= MAX_GCD)
8808 {
8809 // gcd modifier auras are applied only to own spells and only players have such mods
8810 if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8811 m_caster->ToPlayer()->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_GLOBAL_COOLDOWN, gcd, this);
8812
8813 // Apply haste rating
8814 if (m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryCategory == 133 && m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime == 1500 && m_spellInfo->DmgClass != SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MELEE &&
8815 m_spellInfo->DmgClass != SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_RANGED && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_USES_RANGED_SLOT) && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_IS_ABILITY))
8816 {
8817 gcd = int32(float(gcd) * m_caster->GetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED));
8818 }
8819
8820 if (gcd < MIN_GCD)
8821 gcd = MIN_GCD;
8822 else if (gcd > MAX_GCD)
8823 gcd = MAX_GCD;
8824 }
8825
8826 // Only players or controlled units have global cooldown
8827 if (m_caster->GetCharmInfo())
8828 m_caster->GetCharmInfo()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().AddGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo, gcd);
8829 else if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8830 m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().AddGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo, gcd);
8831}
8832
8833void Spell::CancelGlobalCooldown()
8834{
8835 if (!m_spellInfo->StartRecoveryTime)
8836 return;
8837
8838 // Cancel global cooldown when interrupting current cast
8839 if (m_caster->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL) != this)
8840 return;
8841
8842 // Only players or controlled units have global cooldown
8843 if (m_caster->GetCharmInfo())
8844 m_caster->GetCharmInfo()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().CancelGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo);
8845 else if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8846 m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetGlobalCooldownMgr().CancelGlobalCooldown(m_spellInfo);
8847}
8848
8849void Spell::OnSpellLaunch()
8850{
8851 if (!m_caster || !m_caster->IsInWorld())
8852 return;
8853
8854 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(24390);
8855
8856 // Make sure the player is sending a valid GO target and lock ID. SPELL_EFFECT_OPEN_LOCK
8857 // can succeed with a lockId of 0
8858 if (m_spellInfo->Id == 21651)
8859 {
8860 if (GameObject* go = m_targets.GetGOTarget())
8861 {
8862 LockEntry const* lockInfo = sLockStore.LookupEntry(go->GetGOInfo()->GetLockId());
8863 if (lockInfo && lockInfo->Index[1] == LOCKTYPE_SLOW_OPEN)
8864 {
8865 Spell* visual = new Spell(m_caster, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_NONE);
8866 visual->prepare(&m_targets);
8867 }
8868 }
8869 }
8870}
8871
8872void TriggeredByAuraSpellData::Init(AuraEffect const* aurEff)
8873{
8874 spellInfo = aurEff->GetSpellInfo();
8875 effectIndex = aurEff->GetEffIndex();
8876 tickNumber = aurEff->GetTickNumber();
8877}
8878
8879std::string Spell::GetDebugInfo() const
8880{
8881 std::stringstream sstr;
8882 sstr << std::boolalpha
8883 << "Id: " << GetSpellInfo()->Id << " OriginalCaster: " << m_originalCasterGUID.ToString()
8884 << " State: " << getState();
8885 return sstr.str();
8886}
8887
8888namespace Acore
8889{
8890
8891 WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck(Unit* caster, Unit* referer, SpellInfo const* spellInfo,
8892 SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList) : _caster(caster), _referer(referer), _spellInfo(spellInfo),
8893 _targetSelectionType(selectionType), _condList(condList)
8894 {
8895 if (condList)
8896 _condSrcInfo = new ConditionSourceInfo(nullptr, caster);
8897 else
8898 _condSrcInfo = nullptr;
8899 }
8900
8901 WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::~WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck()
8902 {
8903 if (_condSrcInfo)
8904 delete _condSrcInfo;
8905 }
8906
8907 bool WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
8908 {
8909 if (_spellInfo->CheckTarget(_caster, target, true) != SPELL_CAST_OK)
8910 return false;
8911 Unit* unitTarget = target->ToUnit();
8912 if (Corpse* corpseTarget = target->ToCorpse())
8913 {
8914 // use ofter for party/assistance checks
8915 if (Player* owner = ObjectAccessor::FindPlayer(corpseTarget->GetOwnerGUID()))
8916 unitTarget = owner;
8917 else
8918 return false;
8919 }
8920 if (unitTarget)
8921 {
8922 switch (_targetSelectionType)
8923 {
8924 case TARGET_CHECK_ENEMY:
8925 if (unitTarget->IsTotem())
8926 return false;
8927 if (!_caster->_IsValidAttackTarget(unitTarget, _spellInfo))
8928 return false;
8929 break;
8930 case TARGET_CHECK_ALLY:
8931 if (unitTarget->IsTotem())
8932 return false;
8933 if (!_caster->_IsValidAssistTarget(unitTarget, _spellInfo))
8934 return false;
8935 break;
8936 case TARGET_CHECK_PARTY:
8937 if (unitTarget->IsTotem())
8938 return false;
8939 if (!_caster->_IsValidAssistTarget(unitTarget, _spellInfo))
8940 return false;
8941 if (!_referer->IsInPartyWith(unitTarget))
8942 return false;
8943 break;
8944 case TARGET_CHECK_RAID_CLASS:
8945 if (_referer->getClass() != unitTarget->getClass())
8946 return false;
8947 [[fallthrough]];
8948 case TARGET_CHECK_RAID:
8949 if (unitTarget->IsTotem())
8950 return false;
8951 if (!_caster->_IsValidAssistTarget(unitTarget, _spellInfo))
8952 return false;
8953 if (!_referer->IsInRaidWith(unitTarget))
8954 return false;
8955 break;
8956 case TARGET_CHECK_CORPSE:
8957 if (_caster->IsFriendlyTo(unitTarget))
8958 return false;
8959 break;
8960 default:
8961 break;
8962 }
8963 }
8964 if (!_condSrcInfo)
8965 return true;
8966 _condSrcInfo->mConditionTargets[0] = target;
8967 return sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(*_condSrcInfo, *_condList);
8968 }
8969
8970 WorldObjectSpellNearbyTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellNearbyTargetCheck(float range, Unit* caster, SpellInfo const* spellInfo,
8971 SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
8972 : WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck(caster, caster, spellInfo, selectionType, condList), _range(range), _position(caster)
8973 {
8974 }
8975
8976 bool WorldObjectSpellNearbyTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
8977 {
8978 float dist = target->GetDistance(*_position);
8979 if (dist < _range && WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::operator ()(target))
8980 {
8981 _range = dist;
8982 return true;
8983 }
8984 return false;
8985 }
8986
8987 WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck(float range, Position const* position, Unit* caster,
8988 Unit* referer, SpellInfo const* spellInfo, SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
8989 : WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck(caster, referer, spellInfo, selectionType, condList), _range(range), _position(position)
8990 {
8991 }
8992
8993 bool WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
8994 {
8995 if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT)
8996 {
8997 if (!target->ToGameObject()->IsInRange(_position->GetPositionX(), _position->GetPositionY(), _position->GetPositionZ(), _range))
8998 return false;
8999 }
9000 else if (!target->IsWithinDist3d(_position, _range))
9001 return false;
9002 else if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->ToCreature()->IsAvoidingAOE()) // pussywizard
9003 return false;
9004 return WorldObjectSpellTargetCheck::operator ()(target);
9005 }
9006
9007 WorldObjectSpellConeTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellConeTargetCheck(float coneAngle, float range, Unit* caster,
9008 SpellInfo const* spellInfo, SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
9009 : WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck(range, caster, caster, caster, spellInfo, selectionType, condList), _coneAngle(coneAngle)
9010 {
9011 }
9012
9013 bool WorldObjectSpellConeTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
9014 {
9015 if (_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_CONE_BACK))
9016 {
9017 if (!_caster->isInBack(target, _coneAngle))
9018 return false;
9019 }
9020 else if (_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_CONE_LINE))
9021 {
9022 if (!_caster->HasInLine(target, _caster->GetObjectSize() + target->GetObjectSize()))
9023 return false;
9024 }
9025 else
9026 {
9027 if (!_caster->isInFront(target, _coneAngle))
9028 return false;
9029 }
9030 return WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck::operator ()(target);
9031 }
9032
9033 WorldObjectSpellTrajTargetCheck::WorldObjectSpellTrajTargetCheck(float range, Position const* position, Unit* caster,
9034 SpellInfo const* spellInfo, SpellTargetCheckTypes selectionType, ConditionList* condList)
9035 : WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck(range, position, caster, caster, spellInfo, selectionType, condList)
9036 {
9037 }
9038
9039 bool WorldObjectSpellTrajTargetCheck::operator()(WorldObject* target)
9040 {
9041 // return all targets on missile trajectory (0 - size of a missile)
9042 if (!_caster->HasInLine(target, target->GetObjectSize()))
9043 return false;
9044 return WorldObjectSpellAreaTargetCheck::operator ()(target);
9045 }
9046
9047} //namespace Acore
